[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/khri brgyad kha pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad 
[\[1b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa ltar/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa 
[\[1b.3\]]ma mdzad lags so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[1b.4\]]bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad pa lags so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi ming yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so/_/de skad ces 
[\[1b.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]lnga po rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos par pha rol tu 
[\[2a.2\]]phyin pa'i ming 'thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos par pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 
[\[2a.3\]]'thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam 
[\[2a.4\]]gtan dang /_shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/_ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa 
[\[2a.5\]]dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/_/len pa med pa'i tshul dang /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[2a.6\]]gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/_yongs su bsdos 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pas ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos 
[\[2b.2\]]pas/_ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gzugs gnyis su med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi bar 
[\[2b.3\]]du gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma 
[\[2b.4\]]mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/_byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ngo /_/'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ngo /_/
[\[2b.5\]]'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med 
[\[2b.6\]]cing gnyis su dbyer med pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de bas na 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams dang /_byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[2b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po la brten nas tshogs pa'i dbang gis sa bon rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten na/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten na yang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
[\[3a.2\]]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[3a.3\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi yongs su 'dren pa yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa 
[\[3a.4\]]dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongs su brjod pa 
[\[3a.5\]]ma mdzad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung zhing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung lags so/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[3a.6\]]'jug pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 
[\[3a.7\]]'jig rten na mchis pa lags so/_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_
[\[3b.2\]]dgra bcom pa rnams mchis pa lags so/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams mchis pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis 
[\[3b.3\]]pas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na bzhugs pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi 
[\[3b.4\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pas de dag gi yon tan ni de tsam du zad ces nga mi smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha 
[\[3b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 
[\[3b.6\]]yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par 
[\[3b.7\]]grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[4a.2\]]gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po gang yin pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong 
[\[4a.3\]]ba'i phung po de ni kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po nas/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i bar gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nas/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 
[\[4a.4\]]mthong ba'i phung po'i bar de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhing /_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi sems ni nyan 
[\[4a.5\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las rnam par grol zhing /_chos gang dang yang bral ba med la skyes pa yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'chang zhing me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos 
[\[4a.6\]]dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang tshe 'di dang /_tshe phyi 
[\[4a.7\]]ma'i yon tan rnams 'thob par re bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[4b.2\]]dang /_ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur 
[\[4b.3\]]lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa de'i gan du lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po chos nyan pa'i phyir 
[\[4b.4\]]'ong bar 'gyur te/_lha'i bu rnams rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa nye bar sgrub par sems par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe chos smra ba de dag smra bar mi 'dod pa na yang lha'i bu de dag nyid chos la gus pas spobs 
[\[4b.5\]]pa nye bar sgrub par sems par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de glegs bam du yang bris 
[\[4b.6\]]nas/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag kyang thob par 
[\[4b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi po dag gi mdun du bdag la la la zhig bka' gcog cing klan ka tshol du 'ong ngo snyam du sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di srung zhing skyob la sbed par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /_
[\[5a.2\]]zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_thun mong ba rnams dang /_thun mong ma yin pa rnams dang /_dge ba rnams dang /_mi dge ba rnams dang /_'dus byas rnams dang /_'dus ma byas rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_
[\[5a.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_chos thams cad tha dad pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_dngos 
[\[5a.4\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la klan ka tshol ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_klan ka tshol bar byed pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[5a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de la ni klan ka tshol ba med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa ni/_sems zhum par mi 'gyur/_
[\[5a.6\]]kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/_skrag par mi 'gyur/_dngang bar mi 'gyur/_kun tu dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni gang zhum pa'am/_kun tu zhum pa 'am/_skrag pa 'am/_dngang ba 'am/_kun 
[\[5a.7\]]tu dngang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_me tog 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 
[\[5b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de glegs bam du yang bris te/_me tog dang /_
[\[5b.3\]]bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa de ni pha dang /_ma dang /_mdza' bo dang /_phyi 'khor dang /_gnyen 
[\[5b.4\]]dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[5b.5\]]dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_slob pa thams cad dang /_mi slob pa de dag thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer 
[\[5b.6\]]bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa mi chod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi chod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[5b.7\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi chod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi chod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi chod pa dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[6a.2\]]rig pa bzhi mi chod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi chod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi chod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[6a.3\]]yongs su dag par bya ba mi chod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi chod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can gyi rgol ba byung ngo cog la/_chos dang ldan pas tshar gcod nus par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[6a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de yi ger yang bris te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[6a.5\]]gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa ni tshe 'di dang /_tshe phyi ma'i yon tan de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 
[\[6a.6\]]'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te/_'chang bar byed pa der/_kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i 
[\[6a.7\]]bu bla na med pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag der lhags nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed cing /_phyag byas te btud nas phyir 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sum 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /_tshangs 'khor rnams dang /_'od chung rnams 
[\[6b.2\]]dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba rnams dang /_tshangs pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa de 
[\[6b.3\]]dag kyang der lhags nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par byas nas phyir 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mi che ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_
[\[6b.4\]]gya nom snang ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag kyang der lhags nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par byas te/_phyag byas nas phyir 'dong bar 
[\[6b.5\]]sems par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris su gtogs pa nas 'bras bu che ba man chad bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[6b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am 
[\[6b.7\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa de dag 'dir lhags nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par byas shing phyag byas te/_mchod pa byas pa rnams phyir deng shig_/chos kyi sbyin pa 'di yang 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]de dag la byin par gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu man chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[7a.2\]]chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag kyang der lhags nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed cing phyag byas 
[\[7a.3\]]te/_btud nas phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bu man chad dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod 
[\[7a.4\]]pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha man chad gang yin pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed cing /_de la glags tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed de/_las kyi rnam 
[\[7a.5\]]par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[7a.6\]]chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi skyabs bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba'i ched du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[7a.7\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par bgyi ba dang /_bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_ri mor bgyi ba dang /_mchod 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]par bgyi ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_gdud par bgyi ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug dag nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams der mchi ba dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bu man chad mchi bar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ji ltar rtogs 
[\[7b.2\]]par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mi ma yin pa'i lha'i dri sngon ma myong bar tshor bar gyur na/_des lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang /_
[\[7b.3\]]gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'dir lhags so snyam du shes par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 
[\[7b.4\]]gtsang sbra byas na/_gtsang sbra byas pa des lha de dag lhags nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa byas 
[\[7b.5\]]nas yi rangs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs de ni lha gzi brjid chung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni/_lha gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag gi gzi brjid dang /_byin mi bzod pas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so/_/lha gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag ji tsam du der 'ong 
[\[7b.6\]]ba de tsam du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag rgya cher mos par 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs der yang gtsang sbra mi byed pa'i bag spyad par mi bya ste/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[7b.7\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan cing spos kyis byugs la me tog sil mas gtor bar bya'o/_/dar gyi lda ldi mang po spyang zhing bla re bres la rnam pa du mas sa phyogs de brgyan par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i lus ngal 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lus bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus yang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus las su rung ba dang /_sems yang ba dang /_sems las su rung ba dang /_sems bde bar nyams su tshor bar 'gyur te/_de phyin chad de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[8a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su rtog cing sdig pa'i rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis spras pa/_sku gser gyi kha dog 
[\[8a.3\]]can/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa/_chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid thos 
[\[8a.4\]]par 'gyur zhing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid thos par 'gyur te/_pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi don thos pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco 
[\[8a.5\]]brgyad kyi bar gyi don thos par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[8a.6\]]par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[8a.7\]]ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya zhes/_chos bgro ba byed pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]steng dang /_phyogs mtshams dag nas/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di zhes bya ba/_byang 
[\[8b.2\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gis mdun gyis bltas nas/_yongs su bskor te chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos par 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bye ba 
[\[8b.3\]]khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong zhing phyogs bcu'i bar du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten sku 
[\[8b.4\]]gdung gi ring bsrel gyi rten rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten de dag la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[8b.5\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa dag mthong bar 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rmi lam bzang po de lta bu de dag rmi bar 'gyur ro/_/bde bar gnyid 
[\[8b.6\]]kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur te/_lus la gzi brjid bcug par nyams su tshor zhing lus kyang lci ba med de/_yang bar nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro/_/de kha zas la yang brkam pa'i shas che bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan 
[\[8b.7\]]dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad la brkam par mi 'gyur te/_kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa ting nge 'dzin las langs pa de ni yid la byed pas tshim par gyur pa'i sems kyi zas la brkam pa'i shas che bar mi 'gyur gyi chung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bzhin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la mi ma yin pa rnams gzi brjid sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za 
[\[9a.2\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag kyang lus la gzi brjid 'jug par byed do/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[9a.3\]]tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[9a.4\]]'di 'dzin par mi byed/_'chang bar mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_kun chub par mi byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed par glegs bam du bris te 'chang la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed kyang /_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur gyi/_gang gis phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig 
[\[9a.6\]]rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar 
[\[9a.7\]]byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang /_nyan thos dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la yang gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las 'dzin pa dang /_ri mo byed pa'i phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o//_//
[\[9b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka gal te 'dzam bu gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur byas te bkang la/_de dag la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng 
[\[9b.3\]]dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khyod la byin pa gang yin pa cha 'di gnyis 
[\[9b.4\]]las khyod gang 'dom/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba bdag la stsal ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te stsal ba la/_bdag ni cha 'di gnyis 
[\[9b.5\]]bzhag pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la ma gus pa yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gus pa kho na lags te/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[9b.6\]]gdung dag la bsti stang du bgyid par mi 'tshal ba'am/_bla mar bgyid par mi 'tshal ba'am/_ri mor bgyid par mi 'tshal ba'am/_mchod pa bgyid par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags mod kyi/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni 
[\[9b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba lags te/_de'i slad du de dag la bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_ri mor bgyi ba dang /_mchod par bgyi ba lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]bsgos pa lags te/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung 
[\[10a.2\]]du med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa de kho na 
[\[10a.3\]]khyod kyis ji ltar blang bar sems/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung ba'am/_mi gzung ba'am/_'grib pa'am/_'phel ba'am/_dbri ba'am/_bsnan pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin/_
[\[10a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_slob pa'i chos rnams dang /_mi slob pa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_
[\[10a.5\]]so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_pha rol tu 
[\[10a.6\]]phyin pa rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_
[\[10a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa ma yin 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]par bdag gis kyang shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[10b.2\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 
[\[10b.3\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te legs so legs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi 
[\[10b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/kau shi 
[\[10b.5\]]ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod par zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de bzhin du bsam 
[\[10b.6\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyang gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[10b.7\]]sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod par zad do/_/de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi bar du gnyis su 'dod par zad do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslabs na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[11a.2\]]rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na/_lha'i dbang po'i stan la bdag mchis pa'i gnas la/_bdag mchis pa na der lha'i bu dag bdag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i slad du mchis te/_gang gi tshe bdag 
[\[11a.3\]]gi seng ge'i khri la bdag ma mchis pa de'i tshe/_lha'i bu de dag chos kyi stan 'di la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dug nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos bstan to zhes bdag gi stan de la phyag bgyis nas slar mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang du shes rab kyi pha 
[\[11a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris pa gnas sam/_kha don du bgyid dam/_gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa der phyogs bcu nas lha'i bu dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 
[\[11a.5\]]gang lhags pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyag 'tshal du mchi zhing /_phyag bgyis nas slar mchi bar sems lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung la/_
[\[11a.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyang 'di las skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang 
[\[11a.7\]]chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten du gyur cing /_rkyen du gyur/_rgyur gyur/_stobs par gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas bdag ni cha de gnyis las/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid 'tshal lags te/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs nas/_dam pa'i chos la sems gdungs pas kha ton du bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/_'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/_bag 'khum par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang 
[\[11b.2\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis shing /_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtags ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis/_smos su ma mchis pa lags 
[\[11b.3\]]pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du smos su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[11b.4\]]te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa zhig lags te/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod 
[\[11b.5\]]du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos 
[\[11b.6\]]su ma mchis par chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis/_smos su ma mchis pa lags pa de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma 
[\[11b.7\]]ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab par thugs su chud nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can rnams la mtshan 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_tha snyad ma mchis pa'i chos ston lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[12a.2\]]tu phyin pa 'di la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[12a.3\]]ri mor bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa bgyi ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par bgyi ba lags te/_de la ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so/_/
[\[12a.4\]]nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba yang ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_sems can yongs su 
[\[12a.5\]]smin par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[12a.6\]]dag gis bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_ri mor bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa bgyi ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis 
[\[12a.7\]]yongs su bkang ste/_byur bur bgyis pa zhig kyang bdag la stsal la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang bdag la stsal na/_bdag ni cha gnyis bzhag pa 'di las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'tshal lags so/_/de 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni de las byung ste/_bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_ri mor bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa bgyi ba lags pas des na/_rigs kyi bu gang dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor 
[\[12b.2\]]bgyid/_mchod pa bgyid na/_de dag ngan 'gro dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong nas/_smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[12b.3\]]'da' bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gang lags pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba gang lags pa 'di ni mtshungs pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[12b.4\]]gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa 
[\[12b.5\]]gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[12b.6\]]'di bzung ste/_kun chub par bgyis nas gzhan dag la yang bstan pa gang lags pa de ni mtshungs pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum dang /_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_
[\[12b.7\]]gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar dag ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar gyi chos ston pa gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 
[\[13a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du chos ston pa gang lags pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[13a.3\]]'di yongs su 'dzin pa nas/_gzhan dag la ston pa'i bar du bgyid pa gang lags pa de ni mtshungs pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ba lags la/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_
[\[13a.4\]]gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar de dag kyang 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de dag la yang me 
[\[13a.5\]]tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_gang gis shes rab kyi pha 
[\[13a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod pa 
[\[13a.7\]]bgyid pa de ni mtshungs pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pas/_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston pa gang lags pa de la ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ma 
[\[13b.2\]]mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba yang ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes 
[\[13b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas/_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_de la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na 
[\[13b.4\]]bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod pa bgyid pa de la ni gang las kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/_bu lon 
[\[13b.5\]]pas 'jigs pa'i mi rgyal po la brten na/_de rgyal po la 'khor bas/_de gang dag gis 'jigs par gyur pa de dag nyid kyis brten par 'gyur te/_de dag gis 'jigs par yang mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa ni de ltar 
[\[13b.6\]]'gyur ba'i slad du ste rgyal po la brten pa ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis ni mchod pa brnyes lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal po de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni 
[\[13b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blta bar bgyi lags so/_/rgyal po la brten pa'i mi mchod pa 'thob pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pas mchod pa brnyes par blta bar bgyi lags so/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos par rig par bgyi lags so/_/de lta lags pas bdag ni cha 'di gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i 
[\[14a.2\]]slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni 'di las byung ba lags/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni 'di las byung ba lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 
[\[14a.3\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni 'di las byung ba lags/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po ni 'di las byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams ni 'di las byung bas/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa lags/_de bzhin 
[\[14a.4\]]gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di las byung ba lags pa'i slad du'o//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[14a.5\]]gang na sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa der sems can de dag la mi'am/_mi ma lags pa glags tshol bas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad ni 
[\[14a.6\]]rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du yang 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar rin po che ltar don che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 
[\[14a.7\]]sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bgyid pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/_sangs rgyas byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang ma mchis pa zhig mchis la/_nor bu rin po che de yang yon tan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing /_gang dang gang 
[\[14b.2\]]na skyes pa 'am/_bud med mi ma lags pas zin pa de dang der/_nor bu rin po che de phyung na/_nor bu rin po che der phyung ma thag tu mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod pas 'bros par 'gyur lags so/_/mkhris pa'i dbang gis tsha bar gyur pa'i 
[\[14b.3\]]lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/_mkhris pa de yang sel bar 'gyur zhing /_rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur la/_zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/bser ma'i bro nad kyis thebs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na yang rlung de sel bar 'gyur lags so/_/bad 
[\[14b.4\]]kan gyi bro nad kyis thebs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na yang /_bad kan de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dus pa'i bro nad kyis thebs pa de'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na yang de'i nad de zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[14b.5\]]lags so/_/nor bu rin po che de mtshan mo yang snang bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/tsha ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshes phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de yang bsil bar 'gyur lags so/_/lhags pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/_sa phyogs gang 
[\[14b.6\]]du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de yang dro bar 'gyur lags so/_/nor bu rin po che de gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de grang yang mi grang /_tsha yang mi tsha ste/_dus tshigs bde bar 'gyur lags so/_/sa phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de gnas pa'i sa 
[\[14b.7\]]phyogs der sbrul gdug pa dang /_sdig pa la sogs pa'am/_sdig sbrul rnams kyang gnas par mi 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin par gyur pa de la nor bu rin po che de bstan na/_de la bstan ma thag tu dug de dag 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan de dag la sogs pa dang ldan pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das skyes pa'am/_bud med bro nad sna tshogs kyis thebs pa gang lags pa de dag gis lus la gal te nor bu 
[\[15a.2\]]rin po che de btags na/_de dag gi bro nad thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chab gang gi nang du nor bu rin po che stsal ba'i chab de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyi kha dog ji lta ba dang yan lag brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom 
[\[15a.3\]]ldan 'das gal te nor bu rin po che de ras sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na yang chab de sngon por 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/_/gal te ser po'am/_gal te dmar po'am/_gal te btsod ka'am/_gal te shel gyi kha dog lta bu'i ras kyis nor bu 
[\[15a.4\]]rin po che de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na yang chab de yang de dag gi kha dog tu 'gyur lags so/_/ras tshon sna tshogs su bsgral ba'i ras kyis nor bu rin po che de dkris nas chab kyi nang du stsal na yang chab de kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/_/bcom 
[\[15a.5\]]ldan 'das/_chab rnyog ma can gang gi nang du nor bu rin po che de stsal ba'i chab de dag thams cad kyang dang bar 'gyur te/_nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan de dag la sogs pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di 
[\[15a.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems/_nor bu rin po che de lha'i yin nam/_'on te 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la yang rin po che de lta bu yod snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo nor bu rin po che de ni lha'i yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[15a.7\]]gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che gang yin pa ni chung la lci'o/_/lha'i nor bu rin po che gang yin ba de dag ni che la yang ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che rnams ni/_lha'i rin po che de dag ltar yon tan gyi rnam pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/_'dzam bu gling 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]pa'i nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha'i rin po che rnams kyi grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_cha dang bgrang ba dang dper yang mi bzod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de za ma tog gi nang du stsal ba las/_
[\[15b.2\]]gang gi tshe nor bu rin po che de za ma tog de'i nang nas phyung na yang nor bu rin po che de de'i nang na mchis mchis so zhes za ma tog de yang yid du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sa phyogs gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa der/_rigs kyi 
[\[15b.3\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus dang /_sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /_gnod pa mis bgyis pa'am/_mi ma lags pas bgyis pa rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de la nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[15b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni dpag tu ma mchis pa lags na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ji snyed cig yongs su brjod par rngo thogs lags/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[15b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[15b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[15b.7\]]nyid kyi ye shes dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan yang de bzhin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi yon tan de dag gis de bzhin 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sku gdung de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_bag chags dang /_nying mtshams sbyor ba 
[\[16a.2\]]dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi snod du gyur pa lags te/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sku gdung de 
[\[16a.3\]]dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che rnams kyi snod du gyur pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[16a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_blang ba ma mchis pa dang /_dor ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni chos nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[16a.5\]]snod du gyur pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/_chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa lags te de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[16a.6\]]gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste/_byur bur bgyis pa lta zhog lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste/_byur bur bgyis la/_
[\[16a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang glegs bam du bris te stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni cha 'di gnyis bzhag pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]su bsgos pa ni de las byung ba'i slad du mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[16b.2\]]ni mthar phyin nas/_lha rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi bde ba dag nyams su myong ste/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/_rgyal chen 
[\[16b.3\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba nyams su myong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyi sdug bsngal mthar bgyid par 'gyur ba tsam du bas 
[\[16b.4\]]kyi/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags 
[\[16b.5\]]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[16b.6\]]phyin pas kyang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_
[\[16b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par bgyid lags so/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams thob par 'gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams thob nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi zhing lus gang dag gis sems can rnams 
[\[17a.2\]]yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i lus bsam bzhin du len par bgyid de/_yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po 
[\[17a.3\]]lta bu'i lus blangs nas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la gus par mi bgyid pa yang ma lags la/_len par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags mod kyi/_
[\[17a.4\]]'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang bgyis pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang bsti stang bgyis par 'gyur/_bla mar bgyis par 'gyur/_ri mor bgyis par 'gyur/_mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[17a.5\]]'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa de dag chos kyi sku dang /_gzugs kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal ba gang lags pa de ni/_
[\[17a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_klag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi zhing tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang phyogs bcu'i 
[\[17a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni/_chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos nyid 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ni 'di gnyis lags te/_gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/_nang stong pa nyid 'tshal ba dang /_dngos 
[\[17b.2\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'tshal ba gang lags pa'i bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_
[\[17b.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_
[\[17b.4\]]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa rnams dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba 'tshal ba'i chos rnams 'tshal ba gang lags pa ste/_'di ni 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid 
[\[17b.5\]]ces bgyi'o/_/de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/_chos gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma 
[\[17b.6\]]mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_'grib pa ma mchis pa dang /_'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyi bar dag lags so/_/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyang gang lags zhe na/_chos 
[\[17b.7\]]thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/_'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba gang yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[18a.2\]]dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[18a.3\]]de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_
[\[18a.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[18a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos da ltar 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[18a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/'thob bo/_/'das pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas su gyur 
[\[18a.7\]]pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang /_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gnas te/_'tsho zhing sdod pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_rang byang chub thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/'thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir te/_de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i 
[\[18b.2\]]tshul dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /_dbri ba med pa dang /_
[\[18b.3\]]bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang /_gzung ba med pa dang /_spong ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis bya ba yin gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma yin/_pha 
[\[18b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa lang ma yin pa'i phyir te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol lam/_tshu rol lam/_thang ngam/_gshong ngam/_mnyam pa'am/_mi mnyam pa 'am/_mtshan ma'am/_mtshan ma med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten 
[\[18b.5\]]las 'das pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang sbyin par byed pa ma yin te/_rang 
[\[18b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang sbyin par byed pa ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ches che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[18b.7\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams kyang rab tu 'tshal la sems can yang mi dmigs/_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar yang mi dmigs/_gzugs kyang mi 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]dmigs/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang mi dmigs/_mig kyang mi dmigs/_gzugs kyang mi dmigs/_mig gi rnam par shes pa yang mi dmigs/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[19a.2\]]yang mi dmigs/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma lags/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags pa gang lags pa de yang mi dmigs lags so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_
[\[19a.3\]]lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang mi dmigs/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma lags/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags pa 
[\[19a.4\]]gang lags pa de yang mi dmigs lags so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam yang mi dmigs lags so/_/de 
[\[19a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs lags so/_/byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs lags so/_/
[\[19a.6\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gang gis dmigs pa dang /_gang la dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom 
[\[19a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/_byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la spyod par bgyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la spyod par mi bgyid 
[\[19b.2\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la spyod pa ma yin gyi/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la yang spyod do/_/de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/_de sbyin pa yang mi 
[\[19b.3\]]dmigs/_sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_tshul khrims 'chal pa yang mi dmigs so/_/bzod pa yang mi dmigs/_bzod par bya ba yang mi dmigs/_
[\[19b.4\]]bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs so/_/brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/_bya ba yang mi dmigs/_lus dang sems kyang mi dmigs so/_/sems kyang mi dmigs/_ting nge 'dzin kyang mi dmigs/_mnyam par bzhag pa yang mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyang mi 
[\[19b.5\]]dmigs/_shes par bya ba yang mi dmigs/_shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/
[\[19b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams 
[\[19b.7\]]rnam par 'byed pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/stobs rnams 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[20a.2\]]gyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi shing ljon pa lo ma tha dad pa dang 'bras bu tha dad pa'i shing ljon pa ji snyed pa de dag gi grib ma ni grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par khyad par ram tha dad du dbye ba med do/_/kau shi ka de 
[\[20a.3\]]bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pa rnams la ni khyad par ram/_tha dad du dbye ba med do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes 
[\[20a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa lags/_yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags/_yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thug pa 
[\[20a.5\]]ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la yang bris te 'chang la/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na 
[\[20a.6\]]bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par bgyid de/_ji ltar lung phog pa bzhin du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[20a.7\]]mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris te/_gzhan dag la stsal na/_'di gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du skyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir 'di khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]ltar lan thob shig_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[20b.2\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam gzhan dag la byin te/_bgo bsha' byas nas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[20b.3\]]de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam po de la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod 
[\[20b.4\]]par byed na/_de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag nyid kyang me 
[\[20b.5\]]tog la sogs pas bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par bgyid cing /_gzhan dag la yang stsol bar bgyid pa de ni/_de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/_sems can 
[\[20b.6\]]gyi tshogs kyi nang na/_sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/_de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams 
[\[20b.7\]]su byin gyis brlabs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das tha na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam la mchod par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du de dag thams cad kyis de'i mtha' rtogs par 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]rngo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_
[\[21a.2\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa bas gang gis yi ger bris nas gzhan dag la sbyin par byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de 
[\[21a.3\]]las ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar lung phog pa bzhin du gzhan dag gi drung du song ste/_'chad cing ston pa dang /_rjod cing 'grel ba dang /_gsal bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[21a.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo de ni/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma bas/_ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/_ston pa 'am bla ma'i gnas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa gang yang rung ba zhig yin par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di la ston pa yang gzhan la/_shes 
[\[21a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan pa ni ma yin gyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin la/_ston pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin par blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa dang /_
[\[21a.6\]]ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas byung ba yin la/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa gang yang rung ba dag dang /_phyir mi ldog 
[\[21a.7\]]pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas/_nyan thos 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs so/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de 
[\[21b.2\]]bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[21b.3\]]dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid glegs bam la bris te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[21b.4\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya'o/_/nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/_'di snyam du bsams te/_ngas gang la brten 
[\[21b.5\]]te gnas par bya/_gang zhig la ni bsti stang bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya snyam pa las/_kau shi ka de'i tshe ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na/_nga dang 'dra ba ma mthong ste/_nga dang 'dra ba yang 
[\[21b.6\]]dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/_yang 'di snyam du bsams te/_'o na de ltar ngas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de nyid la bdag gis bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya zhing brten te/_gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams pa'i chos gang yin pa de 
[\[21b.7\]]ni/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni la ni nga nyid kyang bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed de/_bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas nas rten cing gnas na/_
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[22a.2\]]gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par 
[\[22a.3\]]zhugs pa dag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod 
[\[22a.4\]]par bya ba lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[22a.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams byung ba'i phyir te/_kau shi ka de lta bas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis gang la bslabs na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams/_bla na med pa 
[\[22a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[22a.7\]]phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las sku gdung gi le'u zhes bya ste/_sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//kau shi ka 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag pa ni/_bsod nams ches dpag tu med pa yin gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka sems can dge ba bcu'i 
[\[22b.2\]]las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa dag ni/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag gis yongs su btang ba ma yin gyi/_sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag pa ni/_ngan 'gro thams cad 
[\[22b.3\]]las thar pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhag pa ni bsod nams ches mang ba yin gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
