[\[22b.4\]]gang la las/_sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i ched du bzhag pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 
[\[22b.5\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni/_bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' las ni dkon mchog gsum byung la/_dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[22b.6\]]mchod pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka de bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_
[\[22b.7\]]spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci gzhi de las rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/
[\[23a.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas tha na dpe bri ba dang /_bklag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de ches 
[\[23a.3\]]bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi gang la bslabs na/_yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa dang /_'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur pa dang /_'thob pa dang /_
[\[23a.4\]]thob par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skyon med pa la zhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[23a.5\]]'gyur ba'i zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_nang 
[\[23a.6\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[23a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan pa dag yin no/_/kau shi ka de bas na rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam la bris te/_tha na dpe 'dri ba dang /_klog pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de/_ches 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]bsod nams mang du skyed par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar chos gang dag gis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa 
[\[23b.2\]]dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams yod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du 
[\[23b.3\]]yod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams yod pa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir 
[\[23b.4\]]ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod na/_
[\[23b.5\]]kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas 
[\[23b.6\]]na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/_tha na dpe bri ba dang /_klog pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de/_ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[23b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can 'khod pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_dgra 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]bcom pa'i bar dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du bkod pa lta zhog gi_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa dang /_dgra 
[\[24a.2\]]bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/_tha na dpe bri ba dang /_bklag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de ni de bas ches bsod 
[\[24a.3\]]nams mang du skyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa lta zhog gi_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_
[\[24a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/_tha na dpe bri ba dang /_bklag pa tsam gyi phyir yang /_gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed 
[\[24a.5\]]do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed 'khod pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi 
[\[24a.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/_
[\[24a.7\]]tha na dpe bri ba dang /_bklag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams lta 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]zhog gi_/kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi 
[\[24b.2\]]bar du bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/_tha na dpe bri ba dang /_bklag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de bas ches 
[\[24b.3\]]bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang yin pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bsam gtan bzhi la bkod cing /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_
[\[24b.4\]]mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/_ci rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[24b.5\]]stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/_tha na dpe bri ba dang /_bklag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i 
[\[24b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[24b.7\]]du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ches mang du skyed kyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la bkod 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed 
[\[25a.2\]]pa dang /_gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[25a.3\]]klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gnyis su spyod pa 
[\[25a.4\]]ma yin pa'i blos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos/_sangs rgyas 
[\[25a.5\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rnam grangs des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing 'chad la rab tu 'byed 
[\[25a.6\]]pa dang /_'grel cing gsal bar byed pa dang /_don kyang ston par byed la/_de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su mi lta gnyis su med par mi lta zhing /_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma med par ma yin/_
[\[25a.7\]]blang bar ma yin/_dor bar ma yin/_dbri bar ma yin/_bsnan par ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/_rnam par byang bar ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_'gag par ma yin/_gzung bar ma yin/_spang bar ma yin/_gnas su ma yin/_gnas ma 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]yin par ma yin/_yang dag par ma yin/_log par ma yin/_rig par ma yin/_mi rig par ma yin/_bag tsam du ma yin/_bag tsam ma yin par ma yin/_cha shas su ma yin/_cha shas med par ma yin/_chos su ma yin/_chos ma yin par ma yin/_de bzhin 
[\[25b.2\]]nyid du ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin zhing /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang mi lta ba ste/_'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don to/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la rgya cher ston 
[\[25b.3\]]cing 'chad la/_rab tu 'byed pa dang /_'grel cing gsal bar byed pa dang /_don kyang ston par byed pa de ni gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed kyi/_gang bdag 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[25b.4\]]byed pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa bas gang zhig gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing 
[\[25b.5\]]'doms par byed pa dang /_de la 'god par byed pa dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la don kyang ston par byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags te/_de de ltar lags so/_/bcom 
[\[25b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang bcas tshig 'bru dang bcas par bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar bstan na/_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu 
[\[25b.7\]]med/_grangs med tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med/_dpag tu med pa dag la ji srid 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod 
[\[26a.2\]]par byed pa bas/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam grangs du mar gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing /_don go bar byed la rnam par 'byed cing 'grel te gsal bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de bas ches 
[\[26a.3\]]bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[26a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bskal pa grangs med pa/_dpag tu 
[\[26a.5\]]med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa bas/_gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing rjod pa dang /_mchod pa'i bar du byed la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du 
[\[26a.6\]]skyed do/_/kau shi ka de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin pa gang yin pa ste/_'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no/_/'di ni sbyin pa yin te/_gzhan la sbyin no snyam du sems na/_de ni sbyin pa nyid la gnas pa yin gyi/_
[\[26a.7\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/'di ni tshul khrims so/_/bdag ni tshul khrims can yin gyis/_sems can 'di dag gi don du srung ngo snyam du sems na/_de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag ni bzod pa can no/_/'di ni bzod pa'o/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]'di la bzod par bya ste/_bzod pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/_de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di ni brtson 'grus so/_/'di dag gi don du brtson 'grus 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/_
[\[26b.2\]]de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/_/'di ni bsam gtan no/_/'di dag gi don du snyoms par zhugs te/_bsam gtan 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/_de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[26b.3\]]ma yin no/_/bdag gis shes rab sgom mo/_/'di ni shes rab bo/_/'di dag gi don du shes rab 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pa'i sbyin 
[\[26b.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[26b.5\]]rdzogs pa ma yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar spyad na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[26b.6\]]par 'gyur ba lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom 
[\[26b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin pa dang /_len pa po mi dmigs na/_de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims can dang /_
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]sems can mi dmigs na/_de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/bzod pa dang bzod par bya ba dang /_bzod pa can mi dmigs na/_de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/brtson 'grus dang /_bya ba'i dngos po dang /_
[\[27a.2\]]sems can mi dmigs na/_de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan pa dang /_bsam gtan du bya ba mi dmigs na/_de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/shes rab dang /_shes rab can dang /_
[\[27a.3\]]shes par bya ba'i don mi dmigs na/_de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha 
[\[27a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[27a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par bstan par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin 
[\[27a.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_der rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med 
[\[27a.7\]]par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa thos par byas pas/_phung bar byed de/_de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston par mi byed 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ni 'di lta bur ston to/_/
[\[27b.2\]]de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ni 'di yin te/_gzugs mi rtag go zhes gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no zhes ston to/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag go zhes dpyod 
[\[27b.3\]]cing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes dpyod par byed do/_/gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa la spyod par 'gyur te/_
[\[27b.4\]]de dag mig mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/gzugs mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/
[\[27b.5\]]sa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/mig gi khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/rna ba'i khams dang /_
[\[27b.6\]]sna'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_yid kyi khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_chos kyi khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/
[\[27b.7\]]mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do/_/gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug 
[\[28a.2\]]bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid 
[\[28a.3\]]dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i 
[\[28a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston par byed do/_/gzugs mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[28a.5\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa 
[\[28a.6\]]dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[28a.7\]]dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[28b.2\]]dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o 
[\[28b.3\]]zhes ston par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed de/_'di skad du de ltar spyod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no zhes kyang zer te/_
[\[28b.4\]]kau shi ka 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni/_'di skad du ston te rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[28b.5\]]tu phyin pa bsgoms na/_sa dang po dang sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[28b.6\]]tu phyin pa bsgoms na/_sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur zhing /_sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes ston te/_de yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dus kyi 'du shes kyis de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed do/_/kau shi ka 
[\[28b.7\]]'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/_nyan 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]thos kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur zhing /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes ston par byed de/_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 
[\[29a.2\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston pa na/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/de ltar bsgoms na/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur 
[\[29a.3\]]ro/_/zhes ston par byed de/_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na/_'di skad du rigs kyi 
[\[29a.4\]]bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig_/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas 
[\[29a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas 
[\[29a.6\]]kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston par byed do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[29a.7\]]kyi bu mo de dag la 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu dag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po grangs med dpag tu med/_tshad med pa dang ldan par 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]'gyur ro zhes ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag 
[\[29b.2\]]la 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[29b.3\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mnga' ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar byas nas/_gcig tu bsdus la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[29b.4\]]kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ji skad du bstan na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[29b.5\]]zhugs pa de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa mi ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar ston na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[29b.6\]]zhugs pa rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms la gzugs mi rtag par yang ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid 
[\[29b.7\]]kyis stong ste/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de yang dngos po med la/_dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar brjod du med pa'i 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la ni gzugs nyid kyang med na/_rtag pa'am mi rtag par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de skad du ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin no/_/de 
[\[30a.2\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag par yang ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de yang dngos po med la/_
[\[30a.3\]]dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar brjod du med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la ni rnam par shes pa nyid kyang 
[\[30a.4\]]med na rtag pa'am mi rtag par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de skad du ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[30a.5\]]sgom pa 'di skad du ston te/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms la/_rigs kyi bu khyod chos ci la yang ma lta shig_/chos gang la yang gnas par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni chos 
[\[30a.6\]]gang las 'da' bar bya ba'am/_gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_chos gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de ni dngos po med la/_dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[30a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni chos gang blang ba'am/_dor ba'am/_skye ba'am 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes de ltar ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin no/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs 
[\[30b.2\]]rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi rtag par yang ma lta shig_/de ci'i 
[\[30b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de yang dngos po med la/_dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[30b.4\]]pa yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar brjod du med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am/_mi rtag 
[\[30b.5\]]par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de skad du ston na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don de ltar bstan 
[\[30b.6\]]par bya'o/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar ston na/_bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 
[\[30b.7\]]bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la rnam grangs du mar rjod cing 'chad la/_rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing 
[\[31a.2\]]yang dag par ston la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan 
[\[31a.3\]]tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams 
[\[31a.4\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta yang zhog_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta yang zhog_/
[\[31a.5\]]kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta yang zhog gi/_/kau shi ka shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[31a.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo la las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams dang /_steng dang /_'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de 
[\[31a.7\]]dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad cing yang 
[\[31b.2\]]dag par ston la/_rnam par 'byed cing 'grel te/_gsal bar byed la 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji 
[\[31b.3\]]skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[31b.4\]]kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de 
[\[31b.5\]]las bsod nams ches mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes 
[\[31b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par sems can gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad pa nas/_yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs 
[\[31b.7\]]shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa'i bar du btul ba lta zhog gi_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[32a.2\]]bkod la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod de/_kau shi ka shar phyogs 
[\[32a.3\]]su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/_sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin 
[\[32a.4\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston 
[\[32a.5\]]cing 'chad la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par bya ba'i bar du gyis shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i 
[\[32a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji 
[\[32a.7\]]snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dod pa dag la don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston 
[\[32b.2\]]cing yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang 
[\[32b.3\]]du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rang sangs rgyas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang yin pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[32b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa bas gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad cing yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob pa de 
[\[32b.5\]]lta de ltar khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[32b.6\]]ji lta ji ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka byang chub sems 
[\[32b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa rnams ni de las byung la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang su dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ste/_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[33a.2\]]snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[33a.3\]]'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag 
[\[33a.4\]]la 'chad cing yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan bya ba'i bar du gyis shig dang /_rigs kyi bu khyod ji lta ji ltar ji skad 
[\[33a.5\]]bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyor te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[33a.6\]]rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad kyang zer na/_kau shi ka de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i 
[\[33a.7\]]gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa bas ni/_de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par 'chad cing yang dag 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]par ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan bya ba'i bar du gyis shig dang /_rigs kyi bu khyod ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[33b.2\]]tu phyin pa la ji lta ji ltar nan tan byed pa de lta de ltar khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pas/_phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/_rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro zhes kyang 
[\[33b.3\]]zer na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa rnams dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong 
[\[33b.4\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa rnams dang /_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang 
[\[33b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par sems can de dag la bshad cing yang dag par bstan la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/
[\[33b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan bya ba'i bar du gyis shig dang /_khyod 'di la nan tan byas pas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/_rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[33b.7\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig_/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod de/_de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par bshad pa nas/_yang dag par bstan pa'i bar du byed pa bas/_de dag gi nang nas gcig cig 'di skad du/_
[\[34a.2\]]bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod do zhes zer ba de la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston na/_de ches bsod nams mang 
[\[34a.3\]]du skyed do/_/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa dang /_la la zhig gis de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa bas ni/_
[\[34a.4\]]de dag gi nang nas 'ga' zhig 'di skad du bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes zer ba de la gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston na/_de ches 
[\[34a.5\]]bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[34a.6\]]tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su 
[\[34a.7\]]bstan 'tshal lags so/_/stong pa nyid thams cad la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so sor yang dag pa'i rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so/_/gos dang /_zas dang /_
[\[34b.2\]]mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis sman gdags 'tshal lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni chos dang /_zang zing gi bsdu ba gnyis kyis sman gdags 'tshal te/_chos dang /_zang zing gis sman 'dogs 
[\[34b.3\]]pa de ni snga ma gnyis bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[34b.4\]]kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[34b.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gang khyod kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi spro ba bskyed pa ni legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi las ni de yin no/_/'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa des ni 
[\[34b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/chos dang /_zang zing gi bsdu bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags par bya zhing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[34b.7\]]'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de las byung ste/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de las byung la/_theg pa chen po yang de las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur la/_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma bslabs te/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[35a.2\]]ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs na/_chos de dag la ma bslabs pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_rang sangs 
[\[35a.3\]]rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_nyan thos kyi byang chub yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_kau shi ka gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag la slob pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[35a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun gcod par 'gyur zhing /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[35a.5\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul thams cad rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[35a.6\]]ris kyi lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_
[\[35a.7\]]'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_gnas gtsang ma mi che ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_rnam shes 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[35b.2\]]dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[35b.3\]]ngo /_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/shes rab kyi 
[\[35b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bsod nams kyi khyad par gyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/_gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 
[\[35b.5\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[35b.6\]]tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[35b.7\]]rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de mchog ces bya/_phul du byung ba zhes bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_rab ces bya/_rab mchog ces bya/_gya nom 
[\[36a.2\]]pa zhes bya/_bla na med pa zhes bya/_gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag 
[\[36a.3\]]thams cad ni bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid zhi bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir byed cing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i bar du yang bdag nyid 
[\[36a.4\]]dul bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid zhi bar bya ba dang /_bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni sems can thams cad dul bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[36a.5\]]cad zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 
[\[36a.6\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin 
[\[36a.7\]]pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dag dang /_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag dang /_ji srid du dam 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /_de dag gi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i 
[\[36b.2\]]bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par 
[\[36b.3\]]grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dag dang /_phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dag dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa/_grangs med pa gang yin pa dag dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[36b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa gang yin pa dag dang /_chos bstan pa de dag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rang byang chub thob pa'i bar dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa gang 
[\[36b.5\]]yin pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang 
[\[36b.6\]]zhing /_rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su 
[\[36b.7\]]yi rang nas/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par gyur cig ces/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]theg pa chen po pa gang yin pa des de skad du smras te/_sems kyis de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed na/_dmigs pa gang dang /_dngos po gang dag gis sems de bskyed pa'i dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar 
[\[37a.2\]]mtshan mar bzung ba de bzhin du yod cing dmigs pa zhig yin nam/_byams pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gyis dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag ni theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar bzung nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[37a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gal te dngos po med pa la dmigs pa med pa dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 
[\[37a.4\]]bzhugs pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/_de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dag dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa slob pa dang /_mi slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad 
[\[37a.5\]]mngon par bsdus te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med pa la bdag ces bya 
[\[37a.6\]]ba dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du de yang phyin ci log par mi 'gyur grang /_yang na dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa yang de kho na lta bu yin zhing /_byang chub 
[\[37a.7\]]kyang de kho na bzhin la sems kyang de kho na bzhin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de kho 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]na bzhin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang de bzhin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de kho na bzhin pa zhig yin la/_
[\[37b.2\]]de ltar gal te dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa yang de kho na bzhin te/_byang chub kyang de lta bu yin la/_sems kyang de bzhin/_gzugs kyang de bzhin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin/_mig kyang de bzhin/_rna ba 
[\[37b.3\]]dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang de bzhin/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub 
[\[37b.4\]]kyi yan lag dang /_lam yang de bzhin/_stobs bcu yang de bzhin/_mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang de bzhin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang de bzhin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de bzhin pa zhig yin na/_de la dngos po ni gang yin/_dmigs 
[\[37b.5\]]pa ni gang yin/_ting nge 'dzin ni gang yin/_sems ni gang yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang yin/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni gang yin/_byams pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[37b.6\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa yang yin la/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yang yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed skyed pa yang yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yang yin/_rang gi 
[\[37b.7\]]mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la slob slob pa yang yin ni/_de dag gis dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mtshan mar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar mi byed kyi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su sngo bar byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa 
[\[38a.2\]]med pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par byang ba'i tshul dang /_skye ba'i tshul dang /_'gag pa'i tshul gyis ni ma yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang ma bslabs/_sangs rgyas mang po la yang bsnyen 
[\[38a.3\]]bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang ma bskyed/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma zin/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la yang ma bslabs na/_de dag gis ni dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[38a.4\]]dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du 
[\[38a.5\]]yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[38a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i dad pa tsam dang /_dang ba tsam dang /_dga' ba tsam dang /_gus pa tsam yod pa gang yin pa de yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[38a.7\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du ni brjod par bya/_bstan par bya ste/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams kyi bar du yang bstan par bya'o/_/de ni de lta bu thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de dge ba'i 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]bshes gnyen gyis zin la sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa zhig yin na ni/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i 
[\[38b.2\]]bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byams pa sems gang gis rjes su 
[\[38b.3\]]yi rang nas yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i sems de ni zad cing 'gag la med de/_rnam par gyur pa yin la/_dngos po de dag dang /_dmigs pa de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de yang zad cing 'gag la 
[\[38b.4\]]med do/_/rnam par gyur pa yin na/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i sems de ni gang yin/_dngos po de dag ni gang yin/_dmigs pa de dag ni gang yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni gang yin/_
[\[38b.5\]]ci sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo'am/_gal te sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo na ni sems gnyis phrad par 'gyur ba med de/_sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/_/byams pas smras pa/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[38b.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin 
[\[38b.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa dang /_gzugs dngos po med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dngos po med pa dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med pa dang /_byang chub dngos po med par 'du shes na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes 
[\[39a.2\]]pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_gal te de ltar bsngos na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/_gnas brtan rab 
[\[39a.3\]]'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/_dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur grang /_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs 
[\[39a.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bzung ba yang /_ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[39a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byams pa gal te theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi 
[\[39a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[39a.7\]]spyod la/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod la/_stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod la/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod la/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun de dag kyang mi dmigs 
[\[39b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/_mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod la/_de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/_mtshan ma'i tshul 
[\[39b.3\]]gyis ma yin no/_/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang 
[\[39b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[39b.5\]]bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang bar 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du don dang 
[\[39b.6\]]bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas pa ston te/_ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bar dang 'bral bar mi 
[\[39b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bur yang ston to/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]bdud kyi las rnams kyang ston te/_des bdud kyi las de dag thos na 'grib par yang mi 'gyur 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bdud kyi las de dag rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 
[\[40a.2\]]zhugs kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa skyed par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[40a.3\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa gzhan yang theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rgyun bcad pa/_spros 
[\[40a.4\]]pa dang srid par khrid pa'i rgyun bcad pa/_tshig gi lam chad pa/_khur bor ba tsher ma bsal ba/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba bcad pa/_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[40a.5\]]khams dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang /_de dag la gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag dang /_
[\[40a.6\]]rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi bar dag gi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[40a.7\]]bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus nas/_gcig tu brtul cing gzhal te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/rjes su yi rang ba phul du byung ba dang /_gtso bo dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pas rjes su yi rang 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]nas/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byams pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[40b.2\]]pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bsams te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang la/_rjes su yi rang ba gong na med pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang zhing /_rjes su yi rang nas kyang bla na med pa 
[\[40b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log par ji ltar mi 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[40b.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la bsams te/_de la yang sangs rgyas su 'du shes par mi 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par mi 'gyur la/_sems gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de la yang sems 
[\[40b.5\]]su 'du shes par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bsngos na/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/_sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/_lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[40b.6\]]rtsa ba de dag la bsams shing mtshan mar 'dzin te/_mtshan mar bzung nas rjes su yi rang zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar byed na/_de ltar sngon ni 'du shes dang /_sems dang /_lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas sangs 
[\[40b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_sems gang gis bsams pa de dag de bzhin du zad pa la zad do zhes bya ba dang /_zad pa gang yin pa de yang yongs su sngo bar mi nus pa dang /_sems gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de yang de'i chos nyid yin 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]pa dang /_gang du yongs su bsngos pa de yang de'i chos nyid yin par de ltar shes te/_gal te de ltar bsngos na/_'thun par yongs su sngo ba yin te/_yang dag par yongs su sngo ba yin zhing mi 'thun par yongs su sngo ba ma yin la/_log par yongs su sngo ba ma 
[\[41a.2\]]yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[41a.3\]]pa dag dang chos bstan pa thos pa gang yin pa dag dang /_de dag la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[41a.4\]]rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis chos thos shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed pa dag dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[41a.5\]]yang sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdus nas/_gcig tu brtul cing gzhal te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba phul du byung ba dang /_gtso bo dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pas rjes su yi rang ba dang /_
[\[41a.6\]]rjes su yi rang ba mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/_gal te chos de dag ni zad pa dang /_'gag pa dang /_med pa dang /_
[\[41a.7\]]rnam par gyur pa yin la/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes de ltar yang dag par shes te/_gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo pa yin no/_/gal te chos rnams kyis chos rnams 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]yongs su sngo bar mi byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar de ltar yang dag par shes la gal te de ltar yongs su sngo na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[41b.2\]]sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_byang chub de dang /_sems de la mngon par zhen pa med cing /_gang du mngon par zhen pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na 
[\[41b.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du byed pa de/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyis dben par yang dag par shes shing /_shes 
[\[41b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par yang dag par shes/_bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par yang dag par shes/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis 
[\[41b.6\]]dben par yang dag par shes/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag gis dben par yang dag par shes/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag gis dben par yang 
[\[41b.7\]]dag par shes na/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/_
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag par shes shing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[42a.2\]]rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa yang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_yongs su sngo ba'i sems kyang yongs su sngo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_
[\[42a.3\]]byang chub kyang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang sbyin 
[\[42a.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_
[\[42a.5\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag par shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha 
[\[42a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa dben pa la de ltar spyod par bya ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[42a.7\]]dag yang dag par rjes su dran pas/_'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de ni yongs su sngo ba de ji lta ba de kho na bzhin te/_de'i rang bzhin can dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid yin par gal te de ltar yang dag par shes nas/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/_de ltar yongs su sngo ba ni 'du shes phyin ci log pa ma yin/_sems phyin ci log pa ma yin/_lta ba phyin ci log pa ma yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[42b.2\]]pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mtshan ma'i tshul gyis shes na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ma yin no/_/gal te 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[42b.3\]]yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag 'di ltar dran par byas shing /_mtshan mar 'dzin par byed na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin te/_de ltar na de ni 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /_sems phyin ci log pa dang /_lta ba phyin 
[\[42b.4\]]ci log pa yin no/_/gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang /_sems bskyed pa de dag shes par mi byed cing /_mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[42b.5\]]tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'du shes phyin ci log pa ma yin/_sems phyin ci log pa ma yin/_lta ba phyin ci log pa ma yin no/_/byams pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[42b.6\]]po mtshan mar yang mi 'dzin la/_yongs su sngo bar yang byed pa ji lta bu yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs la mkhas pa de dag bslabs pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[42b.7\]]chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mkhas par rig par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par ni bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar yang mi nus so/_/byams pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sangs 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang med pa yin na/_'di skyon du mi 'gyur ram/_
