[\[43a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni 'di ltar rnam par brtag par bya ste/_sku de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag ni 'gags pa yin na/_'on kyang mtshan mar bzung nas rnam par rtog par 
[\[43a.3\]]byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag dang /_sems bskyed pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/_rnam par rtog par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[43a.4\]]rgyas rnams kyis ni/_de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba la rjes su yi rang bar gnang bar mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag mtshan mar 'dzin cing rnam par brtags nas/_dmigs pa gang yin pa de 
[\[43a.5\]]nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo bar 'dod pas ni dmigs nas mtshan mar bzung ste/_yongs su bsngo bar mi bya'o/_/dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_mtshan ma'i 'du shes 
[\[43a.6\]]kyis yongs su sngo ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis don che bar ma gsungs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa/_zug rngu dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_kha zas 
[\[43a.7\]]bsod pa/_dug dang sbyar ba/_kha dog dang /_dri dang ldan pa de la byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mis bza' bar bsams nas/_des de za ba na kha dog dang dris kyang dga' bar byed la/_zhu ba'i tshe ni sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'di la kha cig log par 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]zin pa dang /_log par shes pa dang /_log par bslabs pas/_don ma rtogs te/_khong du ma chud par 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_
[\[43b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang /_ji srid du dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[43b.3\]]pa la spyad pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams 
[\[43b.4\]]dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang 
[\[43b.5\]]ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par 
[\[43b.6\]]mdzad cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs 
[\[43b.7\]]pa'i phung po gang yin pa dag dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /_de dag gi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gis de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang yin pa dag dang /_
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan pa gang yin pa dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag gi de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad 
[\[44a.2\]]yongs su bsdus nas gcig tu brtul cing gzhal te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces ston par byed de/_de ltar des yongs su bsngo ba mtshan ma'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos pa ni 'di lta ste/_kha zas dug can 
[\[44a.3\]]bzhin du dug nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dmigs par lta ba'i sngo ba ni sngo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dmigs pa de ni dug dang bcas pa/_mtshan ma dang bcas pa/_rgyu dang bcas pa/_rkyen dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar bsngos pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[44a.4\]]la skur pa btab pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin la chos smra ba yang ma yin no zhes brtag par bya'o/_/de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag gis ni 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_'das pa dang /_
[\[44a.5\]]ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la ji ltar rjes su yi rang nas/_yongs su bsngo bar bya/_thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 
[\[44a.6\]]'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang /_ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa'i bar dang /_
[\[44a.7\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i bar dag la ji ltar rjes su yi rang nas/_yongs su bsngo bar bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji ltar yongs su bsngos na/_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa gdab par mi 'dod pas ni/_'di skad du yongs su 
[\[44b.2\]]bsngo bar bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji ltar thugs su chud pa dang /_rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang /_mtshan nyid 
[\[44b.3\]]gang yin pa dang /_chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[44b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de ltar yongs su bsngos na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang skur pa btab par mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du 
[\[44b.5\]]smra ba dang /_chos smra bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa yin no zhes bslab par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha 
[\[44b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/_'di ltar gzugs ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[44b.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[45a.2\]]khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/_ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_
[\[45a.3\]]gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[45a.4\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa 
[\[45a.5\]]nyid dang /_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[45a.6\]]pa nyid dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/_ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar 
[\[45a.7\]]byung ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de ltar gtogs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang gtogs pa ma yin no/_/chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no/_/yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]yang gtogs pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang /_
[\[45b.2\]]gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/_ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no zhes yongs su bsngo bar bya/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[45b.3\]]spyod pas/_gal te 'di ltar shes te/_gzugs gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i 
[\[45b.4\]]khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/_ma gtogs 
[\[45b.5\]]pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la ni rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni 
[\[45b.6\]]dngos po med pa ste/_dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[45b.7\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]yang de bzhin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[46a.2\]]dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa yang de bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/_ma gtogs pa gang 
[\[46a.3\]]yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/gang 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni mtshan ma'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/_/
[\[46a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de la ni rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa yin la/_dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/zhes bya bar shes na/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba de dug med pa yin no/_/
[\[46a.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo bar byed pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag log par yongs su sngo ba yin te/_yang dag par yongs su sngo ba ma yin no/_/
[\[46a.6\]]log par yongs su sngo ba la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa mi mdzad do/_/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su sngo ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do/_/tshul 
[\[46a.7\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do/_/gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]byed pa de ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs 
[\[46b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi byed do/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin 
[\[46b.3\]]par mi byed pa de ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i sngo ba ni dug dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[46b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes thugs su chud pa de lta bur bdag gis kyang de ltar chos nyid des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo 
[\[46b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/snyam du brtag par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po 
[\[46b.6\]]mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /_'byung ba med pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[46b.7\]]tshul dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis bstan pa ni legs so/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams na/_sems can 'khod pa 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]de dag thams cad kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams thob par gyur cing /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes ba lnga thob par gyur na/_rab 'byor 'di ji 
[\[47a.2\]]snyam du sems/_sems can de dag gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na rigs 
[\[47a.3\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gos pa med pas yongs su bsngos na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu de ni mchog ces bya/_phul du byung ba zhes bya/_gtso 
[\[47a.4\]]bo zhes bya/_rab ces bya/_rab mchog ces bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya/_bla na med pa zhes bya/_gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur 
[\[47a.5\]]tam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom par gyur nas dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman 
[\[47a.6\]]dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las ches bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[47a.7\]]mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngos na/_de ches bsod nams mang 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]du skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur nas/_de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha 
[\[47b.2\]]dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed snyam 'am/_rab 'byor 
[\[47b.3\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas ni/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gos pa med pa'i yongs su 
[\[47b.4\]]bsngo bas yongs su bsngos na/_de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[47b.5\]]par gyur la/_der byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re la yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha 
[\[47b.6\]]dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byed de/_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams dang /_steng 
[\[47b.7\]]dang /_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag las/_byang chub sems dpa' re re la yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gos dang /_zas dang /_mal 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[48a.2\]]mo de dag ches bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/_dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis/_tshad ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams 
[\[48a.3\]]bgyi ba'i dngos po de la ni dpe bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang mi shong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol 
[\[48a.4\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor gang khyod kyis de skad smras pa ni legs so/_/rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[48a.5\]]gos pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa de/_ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya/_phul du 
[\[48a.6\]]byung ba zhes bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_rab ces bya/_rab mchog ces bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya/_bla na med pa zhes bya/_gong na med pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor gos pa med pas bsngo ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la ni bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar 
[\[48a.7\]]mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag dmigs 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa'i 'du shes dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[48b.2\]]kyi bu mo de dag ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan zhing /_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byed la/_
[\[48b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi nang nas/_lha'i bu nyi khri thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[48b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas gos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[48b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_ji ltar gnyis dang /_gnyis su ma mchis par yang khas mi len pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar bgyid pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu/_lha'i 
[\[48b.6\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag khyer te/_lha'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas tshig 
[\[48b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa 'dis dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_gos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_ji ltar gnyis dang /_gnyis su ma mchis par yang khas mi len pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyis pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags so/_/de nas tshangs rigs kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 
[\[49a.2\]]phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dag gong du smos pa'i 
[\[49a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis gnon pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs su brjod do/_/de bzhin du tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_
[\[49a.4\]]tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_gya nom snang dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_
[\[49a.5\]]'og min gyi lha rnams kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[49a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dag gong du smos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa la spyod pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis gnon pa ni ngo mtshar lags so 
[\[49a.7\]]zhes sgra brjod pa byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bu'i bar dag la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur la/_de dag thams cad kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[49b.2\]]rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_nyan thos de dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /_de dag las gzhan pa sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[49b.3\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[49b.4\]]ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang /_de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/_rigs kyi 
[\[49b.5\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/_des 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa rnams kyi thugs dang po 
[\[49b.6\]]bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus nas/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_gnyis su med 
[\[49b.7\]]pa'i tshul dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /_gos pa med pa'i tshul dang /_byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su yi rang ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed nas 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/_snga ma'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag pas ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/_snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/byang 
[\[50a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ces bya ba nas/_gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i 
[\[50a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi phung po gcig tu brtul nas rjes su yi rang ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang ba gong na med pa'i bar dag gis rjes su yi rang bar byed pa zhes bka' stsal pa de la/_
[\[50a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dang /_rjes su yi rang ba gong na ma mchis pa'i bar du ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang gi tshe/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin 
[\[50a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams dang /_de dag gi rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi 'dzin mi 'dor la/_rlom sems su mi byed cing brnyas par yang mi byed la/_mi dmigs 
[\[50a.6\]]shing de 'di snyam du 'di la chos 'ga' yang skye ba med/_'gag pa med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med/_rnam par byang ba med la/_chos de dag ni 'grib pa yang med/_'phel ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med/_'gro ba yang med/_phung por gyur pa yang med do snyam du 
[\[50a.7\]]sems shing /_rnam grangs des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag rjes su 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba mchog tu 'gyur ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba gong na med pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[50b.2\]]rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad ni rjes su yi rang ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog ces bya ba nas/_gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[50b.3\]]bar du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[50b.4\]]bcas pa/_rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[50b.5\]]bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i bar dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa des ni/_'di ltar rjes 
[\[50b.6\]]su yi rang bar bya ste/_rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/_sbyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[50b.7\]]du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[51a.2\]]pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa yang de bzhin no/_/rjes su yi rang ba yang de bzhin no/_/rnam 
[\[51a.3\]]par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51a.4\]]de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyang 
[\[51a.5\]]de bzhin no/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba 
[\[51a.6\]]bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin no zhes rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bcings pa med pa dang /_grol ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[51a.7\]]med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i chos de dag gi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa dang /_skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin te/_'pho ba med pa dang /_rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de ltar 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba mchog yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi rang ba de dang ldan pa ni myur du bla 
[\[51b.2\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[51b.3\]]bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa gang yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
[\[51b.4\]]du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la nyin 
[\[51b.5\]]mtshan du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya bar spro ba skyed pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[51b.6\]]la gnas te/_de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa dang /_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom ste/_de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na 
[\[51b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la ni/_snga ma'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pas/_brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang mi 
[\[52a.2\]]bzod do/_/yongs su bsngo ba de ni mchog ces bya ba nas/_gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[52a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las rjes su yi rang ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[52a.4\]]pa'o//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[52a.5\]]dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal la lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum thams 
[\[52a.6\]]cad kyis ma gos pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du/_rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[52a.7\]]rnams kyi mchog tu bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang /_khon dang /_gnod pa thams cad spangs pa'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can rnams kyi mig lnga yongs 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]su 'dzin pa'i slad du gsal bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can shul ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par spong ba'i slad du shul ston par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags dang /_
[\[52b.2\]]mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed par bgyid pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma 
[\[52b.3\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i 
[\[52b.4\]]gnyen po lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad stsal ba'i slad du sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi thul ba'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa lags/_bcom 
[\[52b.5\]]ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skor ba ma mchis pa dang /_ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lan gsum du bzlas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su skor bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[52b.6\]]kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston par bgyid pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ji ltar ston pa la gnas par bya ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[52b.7\]]ji ltar ston pa la phyag bya ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyang ston pa las gzhan ma yin la/_ston pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa yin la/_
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rab tu phye ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_
[\[53a.2\]]dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med 
[\[53a.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[53a.4\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems 
[\[53a.5\]]te/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i zhu ba 'di ni ci las byung gleng gzhi ni gang yin snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gang khyod 'di snyam 
[\[53a.6\]]du/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i zhu ba 'di ni ci las byung /_gleng gzhi ni gang yin du rnam par rtog pa ni/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[53a.7\]]byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/_dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do snyam nas/_bdag gi zhu ba byung ngo /_/kau shi ka byang chub 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon par byed pa 
[\[53b.2\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_dmus long rnams ni brgya'am/_stong ngam/_'bum yang rung ste/_dmigs bu med na lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/_grong khyer du phyin par lta ga la nus/_kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dmus long lta bur gyur pa 'di 
[\[53b.3\]]dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dmigs bu med na/_byang chub kyi lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par lta ga la nus/_kau shi ka gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[53b.4\]]phyin pas yongs su bzung na/_de'i tshe mig dang ldan pas/_pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/_pha rol 
[\[53b.5\]]tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo zhes zer na/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'o na/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob ba bam/_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[53b.6\]]tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bam/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ni de lta ma yin te/_kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas ni/_pha rol 
[\[53b.7\]]tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bo/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas kyang /_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bo/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gi mchog ces bya'o/_/phul dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[54a.2\]]'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[54a.3\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab 
[\[54a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[54a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes 
[\[54a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[54a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_de ltar chos de dag thams cad mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol ba/_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs mngon par bsgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad kyi bar dag mngon par bsgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub 
[\[54b.2\]]par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[54b.3\]]chos thams cad kyi bar dag mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bar bya'o/_shA ri'i bus gsol ba/_bcom 
[\[54b.4\]]ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub na/_chos gang zhig thob par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub na/_chos gang yang thob par mi byed de/_
[\[54b.5\]]gang gi phyir chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa de'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang dag thob par mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bus dge ba'i chos 
[\[54b.6\]]rnams thob par mi byed do/_/mi dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa 
[\[54b.7\]]dang /_/'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/_/'khor ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/_des na chos gang yang thob par mi byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha 
[\[55a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid pa 
[\[55a.3\]]lags sam zhes zer ba ni/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang thob par mi byed/_dmigs par mi byed pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed do/_/dmigs par mi byed do/_/brgya byin gyis 
[\[55a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid cing dmigs par mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ming ji lta ba dang /_mtshan ma ji lta ba 
[\[55a.5\]]dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta ba de ltar thob par mi byed pa yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka ci nas kyang mi dmigs pa dang /_khas mi len pa dang /_mi 
[\[55a.6\]]gnas pa dang /_mi 'dor ba dang /_mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_mi 'dzin pa dang /_mi gtong ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_chos gang yang thob par byed pa med do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[55a.7\]]ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /_dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ni ngo 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]mtshar lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par bgyid pa'o/_/
[\[55b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa'o zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong bar bgyid pa lags so/_/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[55b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod de/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[55b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsog go/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob dang /_snying po med pa dang /_ya ma brla'o/_/zhes bya bar de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[55b.5\]]chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong bar byed pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glo ba ches pas/_
[\[55b.6\]]chos gang dag la glo ba ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_gzugs la yid mi ches so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yid mi 
[\[55b.7\]]ches so/_/mig la yid mi ches so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la yid mi ches so/_/gzugs la yid mi ches so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams la yid mi ches so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches so/_/tshul 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches so/_/nang stong pa nyid la yid mi ches so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yid mi ches so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[56a.2\]]sum cu rtsa bdun la yid mi ches so/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yid mi ches so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yid mi ches so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[56a.3\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid la yid mi ches so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yid mi ches so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[56a.4\]]yid mi ches so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glo ba ches pas/_gzugs la glo ba mi ches pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yang glo ba mi ches pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[56a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/_
[\[56a.6\]]gzugs la yid mi ches pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yang yid mi ches pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[56a.7\]]rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di che ba yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_tshor ba 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/_
[\[56b.2\]]chung bar mi bgyid/_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_nang stong pa nyid che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag 
[\[56b.3\]]che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams che bar mi 
[\[56b.4\]]bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_byang chub che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid/_sangs rgyas che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid pa lags so/_/gzugs sdud par mi bgyid/_'phro bar mi bgyid/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[56b.5\]]shes pa sdud par mi bgyid/_'phro bar mi bgyid/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang sdud par mi bgyid/_'phro bar mi bgyid pa lags so/_/gzugs tshad mchis par mi bgyid/_tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[56b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par mi bgyid/_tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang tshad mchis par mi bgyid/_tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags so/_/gzugs yangs par mi bgyid/_dog par mi bgyid/_tshor ba 
[\[56b.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yangs par mi bgyid/_dog par mi bgyid/_byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang yangs par mi bgyid/_dog par mi bgyid pa lags so/_/gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/_stobs chung 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]bar mi bgyid/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/_stobs chung bar mi bgyid/_byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/_stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa lags te/_
[\[57a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[57a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas 'di snyam du shes rab kyi 
[\[57a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du che bar mi bgyid/_chung bar mi bgyid pa'o/_/gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/_stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa'o zhes bgyi ba'i bar du 'du shes par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du 
[\[57a.5\]]shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang gzugs che ba'am/_chung bar bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang che ba'am/_chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes 
[\[57a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma lags la gang gzugs stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/_stobs chung bar bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'am/_stobs chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma lags pa'i slad 
[\[57a.7\]]du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/'di ltar sems can skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/gzugs 
[\[57b.2\]]ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab 
[\[57b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_
[\[57b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can stong pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par 
[\[57b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/gzugs stong pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du stong 
[\[57b.6\]]pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du sems can mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/gzugs 
[\[57b.7\]]mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_smon 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma 
[\[58a.2\]]ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du sems can dben pa dang /_sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi 
[\[58a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can rnam par bshig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bshig pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes 
[\[58a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/gzugs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[58a.5\]]du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar du mngon 
[\[58a.6\]]par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/sems can stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o/_/gzugs 
[\[58a.7\]]stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o/_/
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des kyang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[58b.2\]]che ba lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mngon par bsgrub pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[58b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir mchis pa lags/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la don dang /_tshul las mos pa de bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[58b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yang dag par zhugs nas ni ji srid cig lags/_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la ni bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags/_des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/_des tshul 
[\[58b.5\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[58b.6\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[58b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med tshad med pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/de ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing tshul khrims dang /_
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas/_'dir skyes pa yin no/_/de ni de tshun chad nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med dpag tu med/_
[\[59a.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing 'dir 'ongs pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ngam/_thos na yang 'di snyam du bdag gis ston pa mthong ngo snyam pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[59a.3\]]bdag gis ston pa thos so snyam pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_gnyis su med pa dang dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang tshul khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[59a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blta ba'am/_mnyan par nus lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_rab 'byor chos bems po nyid kyi 
[\[59a.5\]]phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lta ba po dang /_nyan pa po ni med pas na/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mthong mi thos so/_/de bzhin du chos bem po nyid kyi phyir/_bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[59a.6\]]tu phyin pa mi mthong mi thos so/_/chos bems po nyid kyi phyir des nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag mi mthong mi thos so/_/de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi mthong mi thos so/_/chos bems po nyid 
[\[59a.7\]]kyi phyir/_yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam mi mthong mi thos so/_/chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi mthong mi thos so/_/chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub mi mthong mi thos so/_/sangs rgyas mi mthong mi thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[59b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa des yun ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni rnam par dbye zhing 
[\[59b.3\]]bshad dgos te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed phyin chad nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed cing /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[59b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed de/_de yang thabs la mkhas pas rnal 'byor du byed cing chos 'ga' yang spong bar mi byed la/_ji ltar 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi mthong bas na nam du yang pha rol tu 
[\[59b.5\]]phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la mchod pa'i khyad par gang dag gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa'i mchod 
[\[59b.6\]]pa'i khyad par de dag des sems bskyed ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/_/nam du yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa gang dang 
[\[59b.7\]]yang 'grogs par mi 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi sems dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang yang 'grogs par mi 'gyur zhing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]du 'gro ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/_sangs rgyas brgya phrag 
[\[60a.2\]]mang po dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po dag mthong bar gyur la/_de dag gi drung na slob pa'i tshe/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[60a.3\]]dang /_shes rab bsgoms pa dag yod de/_de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na gus pa med pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[60a.4\]]'das de dag gi drung nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa de dag ni 'di nyid du yang 'dus te/_gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na 'gro bar byed pa dag yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[60a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa na phyir song bar gyur la/_da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na yang de dag phyir 'gro bar byed cing /_lus dang sems kyi tshogs par mi byed pas/_de dag shes rab 
[\[60a.6\]]'chal par 'gyur ba'i las sogs par 'gyur te/_de dag gis shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pas/_'das 
[\[60a.7\]]pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang spangs par 'gyur la/_de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba byas shing bsags pa de dang /_chos kyis phongs 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo 'bum phrag mang po dang /_lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su sreg par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba 
[\[60b.2\]]chen po rnams nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ba na/_mes 'jig pa'am/_chus 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis 'jig pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[60b.3\]]te/_de dag der 'jig pa dag byung ba na/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams gang yin pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro/_/de dag der skyes nas kyang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro 
[\[60b.4\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ste/_yang 'jig pa byung ba na de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro/_/de dag tu yang gang gi tshe 'jig 
[\[60b.5\]]pa byung ba na de dag shar phyogs su 'phen par 'gyur/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'phen par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang 'jig pa byung na/_de dag 'jig 
[\[60b.6\]]rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'phen par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang 'jig pa byung ba na/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las ma zad pas/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas/_yang 'di nyid du skye 
[\[60b.7\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de rnams su skyes pa na yang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_ji srid 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]du 'jig pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de srid du/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig pa byung ba na yang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[61a.2\]]de bzhin du yang nas yang du phyogs bcu kun gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dang yang du phyogs bcu kun gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag tu skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag myong bas/_las zad par byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[61a.3\]]de dag gis sdug bsngal mang po de dag myong bas/_las zad par byas nas/_ji ste brgya la mir skye ba 'thob par 'gyur na yang chos kyis phongs bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de nyid kyis de dag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der dmus long gi khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[61a.4\]]gdol pa'i khyim rnams sam/_g.yung po'i khyim rnams sam/_ma rabs kyi khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag tu skyes na yang long ba rnams su 'gyur ba'am/_zhar ba rnams sam/_lce med pa rnams sam/_lag pa med pa rnams sam/_rkang pa med pa rnams sam/_
[\[61a.5\]]rna ba med pa rnams sam/_sna med pa rnams sam/_gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[61a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag ni/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du yang mi mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[61a.7\]]shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na zlog par sems shing /_de dag 'di skad du 'di ni chos ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/_'di ni ston pa'i bka' ma yin/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs/_mi gsung gsung bar mi 'gyur ba yin gyis/_'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer zhing /_de bdag gis kyang bzlog par bya'o snyam du sems la/_sems can gzhan dag kyang 'bral bar 'gyur bar byed/_de rang 
[\[61b.2\]]gi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod pa byas nas/_gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod pa bya bar sems/_de rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byas nas/_gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byed par 'gyur/_de bdag kyang chud gzon cing gzhan 
[\[61b.3\]]yang chud gzon par 'dod/_de bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma rtogs shing mi shes pas zlog par sems la gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur bar byed pas na/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du yang mi 'ong ngo zhes 
[\[61b.4\]]brjod par bya ste/_shA ri'i bu ngas ni gang zag de lta bu dag thos par bya bar yang ma gnang na/_blta ba lta ci smos te gnas su lta ga la rung /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni chos sun 'byin pa yin par rig par bya zhing /_shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni 
[\[61b.5\]]shing rul pa lta bu dang nag po'i rang bzhin can yin par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang dag gang zag de lta bu de dag la dad cing mnyan par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sun 'byin 
[\[61b.6\]]pa'i gang zag de ni chos sun 'byin par byed par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad ni bka' ma stsal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[61b.7\]]bu chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad ni zhog shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad thos na/_ci tsam du chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus thob pa'i tshad de ni de 'dra ste/_de la de 'dra ba'i skyon de 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]yod do zhes kha nas khrag dron po skyug par 'gyur ba'am/_'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba'am/_thos na mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'am/_'dam bu sngon po brngas pa ltar skam zhing rnyis par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes 
[\[62a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/_de'i lus kyi tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes skabs dbye ba ma mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de/_chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang 
[\[62a.3\]]zag rnams de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes/_slad ma'i skye bo rnams la snang ba bgyid par 'gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rdzogs par 
[\[62a.4\]]byas shing bsags pa des/_de srid du sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing /_sdug bsngal de'i tshad med de/_mang ba dang yun de srid du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba de nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snang ba byas par 'gyur ba yin no/_/
[\[62a.5\]]shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyis dkar po'i rang bzhin can gyi rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las de dag las ldog par 'gyur te/_bdag cag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang 'phrad du 'ong ngo zhes de dag srog gi slad du yang 
[\[62a.6\]]dam pa'i chos spong bar mi bgyid lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos spong ba'i ngag gi las bgyis shing bsags pa des ni/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyid cing sogs 
[\[62a.7\]]par 'gyur bas/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bdag cag sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang 'phrad dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngam/_chos mi thos sam/_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur mi byed dam/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]rnams su skye ba 'am/_mi dbul po rnams su skye ba 'am/_tshig gzung bar mi 'os par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes/_lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnams legs par bsdam par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mi blun po gang dag 
[\[62b.2\]]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sun dbyung bar bya'o/_/snyam du sems pa de dag ni dag gis las byas shing bsags pa des/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byed cing sogs par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[62b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sun dbyung ba byas shing /_bzlog pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la sun dbyung bar byas shing bzlog pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la sun dbyung bar byas shing bzlog pas ni/_'das pa dang /_
[\[62b.4\]]ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sun 'byung bar byas shing bzlog pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sun dbyung ba byas shing bzlog pas ni/_chos bzlog pa yin no/_/chos bzlog pas 
[\[62b.5\]]ni dge 'dun bzlog pa yin no/_/dge 'dun bzlog pas ni 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bzlog pa yin no/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu 
[\[62b.6\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag bzlog pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzlog pas bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med/_grangs 
[\[62b.7\]]med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po yongs su bzung ba des/_sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi blun po gang dag 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zlog par bgyid pa de dag rnam pa du zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zlog par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mi blun po de dag ni rnam pa bzhis shes rab 
[\[63a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zlog par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi blun po de dag bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_chos zab mo rnams la mos pa med cing /_dad pa ma rnyed pa dang /_de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas/_phung po lnga la mngon 
[\[63a.3\]]par zhen par 'gyur ba dang /_mi blun po de dag nyes pa spyod cing /_bdag la stod pa dang /_gzhan la smod pa yin te/_rab 'byor mi blun po de dag ni rnam pa de bzhi dang ldan pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zlog par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[63a.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa dag gis mos par dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/
