[\[63a.5\]]de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa rnams dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang de 
[\[63a.6\]]ltar mos par dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ci tsam du zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[63a.7\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[63b.2\]]tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni 
[\[63b.3\]]ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nang stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_nang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[63b.4\]]nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[63b.5\]]rnams yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lam dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni lam 
[\[63b.6\]]yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams 
[\[63b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_rnam pa 
[\[64a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[64a.3\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzugs da ltar 
[\[64a.4\]]byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[64a.5\]]bar da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson 
[\[64a.6\]]pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa rnams dang /_bdud kyi dbang du mchis pa rnams dang /_le lo can rnams dang /_brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams dang /_bskyung ngas pa rnams dang /_shes bzhin can ma 
[\[64a.7\]]lags pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba lags so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang /_shes bzhin can ma yin pa'i bar dag gis mos 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]par dka' ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do/_/rnam pa 
[\[64b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag 
[\[64b.3\]]pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[64b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[64b.5\]]nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni gnyis su med de/_gnyis su 
[\[64b.6\]]dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[64b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/_gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin 
[\[65a.2\]]pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/_/gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/_bdag rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na bdag rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/sems can dang /_
[\[65a.3\]]srog dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis 
[\[65a.4\]]su med de/_gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs rnam par 
[\[65a.5\]]dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/_gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/de bzhin du zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnam par dag pas/_gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[65a.6\]]bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/_gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[65a.7\]]yang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnam par dag pas/_gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/_gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing /_tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ma rig pa rnam par dag pas/_'du byed rnam par dag pa'o/_/'du byed rnam par dag pas/_rnam par shes pa rnam 
[\[65b.2\]]par dag pa'o/_/de bzhin du ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/_/skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'o/_/reg pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshor ba rnam par dag pa'o/_/sred pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/len pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/srid pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/skye ba rnam par dag pa'o/_/skye 
[\[65b.3\]]ba rnam par dag pas/_rga shi rnam par dag pa'o/_/rga shi rnam par dag pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/_
[\[65b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/bsam gtan 
[\[65b.5\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/_nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par 
[\[65b.6\]]dag pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[65b.7\]]dang /_lam rnam par dag pa'o/_/lam rnam par dag pas/_thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/_/thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas/_stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'o/_/stobs bcu rnam par dag pas/_mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa rnam 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]par dag pas/_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[66a.2\]]rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/_/gzugs 
[\[66a.3\]]rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de 
[\[66a.4\]]gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 
[\[66a.5\]]dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/_/gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[66a.6\]]rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[66a.7\]]pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/_/stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so 
[\[66b.2\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas/_'dus ma byas 
[\[66b.3\]]rnam par dag pa'o/_/'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang /_'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su 
[\[66b.4\]]med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas/_ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/_'das pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas/_'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[66b.5\]]'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/_da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste/_de ltar na 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha 
[\[66b.6\]]mi dad de gcad du med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag 
[\[66b.7\]]pa 'di ni zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab bo/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_
[\[67a.2\]]nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_
[\[67a.3\]]chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa 
[\[67a.4\]]yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/yang dag 
[\[67a.5\]]par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[67a.6\]]pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/byang chub shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni snang ba lags so/_/
[\[67a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba 
[\[67b.2\]]yin no/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/sa'i khams dang /_
[\[67b.3\]]chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/
[\[67b.4\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/dngos po med 
[\[67b.5\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang 
[\[67b.6\]]chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin 
[\[67b.7\]]no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni/_nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pas/_rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs 'pho ba med pas/_nying mtshams 
[\[68a.2\]]sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pas/_nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags 
[\[68a.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[68a.4\]]gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa 
[\[68a.5\]]ni thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 
[\[68a.6\]]rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs la thob pa med pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thob pa med pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam 
[\[68a.7\]]par dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma grub pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang mngon 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/_/
[\[68b.2\]]shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i 
[\[68b.3\]]khams su mi skye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs kyi khams su mi skye lags so/_/
[\[68b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi khams kyi 
[\[68b.5\]]rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA 
[\[68b.6\]]ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/_/shA ri'i 
[\[68b.7\]]bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis pa 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos bems po nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pa ni shes pa med pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[69a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas 
[\[69a.3\]]gzugs mi shes so/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rnam par dag pa ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag 
[\[69a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 
[\[69a.5\]]rnam par dag pas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi shes so/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu/_shin tu rnam 
[\[69a.6\]]par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi 
[\[69a.7\]]shes so/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi bgyid/_gnod par mi bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi bgyid/_gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi 
[\[69b.2\]]phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi byed/_gnod par yang mi byed do/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags 
[\[69b.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[69b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[69b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_bdag rnam par dag pas/_gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag med 
[\[69b.6\]]pa'i phyir gzugs med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[69b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_
[\[70a.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[70a.3\]]bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams 
[\[70a.4\]]rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[70a.5\]]'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa lags/_
[\[70a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags so/_/
[\[70a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_bdag rnam par dag pas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang /_bdag rnam par dag pas/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang 
[\[70b.2\]]chub rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[70b.3\]]rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/_byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[70b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par 
[\[70b.5\]]dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes pa ma rnyed ma stor ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis shing /_rnam par dag pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[70b.6\]]mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing /_rnam par dag pa thob pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa 
[\[70b.7\]]ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs mu ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/_gzugs mu ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mtha' 
[\[71a.2\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[71a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[71a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[71a.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_
[\[71a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/_pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/_gnyig 
[\[71a.7\]]ma mchis pa la yang mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshu 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]rol gyi 'gram 'am/_pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/_gnyi ga ma mchis pa la yang mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[71b.2\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'di ltar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du shes su bgyid na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu bgyid pa lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[71b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ming du yang chags/_mtshan mar yang chags te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[71b.4\]]ji ltar na ming du yang chags pa lags/_mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du yang 'dzin par byed/_mtshan mar yang 'dzin 
[\[71b.5\]]par byed cing /_ming dang mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su byed de/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su byed pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[71b.6\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang /_chags pa dang /_ma chags pa 'di dag legs par bshad cing shin tu mthar gtugs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad 
[\[71b.7\]]ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni gang yin/_ma chags pa ni gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/khams rnams 
[\[72a.2\]]dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la yang de bzhin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[72a.3\]]phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam 
[\[72a.4\]]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[72a.5\]]theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la/_
[\[72a.6\]]da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no/_/tshul khrims 
[\[72a.7\]]dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]rnams la spyod na chags pa yin no/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa yin no/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du byang 
[\[72b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du 
[\[72b.3\]]gzugs kyis gzugs kun tu mi shes so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa kun tu mi shes so/_/'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'das pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyis ma 'ongs 
[\[72b.4\]]pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/_/da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so snyam du mi sems so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_
[\[72b.5\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[72b.6\]]med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[72b.7\]]kyi phyir 'di snyam du/_bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/'di la sbyin par bya'o/_/'di sbyin par bya'o zhe'am/_de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab bsgom par bya'o/_/shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]shes rab 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gis bsod nams spel bar byed pa'o/_/bsod nams 'di spel bar bya'o/_/bsod nams 'di ltar spel bar bya'o zhe'am/_bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[73a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o/_/bdag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'o snyam du mi sems te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la 
[\[73a.3\]]mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la ni de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang 
[\[73a.4\]]po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags par 'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpas sems su kun tu shes pa dang /_
[\[73a.5\]]sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab tu kun tu shes pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu shes pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[73a.6\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun tu shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su kun tu shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun tu shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par 
[\[73a.7\]]bsdus te/_brtul cing gzhal nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/_de ni chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/_kau shi ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus shing /_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yang yongs su bsdo 
[\[73b.2\]]bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan dag la ston par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i 
[\[73b.3\]]yid kyis yang dag par bstan par bya/_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ci nas kyang bdag ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o/_/bdag ni tshul 
[\[73b.4\]]khrims srung ba'o/_/bdag ni bzod pa sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/_/bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod 
[\[73b.5\]]pa'o/_/bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par ston 
[\[73b.6\]]pa dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs stod pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa de ni/_bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/_de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[73b.7\]]sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de ltar chags pa'i mtha' 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]thams cad yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i mtha' de dag bstan pa legs so legs so/_/
[\[74a.2\]]rab 'byor chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par byas/_de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom 
[\[74a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar yid 
[\[74a.4\]]la byed na/_rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_phung 
[\[74a.5\]]po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing /_yid la byas nas kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[74a.6\]]byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang /_de las gzhan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[74a.7\]]dag kyang mtshan mar yid la byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]la/_de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[74b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[74b.3\]]'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par dka' 
[\[74b.4\]]ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/_gcig tu zad do/_/rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no/_/gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o/_/
[\[74b.5\]]gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang bzhin gcig pa dang /_rang bzhin ma yin pa dang /_ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su 
[\[74b.6\]]spangs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos shing bye brag ma phyed 
[\[74b.7\]]de/_rnam par ma shes la mngon par rdzogs par khong du ma chud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang mi shes pa ste gzugs kyis mi shes so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas mi shes so/_/khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyis mi shes so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[75a.2\]]rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mi shes so/_/stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mi shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[75a.3\]]pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_chos thams cad rnam par dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid 
[\[75a.4\]]pa po ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad dmigs su med par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha 
[\[75a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin 
[\[75a.6\]]no/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 
[\[75a.7\]]dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la mi spyod 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag 
[\[75b.2\]]med ces bya ba dang /_sdug ces bya ba dang /_mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du gal te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[75b.3\]]phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_sdug ces bya ba dang /_mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang rtag pa 
[\[75b.4\]]'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag gam/_bdag med pa'am/_sdug pa'am/_mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med la/_gang rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag gam/_bdag med pa'am/_
[\[75b.5\]]sdug pa'am/_mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang med cing /_de bzhin du gang rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag gam/_bdag med pa'am/_sdug pa'am/_mi sdug par 
[\[75b.6\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar 
[\[75b.7\]]mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang 
[\[76a.2\]]yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes 
[\[76a.3\]]pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing /_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no zhes bya 
[\[76a.4\]]ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chags pa dang /_chags pa ma mchis pa gang 
[\[76a.5\]]lags pa de dag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[76a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang /_ma chags pa dag legs par bshad do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[76a.7\]]gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[76b.2\]]pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[76b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes 
[\[76b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya 
[\[76b.5\]]bar 'du shes pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_
[\[76b.6\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[76b.7\]]ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bstan pa zab mo 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis la/_ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]no/_/de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bshad kyang 'phel ba med la ma bshad kyang 'grib pa med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 
[\[77a.2\]]bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa dang /_bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur kyang /_nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/_bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/_nam mkha' la ni bsngags kyang 'phel ba med la/_ma bsngags 
[\[77a.3\]]kyang 'grib pa med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/_bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/_bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags pa med bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khro ba med 
[\[77a.4\]]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bshad kyang de bzhin la/_ma bshad kyang de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[77a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ni zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang slar mi ldog pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[77a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de ni nam mkha' sgom pa lags te/_nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[77a.7\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid kyang ma 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]mchis/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams kyang ma 
[\[77b.2\]]mchis/_nam mkha' la ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang ma mchis/_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[77b.3\]]'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems 
[\[77b.4\]]can rnams kyi slad du/_go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang /_'bad par 'tshal ba dang /_rtsol bar 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal 
[\[77b.5\]]ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis nam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du/_go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/_go 
[\[77b.6\]]cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[77b.7\]]bar 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te/_stong 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis/_'di lta ste dper bgyi na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/_til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing /_de 
[\[78a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang /_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la ni 'grib 
[\[78a.3\]]pa'am 'phel bar mi mngon pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang /_sems can dben pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 
[\[78a.4\]]'di lta ste dper bgyi na/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/_til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing bzhugs la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par chos 
[\[78a.5\]]bshad par gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang /_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la ni 'grib pa'am 'phel bar mi mngon lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[78a.6\]]ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang /_sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_bdag gis 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[78a.7\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te 'di lta ste/_chos gang yang skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/_shes rab kyi phung 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_
[\[78b.2\]]rang byang chub kyang yod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/_dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yang yod/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag 
[\[78b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/_
[\[78b.4\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[78b.5\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba ji lta bu zhig 
[\[78b.6\]]bgyi lags/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya ba'i chos de 
[\[78b.7\]]ni kho bos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na 'di nyid de la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par 'gyur ro/_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral na/_de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gang zhig bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba 
[\[79a.2\]]bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar sems pa yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dag bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus snyam 'am/_brgya 
[\[79a.3\]]byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di 
[\[79a.4\]]ltar mi 'grub pa dang /_ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dag bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun 
[\[79a.5\]]pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang /_ngal 
[\[79a.6\]]ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de 
[\[79a.7\]]ni mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang /_ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_ji tsam gyis na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong 
[\[79b.2\]]khyer lta bu dang /_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing /_de ltar yongs su shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi 
[\[79b.3\]]lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka byang 
[\[79b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/_gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/_rmi lam 
[\[79b.5\]]du rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[79b.6\]]sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam 
[\[79b.7\]]par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/_rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyi mtshan mar 
[\[80a.2\]]yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi 
[\[80a.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_gnas 
[\[80a.4\]]gtsang ma'i rigs kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon par 'thor zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[80a.5\]]te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/_shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang /_ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing /_
[\[80a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsams par 
[\[80a.7\]]gyur to/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs mtshams kun na yang sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa de dag nyid dang ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]tu phyin pa 'di dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsams par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[80b.2\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin 
[\[80b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[80b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_rnam pa gang dag dang rtags gang dag dang mtshan 
[\[80b.5\]]ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs 
[\[80b.6\]]rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs bcings 
[\[80b.7\]]zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[81a.2\]]byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa dang /_
[\[81a.3\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang /_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[81a.4\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes 
[\[81a.5\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu 
[\[81a.6\]]rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes 
[\[81a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad pa mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[81b.2\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom 
[\[81b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba 
[\[81b.4\]]med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 
[\[81b.5\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' 
[\[81b.6\]]yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' ni skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa 
[\[81b.7\]]ste/_rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab 
[\[82a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[82a.3\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du/_rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin 
[\[82a.4\]]no/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_
[\[82a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/_de ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_shes 
[\[82a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' 
[\[82a.7\]]la ni ci yang dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_skye ba med pa 
[\[82b.2\]]dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_skye 
[\[82b.3\]]ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_gang dmigs su med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag 
[\[82b.4\]]pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_dmigs su ma mchis pa dang /_skye ba ma 
[\[82b.5\]]mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[82b.6\]]phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[82b.7\]]bgyid pa de la ni mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/rna ba'i nad dang /_sna'i nad dang /_lce'i nad dang /_lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/lus ngal bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de'i slad bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams 
[\[83a.2\]]kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang na dam pa'i chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa der lha'i tshogs mang po dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur lags so/_rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[83a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/_bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du ma mchis pa dag skyed par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[83a.4\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar byed pa de ni bsod nams dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa 
[\[83a.5\]]dag skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten na sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur 
[\[83a.6\]]ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mi dbul po las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 
[\[83a.7\]]su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin no/_/lan cig phyir 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher 
[\[83b.2\]]bstan te/_de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab
