[\[83b.3\]]bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas 
[\[83b.4\]]dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye 
[\[83b.5\]]mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[83b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[83b.7\]]bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams yod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang /_
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang /_stobs bcu yod pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i 
[\[84a.2\]]phyir te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas 
[\[84a.3\]]nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am/_dor ba'i chos gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang dag skye ba'am 'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i 
[\[84a.4\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa'am/_
[\[84a.5\]]'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin te/_rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no/_/
[\[84a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor des na pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/_de ltar 
[\[84a.7\]]'du shes par yang mi byed/_de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/_de ltar spros par yang mi byed na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs 
[\[84b.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/_ston par byed pa ma yin/_'dzin par byed pa ma yin/_sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_skyed par byed pa ma yin/_'gog par byed pa ma yin/_kun nas nyon 
[\[84b.3\]]mongs par byed pa ma yin/_rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/_'grib par byed pa ma yin/_'phel bar byed pa ma yin/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams 
[\[84b.4\]]las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/_gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/_gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma 
[\[84b.5\]]yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa 
[\[84b.6\]]yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[84b.7\]]pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir 
[\[85a.2\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_
[\[85a.3\]]'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed 
[\[85a.4\]]pa yang ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_
[\[85a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/_de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang /_
[\[85a.6\]]gsung ba dang /_rnam par 'grel ba dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/_ca co dang /_ga zha 'don cing /_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_
[\[85a.7\]]pad ma dkar po dang /_man dar ba dag gis gtor nas/_'di skad du/_a la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo /_/zhes tshig tu yang brjod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/_de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba'am/_
[\[85b.2\]]ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/_rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa yang ma yin/_gcig pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug 
[\[85b.3\]]par bgyi ba 'am/_ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[85b.4\]]du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[85b.5\]]nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams ni lam gyis stong ngo /_stobs bcu ni stobs 
[\[85b.6\]]bcus stong ngo /_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo /_/de bzhin du lan cig 
[\[85b.7\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dngos po ma 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags te/_chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[86a.2\]]brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang /_chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing /_chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/_ldog par bgyid pa yang ma mchis 
[\[86a.3\]]te/_chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis la/_chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gang yang 'jug pa'am/_ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon 
[\[86a.4\]]par ma grub pa lags pas stong pa nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa'am/_ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/_ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so/_/de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 
[\[86a.5\]]dang /_rab tu bstan pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_gdags pa dang /_'jug pa dang /_rnam par 'grel ba dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_smos pa dang /_gsal bar bgyid pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags 
[\[86a.6\]]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/_sus kyang ma bzung lags so/_/gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyid lags so/_/gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung /_sus kyang mngon 
[\[86a.7\]]sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su yang ma mchis te/_chos bstan pa 'di la su yang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yang ma mchis lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[86b.2\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[86b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[86b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha 
[\[86b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ming med pa dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu 
[\[86b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/
[\[86b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin 
[\[87a.2\]]pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so/_/
[\[87a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi bas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[87a.4\]]chos thams cad shin tu byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyi skye ba 
[\[87a.5\]]med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byed pa po dmigs su med 
[\[87a.6\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[87a.7\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chi 'pho dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[87b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rmi lam rmis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu 
[\[87b.3\]]phyin pa 'di ni brag ca lta bu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgra'i brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags so/_/
[\[87b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[87b.5\]]chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[87b.6\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[87b.7\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[88a.2\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[88a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu 
[\[88a.4\]]phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom 
[\[88a.5\]]sems ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa 
[\[88a.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[88a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[88b.2\]]chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod 
[\[88b.3\]]chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[88b.4\]]phyir ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po sum cu pa/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[88b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[88b.6\]]pa/_yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can dmigs su 
[\[88b.7\]]med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[89a.2\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[89a.3\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[89a.4\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[89a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[89a.6\]]ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags 
[\[89a.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa/_chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[89b.2\]]chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs 
[\[89b.3\]]su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[89b.4\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[89b.5\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[89b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi dang nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[89b.7\]]'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom 
[\[90a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[90a.3\]]stsal pa/_'du byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus 
[\[90a.4\]]ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[90a.5\]]stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[90a.6\]]pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs 
[\[90a.7\]]su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 
[\[90b.2\]]ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 
[\[90b.3\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[90b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[90b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[90b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[90b.7\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[91a.2\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[91a.3\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol 
[\[91a.4\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so/_/
[\[91a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[91a.6\]]stsal pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lta bar gyur pa 
[\[91a.7\]]dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[91b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[91b.3\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91b.4\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[91b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[91b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu 
[\[91b.7\]]phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnod sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[92a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chal 
[\[92a.3\]]pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med 
[\[92a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[92a.5\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[92a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[92a.7\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[92b.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[92b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_
[\[92b.4\]]dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya 
[\[92b.5\]]ba byas pa yin la/_gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/_/gang dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba 
[\[92b.6\]]dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa 
[\[92b.7\]]dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mang po dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su zhu ba 
[\[93a.2\]]byas pa yin no/_/gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[93a.3\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[93a.4\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur la/_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yang brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[93a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bgyid lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags te/_sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma spyad pa dag gis ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[93a.6\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/_sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[93a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang /_dga' ba ma mchis pa dang /_dad pa ma mchis pas 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab 
[\[93b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par 
[\[93b.3\]]bgyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[93b.4\]]stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[93b.5\]]gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[93b.6\]]mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur pa dang /_dngos 
[\[93b.7\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos par ma gyur pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sangs 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[94a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_
[\[94a.3\]]gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[94a.4\]]tu phyin pa 'di las nges par byung la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes 
[\[94a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed par 'dod pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[94a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 
[\[94a.7\]]dgod par 'dod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[94b.2\]]byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa 
[\[94b.3\]]dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/_nang stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[94b.4\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin du byang 
[\[94b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco 
[\[94b.6\]]brgyad la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/_/kau shi ka khyod 
[\[94b.7\]]kyi spobs pa skyes pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/_kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs la mi 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]gnas te/_gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas 
[\[95a.2\]]pa de'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la mi gnas te/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/_
[\[95a.3\]]sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams la mi gnas te/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims 
[\[95a.4\]]dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/dngos po med 
[\[95a.5\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[95a.6\]]rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed 
[\[95a.7\]]do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la mi gnas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang /_de bzhin du gang la gnas pa dang /_gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[95b.2\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs 
[\[95b.3\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/_gang gi phyir 
[\[95b.4\]]gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/_gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa la rnal 
[\[95b.5\]]'byor du byed do/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_
[\[95b.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/_gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de ci'i 
[\[95b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_
[\[96a.2\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_
[\[96a.3\]]da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[96a.4\]]zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams 
[\[96a.5\]]dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[96a.6\]]ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag 
[\[96a.7\]]dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/shA ri'i 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[96b.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[96b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/_/
[\[96b.4\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[96b.5\]]par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[96b.6\]]spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te/_gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[96b.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i 
[\[97a.2\]]bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 
[\[97a.3\]]'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 
[\[97a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi 
[\[97a.5\]]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched 
[\[97a.6\]]rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[97a.7\]]pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[97b.2\]]phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi spyod na/_shes 
[\[97b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[97b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/_gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[97b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing de 
[\[97b.6\]]bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[97b.7\]]pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang /_de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba dang /_de tsam du rtogs 
[\[98a.2\]]par dka' ba dang /_de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/_de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[98a.3\]]thos na skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing /_nem 
[\[98a.4\]]nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/_the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[98a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/_nyes pa cir 'gyur/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_kau shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[98a.6\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par gyur na/_skrag cing dngang la/_dngang bar 'gyur zhing /_phyir spong bar 'gyur te/_mos par mi 'gyur la/_kau shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[98a.7\]]thos na phyir spong zhing /_log par ltung bar 'gro ba lags par 'gyur te/_yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha 
[\[98b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/_gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar 
[\[98b.3\]]gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[98b.4\]]gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[98b.5\]]gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[98b.6\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das dper brjod par bdag shin tu spobs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta 
[\[98b.7\]]ste dper bgyi na/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[99a.2\]]pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rigs par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[99a.3\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing /_chos 
[\[99a.4\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[99a.5\]]mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[99a.6\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs 
[\[99a.7\]]su zin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba'am/_lung bstan par 'gyur ba'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur lags 
[\[99b.2\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/_mi zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/_'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa zhig nas sam/_dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig nas sam/_dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa zhig nas sam/_dpag 
[\[99b.3\]]tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/_de byung ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi dag gam/_phyugs rdzi dag gam sa mtshams sam/_kun dga' ra ba'am tshal dag gam/_skyed mos tshal dag mthong bar gyur tam/_grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/_grong 
[\[99b.4\]]rdal dag gam ljongs dag gam/_yul 'khor dag gam mtshan ma gzhan gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/_de 'di snyam du snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag gda' ba las na/_'di nas grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang 
[\[99b.5\]]nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing /_de la slan chad chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa 'am/_gdug pas 'jigs pa 'am/_gdol pas 'jigs pa'am/_gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa'am/_bkres pa dang skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 
[\[99b.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/_'chang bar bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_kun chub par bgyid/_tshul 
[\[99b.7\]]bzhin du yid la bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan du nye ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring po mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi ste/_byang chub 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la 
[\[100a.2\]]blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de/_snga ltas de dag mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_shA ri'i 
[\[100a.3\]]bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod shin tu spobs par gyis shig_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis na ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis pa/_de lta de ltar 
[\[100a.4\]]des yal ga gel ba'am/_yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/_ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag mthong bar gyur na des 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag ring ste rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye ba ma lags so snyam du rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba 
[\[100a.5\]]na yal ga gel ba'am/_yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/_ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/_mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas/_ji lta ji ltar mchis pa de lta de ltar des yal ga gel ba'am/_yal 
[\[100a.6\]]ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/_ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mthong bar gyur na/_de 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga gel ba'am/_yal ga gel ba'i mtshan 
[\[100a.7\]]ma'am/_ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/_/mi de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang /_des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur te/_rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar nges 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]par rtogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa des kyang 'di ltar rig par bgyi zhing /_'di ltar 
[\[100b.2\]]bsam par bgyi ste/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa 'di snyed cig gam/_bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig gam/_bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig gam/_bskal pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gam/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed 
[\[100b.3\]]cig na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes mngon sum du lung ma bstan kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba 
[\[100b.4\]]lags so snyam du rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta zhing mnyan du rnyed la thos nas kyang gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyir 
[\[100b.5\]]mchis so snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na/_dpyid byung ste/_yal ga 'gel ba rnams kyi lo ma dang /_'dab ma lhags par gyur pa na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis 'di ltar da ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[100b.6\]]'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar yal ga 'gel ba rnams la snga ltas de dag gda' ba'i slad du ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis yal ga 'gel ba rnams la snga ltas de dag mthong nas/_'di snyam du de 
[\[100b.7\]]ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_yid dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dang /_mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/_'chang bar bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_kun chub par bgyid/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge 
[\[101a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[101a.3\]]chen po de dag gis kyang 'di snyam du/_gang gi slad du bdag cag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing bltar mchis pa dang /_mnyan du mchis pa dang /_phyag bgyir mchis pa dang /_ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub tu mchis 
[\[101a.4\]]pa las na/_bdag cag ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen pa lags so snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/_/de na gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu dag 'di snyam du/_sngon gyi byang chub 
[\[101a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas 'di lta bu de dag byung bar gyur pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang /_ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 
[\[101a.6\]]'gyur ro snyam nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/_bud med sbrum pa ni ji lta ji ltar bu btsa' bar nye ba de lta de ltar de'i lus 'gyur te/_lus ngal ba'i tshor ba chen po skye ba 
[\[101a.7\]]dang /_'chag par mi bgyid pa dang /_dran pa chung ba dang /_g.yar zas kyi dad chung ba dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid chung ba dang /_tshor ba de lta bu dag byung bas smra ba nyung ba dang /_des sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyis shing bsten pa dang /_lan mang du 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bgyis shing kun du bsten pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba 'di dag nyams su myong ngo snyam du rtogs nas/_mi sten pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur zhing /_bud med gzhan dag gis kyang /_bud med de'i mtshan ma gang lags pa de dag mthong nas/_'di snyam du bud med 'di ni ring po mi 
[\[101b.2\]]thogs par bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes rtogs par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa spyod pa legs par spyad pa/_dge ba'i 
[\[101b.3\]]bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing rnyed nas kyang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[101b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ring po mi thogs par/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu 
[\[101b.5\]]yin te/_shA ri'i bu legs so legs so//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po sum cu rtsa gcig pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 
[\[101b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sman btags pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[101b.7\]]dpa' chen po rnams ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/_byang 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag spyad pa spyod pa na/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don 'thun pa dang /_don spyad pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag la phan 'dogs shing /_sems 
[\[102a.2\]]can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_bdag kyang chos de dag la gnas par byed do/_/
[\[102a.3\]]bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[102a.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing /_thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[102a.5\]]'bras bu la 'god par byed kyang /_bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ni mi byed do/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la 'god par byed kyang bdag nyid kyang rang byang chub mngon sum du mi 
[\[102a.6\]]byed do/_/bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god par byed do/_/de bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[102a.7\]]dag par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams skyed par byed cing /_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]gzhan dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang spobs pa phun 
[\[102b.2\]]sum tshogs pa thob par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag 
[\[102b.3\]]par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed 
[\[102b.4\]]cing /_gzhan dag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgrub par bya ba yang dag 
[\[102b.5\]]par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi skyed par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[102b.6\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skyed par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[102b.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]pa thams cad spong bar byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang bag chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[103a.2\]]par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang 
[\[103a.3\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[103a.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su 
[\[103a.5\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs kyi rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_
[\[103a.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du khams 
[\[103a.7\]]rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su 
[\[103b.2\]]rdzogs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[103b.3\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched 
[\[103b.4\]]rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[103b.5\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/
[\[103b.6\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_chos zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag 
[\[103b.7\]]par rjes su mi mthong /_ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung bstan du yod pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]mi mthong /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par 
[\[104a.2\]]rjes su mi mthong /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[104a.3\]]bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid 
[\[104a.4\]]dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_snying po med pa nyid dang /_ya ma brla nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[104a.5\]]gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i 
[\[104a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab
