[\[124b.2\]]nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod pa dang /_sgom du gzhug par mi 'dod pa'i phyir te/_de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba las de skad thos nas/_yi chad pa'i tshul gyis gang du dge slong chos smra ba de 'gro bar 'gyur ba der de dag 'gro bar mi 'gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[124b.3\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba slongs mo ster ba'i khyim la 
[\[124b.4\]]gdu bar gyur nas/_de slongs mo ster ba'i khyim la gdu ba des na/_yang dang yang du de dag gis khyim blta bar sems shing /_de yang dang yang du blta bar sems pa des chos nyan pa rnams spong zhing /_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ni slongs mo ster ba'i khyim dag lta zhing der 'gro dgos 
[\[124b.5\]]pa zhig yod do zhes zer zhing chos nyan pa de dag spong bar byed la/_de dag kyang spangs pas phyir ldog par 'gyur na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang 
[\[124b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha byad du bsgyur cing ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang yi ger mi 'dri ba dang /_mi 'dzin 
[\[124b.7\]]pa dang /_mi 'chad pa dang /_kha ton du mi byed pa dang /_kun chub par mi byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang /_mi bsgom par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor bar byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang yi ger mi 'dri ba dang /_lung mi nod pa dang /_mi klog pa dang /_kha ton du mi bgyid pa dang /_
[\[125a.2\]]tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid pa dang /_sgom par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_'di skad du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi 
[\[125a.3\]]mdo sde gang kho bo la 'os shing kun chub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/zhes 'byed par byed cing 'bral bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de la bdud sdig can gyis de ltar 'byed par byed pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lung bstan par ma gyur pa de dag ni the 
[\[125a.4\]]tshom skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag the tshom skyes nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi 'gyur/_lung nod par mi 'gyur/_klog par mi 'gyur/_kha ton du byed par mi 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur/_sgom par mi 'gyur na rab 
[\[125a.5\]]'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kun chub par bgyi ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba dang /_sgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[125a.6\]]bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[125a.7\]]mtha' mngon sum du byed cing /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang /_rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab 
[\[125b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_sgom pa'i bar du byed pa na gang dag bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi las de dag rig par bya zhing /_rig nas kyang rnam par spang 
[\[125b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las gang dag rig par bgyi zhing /_rig nas kyang rnam par spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes 
[\[125b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[125b.5\]]de dag ni byang chub sems dpas rig nas rnam par spang bar bya ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ltar bcos pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi las dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_
[\[125b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpas de dag kyang rig nas rnam par spang bar bya'o/_/'di skad kyang smra bar 'gyur te/_khyod kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag sgoms shig_/yang dag pa'i spong 
[\[125b.7\]]ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam yang sgoms shig_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yang sgoms shig_/de dag kun chub par gyis 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]shig_/de dag kun chub par byas nas kyang /_'di nyid la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[126a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas kyang khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan 
[\[126a.3\]]par 'gyur te/_bdud sdig can bdud kyi las 'di lta bu 'di dag nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad dang /_lus gser gyi mdog lta bu 'od 'dom gang dang ldan par bsgyur te 'ongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de mthong nas 
[\[126a.4\]]dga' ba skye bar 'gyur te de dag dga' ba skyes na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger bri ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya 
[\[126a.5\]]ba'i tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nye 
[\[126a.6\]]bar ston par 'gyur te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du tshogs yongs su bsdu bar yang bya'o/_/
[\[126a.7\]]ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa de ltar bdag gis kyang bstan par bya'o snyam du de dag de la 'dod pa bskyed na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_lung 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]nod pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_bshad par bya ba dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud 
[\[126b.2\]]sdig can gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub 
[\[126b.3\]]sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dag nye bar ston par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bdud kyis sprul pa de dag la 'dod pa skyes par gyur na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[126b.4\]]de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba'i tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[126b.5\]]chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la ni gzugs yod pa ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams yod 
[\[126b.6\]]pa ma yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /_byang chub yod 
[\[126b.7\]]pa ma yin te/_rab 'byor gang la gzugs yod pa ma yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi bar du yang yod pa ma yin pa dang /_gang la byang chub yod pa ma yin pa de la ni sangs rgyas kyang med/_
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang med/_nyan thos rnams kyang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 
[\[127a.2\]]'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na/_rin po che dag yod pa 'di lta ste/_gser 
[\[127a.3\]]dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_a nad rnyil dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byu ru dang /_dngul gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la ni bar chad mang zhing phyir rgol ba dag mang bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[127a.4\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sgom pa de dag la yang bar chad mang du 'byung zhing /_phyir rgol ba mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[127a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/de de lta lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag la ni slar rgol ba dang /_bar chad bgyid pa mang du 'byung lags te/_bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i mi blun po de dag ni gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[127a.6\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la bar chad bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mi blun po blo chung zhing blo zhan pa de dag ni gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[127a.7\]]zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_sgom pa'i bar du bgyid pa la bar chad bgyid par 'gyur te/_gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba 'am/_yi ge 'dri ba'i bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la blo 'jug par 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba'am/_yi ger 'dri ba'i bar chad bgyid pa dang /_sgom par mi 'gyur ba'am/_sgom pa'i bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la blo 'jug par mi 'gyur lags 
[\[127b.2\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_klog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_lung nod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kha ton 
[\[127b.3\]]byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sgom par mi 'gyur zhing /_bar chad byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba ma byas 
[\[127b.4\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi byed cing /_sgom pa'i bar du mi byed la/_gzhan dag yi ger 'dri ba dang /_sgom pa'i bar du byed 
[\[127b.5\]]pa la bar chad byed pa de dag ni blo chung ba dang /_blo zhan pa dang /_blo dman pa yin pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la blo 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_sgom pa'i bar du byed pa la/_bdud kyi las de lta bu 
[\[127b.6\]]gzhan dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sgom pa dag la gal te bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[127b.7\]]yang /_gong nas gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_
[\[128a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ni/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya ste/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung nod pa 
[\[128a.3\]]dang /_sgom pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_gong nas gong du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo thams cad dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[128a.4\]]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes 
[\[128a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi ched du brtson par mdzad do/_/phyogs bcu dag na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod 
[\[128a.6\]]pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sgom pa de dag la phan 'dogs par brtson par byed par 'gyur ro/_/shes 
[\[128a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bdud kyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po sum cu rtsa gsum pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na bud med la la zhig la 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bu lnga'am/_bcu 'am/_nyi shu 'am/_sum cu'am/_lnga bcu'am/_brgya'am/_stong ngam/_'bum zhig yod par gyur la de dag thams cad dben pa'i phyir ci ltar byas na/_bdag cag gis ma la bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhig gu/_ji ltar byas na bdag cag gi ma yun ring du 'tsho bar 
[\[128b.2\]]'gyur zhig gu/_ji ltar byas na bdag cag gi ma'i lus la mi bde ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhig gu/_'di ni bdag cag skyed pa dang /_lus 'dzin pa dang srog sbyin pa yin no/_/zhes 'bad par byed cing 'di'i srog la bar chad 'byung ba'am lus nyam chung ba'am/_sbrang bu mchu ring 
[\[128b.3\]]dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sdig sbrul gyi gnod pa'am/_grang ba dang tsha ba dang bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar bya'o zhes bu de dag ma de la rim gro mchog gis rim gror byed cing /_bsrung ba'i mchog gis srung bar byed de/_de ltar bu de dag ma de la bde bar sbyar ba 
[\[128b.4\]]thams cad snyen par byed cing 'di ni bdag cag la 'jig rten 'di ston pa yin no/_/zhes de ltar de dag ma de la rim gro byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[128b.5\]]'di la yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dgongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed pa dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[128b.6\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dgongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye

[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di las byung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

[\[129b.1\]]rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dgongs so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ci nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba de

[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas phung po lnga ji ltar bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po de dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin no/_/

[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems chen por gyur pa la sems chen por gyur par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rang bzhin 'ong ba 
[\[132b.2\]]dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur bar yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems de dag gi ngo bo nyid gang 'ong ba'am 'gro ba'am skye ba'am 'gag pa'am/_gnas pa'am 
[\[132b.3\]]gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan dag gi sems chen por gyur pa la sems chen por gyur par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[132b.4\]]rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan dag gi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[132b.5\]]gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems tshad med pa la/_sems tshad med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems 
[\[132b.6\]]can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems de gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_rnam par gnas pa yin pa dang /_yang dag par gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_yang dag par mi gnas pa ma yin par yang dag par rjes su gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[132b.7\]]sems kyi rgyud rnams ni zag pa med cing tshad med de/_de dag gang la gnas pa'i rten de yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems chad 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]med pa la sems tshad med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems bstan du 
[\[133a.2\]]med pa la sems bstan du med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems bstan du med pa la sems bstan du med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/_
[\[133a.3\]]rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems de mtshan nyid med cing ngo bo nyid dang bral bar gzigs te/_rab 'byor de 
[\[133a.4\]]ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems bstan du med pa la sems bstan du med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin 
[\[133a.5\]]gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems mi snang ba la sems mi snang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[133a.6\]]la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems mi snang ba la sems mi snang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga la gzhan gyi sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[133a.7\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems mi snang ba la sems mi snang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems lhag par g.yo ba dang /_bral bar g.yo ba rnams dang /_bsdus par g.yo ba rnams dang /_rgyas pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[133b.2\]]mkhyen te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems lhag par g.yo ba dang /_bral bar g.yo ba rnams dang /_bsdus par g.yo ba dang /_rgyas pa rnams yang dag pa 
[\[133b.3\]]ji lta ba bzhin du/_ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan de dag gi sems de dag 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can rnams kyi sems lhag par g.yo ba dang /_bral bar g.yo ba rnams dang /_
[\[133b.4\]]bsdus par g.yo ba dang /_rgyas pa rnams skye ba na/_skye ba gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni gzugs la brten tam/_tshor ba la brten tam/_'du shes la brten tam/_'du byed rnams la brten tam/_rnam par shes pa la brten nas skye ba na skye ste/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[133b.5\]]na de bzhin gshegs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems lhag par g.yo ba dang /_bral bar g.yo ba rnams dang /_bsdus par g.yo ba dang /_rgyas pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[133b.6\]]rab tu mkhyen te/_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mi rtag pa dang /_rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag pa dang /_rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang 
[\[133b.7\]]ma yin/_zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mi rtag pa dang /_rtag kyang rtag la/_mi rtag kyang mi rtag pa dang /_rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes 
[\[134a.2\]]bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag dang /_'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa'o zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa ma yin pa dang /_mtha' yod 
[\[134a.3\]]kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med pa dang /_mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/
[\[134a.4\]]bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa ma yin pa dang /_mtha' yod kyang yod la/_mtha' med kyang med pa dang /_
[\[134a.5\]]mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/_mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten shi phan chad yod do zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba 
[\[134a.6\]]de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten shi phan chad med pa dang /_yod kyang yod la med kyang med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/
[\[134a.7\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/bdag dang 'jig rten shi phan chad yod do/_/zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten shi phan chad 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]med pa dang /_yod kyang yod la med kyang med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/srog de lus de yin no zhes bya ba dang /_srog kyang gzhan la/_
[\[134b.2\]]lus kyang gzhan yin no/_/zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/srog de lus de yin no zhes bya ba dang /_srog kyang gzhan la 
[\[134b.3\]]lus kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya ba 'di kho na bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan dag gi 
[\[134b.4\]]sems lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba rnams dang /_bsdus par g.yo ba dang /_rgyas pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas gzugs mkhyen te/_
[\[134b.5\]]gzugs ci ltar mkhyen ce na/_ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/_mtshan ma med cing rtsol ba med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa de bzhin du mkhyen to/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[134b.6\]]shes pa mkhyen te rnam par shes pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/_ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing /_rnam par rtog pa med la mtshan ma med cing rtsol ba med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang dmigs su med pa de bzhin du mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab 
[\[134b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems lhag par g.yo ba dang /_bral bar g.yo ba rnams dang /_bsdus par g.yo ba dang /_rgyas pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]lhag par g.yo ba dang /_bral bar g.yo ba dang /_bsdus par g.yo ba dang /_rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[135a.2\]]yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin 
[\[135a.3\]]nyid do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/stong pa nyid rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[135a.4\]]yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[135a.5\]]yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa dang /_snying rje'i de bzhin nyid do/_/
[\[135a.6\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[135a.7\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_kha na 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa rnams dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/
[\[135b.2\]]'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[135b.3\]]nyid do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin 
[\[135b.4\]]pa de ni/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[135b.5\]]nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_
[\[135b.6\]]tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa yin no/_/mi zad pas na gnyis su med de/_rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas mngon par rdzogs 
[\[135b.7\]]par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig rten ston pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar gyur pa'i chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud cing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 
[\[136a.2\]]thugs su chud do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni zab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid 'dis ni 
[\[136a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub snang bar bgyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs par gyur pa rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos 
[\[136a.4\]]par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ni zab ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni mi zad pa'o/_/ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/_chos thams 
[\[136a.5\]]cad mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi zad pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri 
[\[136a.6\]]brgyad stong pa las/_'jig rten ston pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer 
[\[136a.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa 'di ni zab pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci'i slad du zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[136b.2\]]pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gag pa med 
[\[136b.3\]]pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_chad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rtag pa med pa'i mtshan 
[\[136b.4\]]nyid dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'ong ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zab/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan 
[\[136b.5\]]nyid de lta bu yin pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rnam par 'khrug par byed mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha 
[\[136b.6\]]dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de'i mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid kyis ni/_mtshan nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshan nyid mi shes so/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshan nyid med pa mi shes so/_/
[\[136b.7\]]mtshan nyid med pas kyang mtshan nyid mi shes so/_/mtshan nyid med pas kyang mtshan nyid med pa mi shes so/_/de ltar na mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka la yang /_gang gis shes par byed pa dang /_gang shes par byed pa dang /_gang la 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]shes par byed pa dang /_gang la shes par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas mngon par 'dus byas pa 
[\[137a.2\]]ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid thams cad kyis mngon par 
[\[137a.3\]]'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[137a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni mi rnams dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam/_zag pa med pa rnams sam/_'jig rten pa rnams sam/_'jig rten las 'das pa rnams sam 
[\[137a.5\]]'dus byas rnams sam/_'dus ma byas rnams ma yin te/_mtshan nyid thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu dag la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta bu yin no/_/zhes zer na/_ci yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin nam/_lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol 
[\[137a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par smra bas smra ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams ni 'dus byas ma lags pa'i slad du nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid gang gis kyang mchis pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_lha'i bu dag 
[\[137a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_mtshan nyid kyi dbyings ni mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du gnas pa nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir/_
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan nyid gang dag la gnas nas/_
[\[137b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid thams cad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di dag ni zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/_mtshan 
[\[137b.3\]]nyid thams cad yang dag par rab tu bstan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gang la spyod pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[137b.4\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad de/_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du dbye ba mdzad pa nas/_mtshan nyid thams cad 
[\[137b.5\]]kyi rab tu dbye ba'i bar du mdzad pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du/_rab tu dbye ba mdzad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni zab ste ngo mtshar 
[\[137b.6\]]lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu dag gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/_gzugs nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pas/_mtshan nyid med pas 
[\[137b.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/_'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/_'du byed rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par shes pa ni so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/khams rnams ni sbrul gdug pa lta bu'i mtshan 
[\[138a.2\]]nyid de de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/skye mched rnams ni skye ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[138a.3\]]ni tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid de de yang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de de yang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/tshul 
[\[138a.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sdud pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spong ba'i mtshan 
[\[138a.5\]]nyid de/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[138a.6\]]mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni nges par 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan 
[\[138a.7\]]nyid/_mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid/_smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par nges pa'i mtshan nyid/_mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid/_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[138b.2\]]rnams ni mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid/_byams pa chen po ni phan pa sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid/_snying rje chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid/_dga' ba chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid/_btang snyoms chen po ni sems can gyi nyes pa dang /_bde 
[\[138b.3\]]ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrog pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag kyang de 
[\[138b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha'i bu dag de ltar na 
[\[138b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes 
[\[138b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyed pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ston pa yang yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'di la brten cing 
[\[138b.7\]]gnas nas 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la bsti stang mdzad/_bla mar mdzad/_ri mor mdzad/_mchod par mdzad de/_rab 'byor de bas na/_de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsti stang mdzad/_bla mar mdzad/_ri mor mdzad/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mchod par mdzad pa de ni chos nyid yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas ni byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin te/_
[\[139a.2\]]rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin no/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[139a.3\]]theg pa des gshegs shing lam des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa de nyid dang /_lam de nyid la bsti stang mdzad/_bla mar mdzad/_ri mo mdzad/_mchod pa mdzad cing yongs su 
[\[139a.4\]]'dzin la/_rjes su yongs su skyong bar mdzad de/_rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin par blta bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byed pa po med pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byas pa dang /_'gyur ba med 
[\[139a.5\]]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lus med pa'i phyir ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas chos thams cad byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin 
[\[139a.6\]]pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma byas pa mkhyen pa dang /_ma byas pa rig pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/_don dam par byung ba med pa'i phyir ye shes byas pa med pa'i chos thams cad la zhugs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[139a.7\]]rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe chos thams cad skyed pa po ma lags shing /_ston pa po ma lags pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni skyed pa po ma yin zhing ston pa po ma yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing ston pa po ma yin 
[\[139b.2\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa dang /_gso ba dang /_gsog dang /_ya ma brla dang /_snying po med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing ston pa po ma yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing ston 
[\[139b.3\]]pa po ma yin zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gnas pa med pa/_khongs su gtogs pa med pa yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing /_ston pa po ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin 
[\[139b.4\]]gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin te/_de yang gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin 
[\[139b.5\]]gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i slad du ji ltar ston pa lags/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mthong ba'i 
[\[139b.6\]]slad du ji ltar ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi tshe gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na rab 'byor de ltar gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[139b.7\]]rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi 'byung na/_de ltar rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi 'byung na/_de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang 'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/_
[\[140a.2\]]rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod par byed do/_/'jig rten stong ngo zhes ji ltar rjod ce na/_phung po lnga po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/khams bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/skye mched bcu gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes 
[\[140a.3\]]rjod do/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'jig rten stong ngo /_/zhes rjod do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'byung ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi 
[\[140a.4\]]'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid 
[\[140a.5\]]dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong ngo 
[\[140a.6\]]zhes rjod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'jig rten stong par 
[\[140a.7\]]rig go/_'jig rten stong par yang dag par mkhyen to/_/'jig rten stong par rtogs so/_/'jig rten stong par thugs su chud do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston te/_'jig rten stong ngo zhes ji ltar ston ce na/_'di ltar phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[140b.2\]]med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[140b.3\]]thams cad dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang 
[\[140b.4\]]'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/_'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ji ltar ston ce na/_phung po lnga nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam 
[\[140b.5\]]gyis mi khyab par ston to/_/de bzhin du shin tu dben pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin 
[\[140b.6\]]no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi bar ston te 'jig rten ji ltar zhi bar ston ce na/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhi bar ston te/_
[\[140b.7\]]rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid kho nar ston te/_'jig rten stong pa nyid kho nar ji ltar ston ce na/_phung po 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]lnga'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid kho nar ston pa nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid kho nar ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes 
[\[141a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci nas 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes med pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes sam/_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su byed 
[\[141a.3\]]pa'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa chen pos nye bar 
[\[141a.4\]]gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mdzad pa gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_mdzad pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[141a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mdzad pa chen pos nye bar 
[\[141a.6\]]gnas she na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang gnas byed pa dang /_yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa chen po yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[141a.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas she na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis 
[\[141b.2\]]mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas she na/_rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs kyi nang na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[141b.3\]]sangs rgyas bsam pa'am gzhal bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang med de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas 
[\[141b.4\]]pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas she na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med la 
[\[141b.5\]]sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha 
[\[141b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas she na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mnyam pa yang med na/_lhag pa lta ga la yod de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[141b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas yin no/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[142a.2\]]dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang 
[\[142a.3\]]grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_
[\[142a.4\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_shes par byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[142a.5\]]shes par byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_shes par byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[142a.6\]]ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_'tshal bar bgyir ma mchis pa lags/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[142a.7\]]pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_'tshal bar bgyir ma mchis pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_'tshal bar bgyir ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[142b.2\]]gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_shes par byar med pa yin no/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shis pa'i ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[142b.3\]]gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_shes par byar med pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa 
[\[142b.4\]]dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_shes par byar med pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/_ci gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gang yin 
[\[142b.5\]]pa de la gzugs dmigs sam/_rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gang yin pa de la rnam par shes pa 
[\[142b.6\]]dmigs sam/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gang yin pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs snyam 'am/_
[\[142b.7\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]rab 'byor 'di dag ni chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam 
[\[143a.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal gyis mi lang 
[\[143a.3\]]ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag gis mi lang ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /_bgrang gis mi lang ba'i phyir grangs med pa dang /_mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad bsam gyis mi 
[\[143a.4\]]khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam pa las 'das pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal ba las 'das 
[\[143a.5\]]pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang /_tshad las 'das pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /_bgrang pa las 'das pa'i phyir grangs med pa dang /_mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las 'das pa'i phyir/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni bsam gyis 
[\[143a.6\]]mi lang ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhal gyis mi lang ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de ni tshad med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor grangs med pa zhes bya ba de ni grangs las 'das pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/
[\[143a.7\]]rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang mi 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 
[\[143b.2\]]'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/_de dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang bsam 
[\[143b.3\]]pa'am/_gzhal ba'am dpag pa'am/_bgrang bar mi nus te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams kyang dpag tu med la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang dpag tu med do/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam 
[\[143b.4\]]pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma nyis stong yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge bsnyen drug khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul 
[\[143b.5\]]med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge bsnyen ma sum khri yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/_de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid 
[\[143b.6\]]la sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[143b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyid pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyid pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa grangs 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[144a.2\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa mtshungs pa med pa dang /_byed pa dpag tu med pa dang /_byed pa grangs med pa dang /_byed pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes 
[\[144a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'dus pa dang /_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 
[\[144a.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa dang /_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[144a.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus pa dang /_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas kyis 'dus pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 
[\[144a.6\]]rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_yul gyi mi rnams la mthu che zhing dbang thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya ba dang yul gyi mi rnams kyi bya ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad blon po byed du bcug na/_rgyal po'i bya ba'am yul gyi mi'i bya ba de dag la rgyal po snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin no/_/
[\[144a.7\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de dag gi bya 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa mtshungs pa med pa dang /_byed pa dpag tu med pa dang byed pa grangs med pa dang /_byed pa mi 
[\[144b.2\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la 
[\[144b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye 
[\[144b.4\]]bar gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye 
[\[144b.5\]]bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /_mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[144b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /_mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /_mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa 
[\[144b.7\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang mngon par zhen pa'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_rab 'byor khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]pa dang /_gang la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang mngon par zhen pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa 
[\[145a.2\]]rab 'byor khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang mngon par zhen pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[145a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor ngas kyang gang la yongs su 'dzin pa'am/_mngon par zhen pa'am/_gang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/_mngon par zhen pa'i gzugs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[145a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/yongs su mi 'dzin pas mngon par zhen pa med do/_/rab 'byor ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyis dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[145a.5\]]pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin te/_yongs su mi 'dzin pas mngon par zhen pa med do/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzugs la 
[\[145a.6\]]yongs su gzung bar mi bya zhing mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yongs su gzung bar mi bya zhing mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[145a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yongs su gzung bar mi bya zhing mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/_brtag par mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags la/_zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pas rig par bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de 
[\[145b.2\]]dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/_mos pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed skyed pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[145b.3\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[145b.4\]]rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyi shes pa gang lags pa dang /_spong ba gang lags pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_sems pa dang /_'jal ba dang /_dpyod pa dang /_rtog pa gang lags pa las shes rab kyi pha 
[\[145b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bu 'di la 'dod cing /_bzod pa gang lags pa de nyid ches mchog tu gyur pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba dang /_
[\[145b.6\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de 
[\[145b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag legs so legs so/_/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/lha'i 
[\[146a.2\]]bu dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/_thos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myur du yongs 
[\[146a.3\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes par bya'i/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la spyod pa de dag ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_
[\[146a.4\]]chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[146a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_
[\[146a.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag phul gyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[146a.7\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol tu 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa grangs ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[146b.2\]]ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs pas nges par byung bar gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[146b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslabs pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bri ba'am/_gang ba ma mchis so/_/zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/
[\[146b.4\]]de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ste/_de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas 
[\[146b.5\]]mi snang bar gyur te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[146b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[146b.7\]]chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur te/_zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /_yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/_de yid rtul bar mi 'gyur zhing /_de yid gnyis mi byed la/_the tshom mi za zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas mngon par dga' ste/_thos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yid la byed pa 'di nyid dang mi 'bral zhing /_'gro'ang rung /_'ong yang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung ste/_
[\[147a.2\]]rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yid la byed pa de dag mi gtong la/_chos smra ba'i gang zag de dag gi phyi bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'brang ste/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ba drus ma be'u mi gtong ba bzhin du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[147a.3\]]chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nam lus la gnas par byas pa dang /_zin pa dang /_byang ba dang /_chub par blags pa dang /_yid kyis brtags pa dang /_mthong bas shin tu rtogs par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i 
[\[147a.4\]]phyir/_chos smra ba mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag de ni/_rab 'byor mi las shi 'phos nas mir skye ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[147a.5\]]dpa' des sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris la/_bris nas kyang glegs bam du chud par byas te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[147a.6\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas pa'i phyir te/_de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi las shi 'phos te/_mir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 
[\[147a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yon tan de dag dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/_de nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la/_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton du bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[147b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang /_de nas shi 'phos nas 
[\[147b.3\]]'dir skyes te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la/_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[147b.4\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la thos nas kyang bzung zhing bcang la/_kha ton du byas shing tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa'i phyir te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[147b.5\]]de dag dang /_yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir skyes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos nas/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'dir skyes pa de nyid kyang yon tan de dag dang ldan par
