[\[147b.6\]]rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su dri ba byas pas na/_de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir 
[\[147b.7\]]skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na/_the tshom can dang yid rtul bar 'gyur te/_de'i sems zhum 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos la yongs su dri ba byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas/_the tshom can du mi 'gyur zhing yid rtul 
[\[148a.2\]]bar mi 'gyur te/_sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[148a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas the tshom can du 'gyur zhing yid rtul bar 'gyur te/_sems zhum par 'gyur ro/_/rab 
[\[148a.4\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos shing /_yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas 
[\[148a.5\]]the tshom can du 'gyur zhing yid rtul bar 'gyur te/_sems zhum par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi 
[\[148a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /_yid rtul bar 'gyur te sems zhum par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[148a.7\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos sam/_thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na the tshom 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]can du 'gyur zhing yid rtul bar 'gyur te/_sems kyang zhum par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs 
[\[148b.2\]]su dris la/_thos shing yongs su dris nas/_nyi ma gcig gam/_nyi ma gnyis sam/_nyi ma gsuma'am/_bzhi'am/_lnga'am/_drug gam/_nyi ma bcur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyams su mi len cing 
[\[148b.3\]]mi sgom pa de ni 'phrog par 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[148b.4\]]zab mo 'di la res 'ga' ni 'dun par 'gyur/_res 'ga' ni 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de ni 'phrog par 'gyur te/_shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du blo shin du mi brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni theg pa la yang 
[\[148b.5\]]dag par zhugs nas/_ring por ma lon pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas par rig par bya'o/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[148b.6\]]gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lung ma mnos kha ton du ma byas/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[148b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs pa 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam la ma bslabs pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[149a.2\]]lnga dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[149a.3\]]ni/_rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yin par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni dad pa tsam dang /_dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa yin gyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton 
[\[149a.4\]]du bya ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/_lung nod par mi byed/_kha ton du mi byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi 
[\[149a.5\]]byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin par mi byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yang nyams su mi len pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[149a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nyams su mi len pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_sa rnam pa 'di gnyis las gcig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni 
[\[149a.7\]]sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing lung ma mnos te/_kha ton du ma byas la/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang yongs su ma zin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyams su ma blangs pa'i phyir te/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_'dus pa'i 
[\[149b.2\]]le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gang gi tshe rgya mtsho'i gru zhig par gyur pa na/_de'i nang na mi 'khod pa dag gis shing ngam/_rkyal pa'am/_mi ro la ma 'jus shing ma bzung na/_rab 'byor mi de dag ni rgya 
[\[149b.3\]]mtsho'i 'gram du ma phyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru zhig pa na mi gang dag shing ngam/_rkyal pa'am/_mi ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin par sems na/_rab 'byor mi de dag ni/_rgya mtsho'i nang du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_bde bar 
[\[149b.4\]]rgya mtsho las brgal bar 'gyur zhing /_nye zho med par thang la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dad pa tsam dang /_dga' ba tsam dang ldan te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 
[\[149b.5\]]'dri bar mi byed/_lung nod par mi byed/_kha ton du mi byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[149b.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/_lung nod par mi byed/_kha ton du mi byed/_lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ldan pa'i mdo sde yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/_lung nod par mi byed/_kha 
[\[149b.7\]]ton du mi byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang /_lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_bar ma dor lam du nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/_de dag 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/_dad pa 
[\[150a.2\]]yod pa dang /_bzod pa yod pa dang /_dang ba yod pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang /_'dod pa yod pa dang /_mos pa yod pa dang /_gtong ba yod pa dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba yod pa de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[150a.3\]]phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri bar byed/_lung nod par byed/_kha ton du byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/_dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_
[\[150a.4\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba de dag dang /_gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa de dag bar ma dor nyon mongs par 
[\[150a.5\]]mi 'gyur zhing /_de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[150a.6\]]ba la ltos/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes pa'am/_bud med gcig gis bum pa so ma btang /_ma bsregs pas chu bcu bar sems na/_rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi thub ste/_myur ba nyid du 'jig cing zhu bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[150a.7\]]zhe na/_'di ltar bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/_de ni phyir sa tha mal pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/_dad pa yang yod 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bzod pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_'dod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod du zin kyang /_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma 
[\[150b.2\]]zin la/_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa 
[\[150b.3\]]dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma zin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma zin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po 
[\[150b.4\]]rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam gyis yongs su ma zin/_mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma zin/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[150b.5\]]pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma zin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/_rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag ni bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[150b.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ba gang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes pa'am/_bud med gcig gis bum pa so btang bas chu klung ngam/_khron pa'am/_
[\[150b.7\]]mtsho'am/_mtshe'u'am/_lding ka nas chu bcus na/_rab 'byor bum pa de ni bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_'dod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing /_
[\[151a.2\]]thabs la mkhas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor lam du 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nyon mongs par mi 'gyur 
[\[151a.3\]]zhing /_nye zho med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_rgya mtsho'i gru legs par ma bcoms shing zag lhan ma byas par rdzas kyis lci bar byas te/_chu 
[\[151a.4\]]la btang na/_rab 'byor gru de ni bar ma dor nub par 'gyur te/_rdzas kyang logs shig_/gru yang logs shig tu 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de lta bu'i tshong pa de ni thabs la mi mkhas shing gnod pa chen po dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang /_rin po che chen po dag dang bral bar 'gyur bar 
[\[151a.5\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/_dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_'dod pa yang yod/_
[\[151a.6\]]mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod du zin kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/_
[\[151a.7\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur te/_don chen po las yongs su nyams shing 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i phung po chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis rgya mtsho'i gru legs par bcoms 
[\[151b.2\]]shing zag lhan byas la shin tu spyad na/_rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur zhing /_des gang du bgrod par bya ba der phyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[151b.3\]]byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_'dod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[151b.4\]]pas kyang /_yongs su zin cing thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su zin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis kyang yongs su zin na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[151b.5\]]ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/_dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_
[\[151b.6\]]'dod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su zin cing /_thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su zin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis kyang 
[\[151b.7\]]yongs su zin pa'i phyir te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/_rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]pa zhig yod de/_de'i lus la rlung las gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/_bad kan las gyur pa'am/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' zhig byung na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de rang dgar ldang ba'i mthu dang 
[\[152a.2\]]ldan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci mi de ldang bar 'gyur ram/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi de ni khri las ldang ba'i rngo thogs su lags kyang /_de ni rgas pa 
[\[152a.3\]]de dang /_bro nad de dag gis nyams dmas pas/_dpag tshad gcig gi bar ram/_dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du mchi ba'i mthu yang ma mchis te/_khri de las ldang ba'i rngo thogs su lags kyang /_mchi ba'i rngo ni mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[152a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/_dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_
[\[152a.5\]]'dod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod du zin kyang /_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin la/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[152a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /_thabs lam mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir/_bar ma dor lam du nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[152a.7\]]na/_mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/_rgas shing 'khogs la/_gtugs par gyur pa/_de la rlung las gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/_bad kan las gyur pa'am/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis nyams dmas pa de nyid mi 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mchan g.yas g.yon nas brten te/_bteg nas khri de las bslang ste/_'di skad du kye mi khyod kho bo cag gnyis kyis brten te bzung gis/_gang du 'dod pa dang /_gar dga' bar song shig dang /_gnas der ma phyin gyi bar 
[\[152b.2\]]du bar ma dor 'gyel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer ba de bzhin du/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/_dad pa yang yod/_bzod pa yang yod/_dga' ba yang yod/_dang 
[\[152b.3\]]ba yang yod/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/_'dod pa yang yod/_mos pa yang yod/_gtong ba yang yod/_brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su zin cing /_thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su 
[\[152b.4\]]zin na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor ldog par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas de 'thob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[152b.5\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag_/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin la/_nyan thos 
[\[152b.6\]]kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/_/legs so/_/
[\[152b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /_tshul khrims gang srung ba dang /_bzod pa gang sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang sgom pa de yang ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom par byed do/_/de sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/_'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[153a.2\]]gis sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/_/bdag ni sbyin pa dang ldan no/_/bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_/bdag gis tshul khrims bsgom par bya'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan no/_/bdag gis bzod par bya'o/_/bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[153a.3\]]bzod pa dang ldan no/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan no/_/bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/_bdag gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o/_/bdag ni bsam gtan 
[\[153a.4\]]dang ldan no/_/bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo/_/bdag gis shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/_/bdag ni shes rab dang ldan no/_/snyam ste/_de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do/_/sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed do/_/bdag gi sbyin pa'o snyam du rlom sems 
[\[153a.5\]]su byed do/_/de bzhin du/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab rlom sems su byed do/_/shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed do/_/bdag gi shes rab bo snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[153a.6\]]zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[153a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha mthar phyin pa yin na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni pha 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'i pha mtha' yang mi shes/_pha rol yang mi shes pa'i phyir te/_de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[153b.2\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges 
[\[153b.3\]]par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji ltar thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pas thog ma 
[\[153b.4\]]kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /_thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims srung bar byed/_thabs la mi mkhas pas bzod pa sgom par byed/_thabs la mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed/_
[\[153b.5\]]thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab sgom par byed cing /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no/_/'di la sbyin par bya'o/_/sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/_/bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo/_/bdag gis brtson 
[\[153b.6\]]'grus brtsam mo/_/bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/_/bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o/_/shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o snyam ste/_de sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed/_sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o 
[\[153b.7\]]snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/_tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/bzod pa rlom sems su byed/_bzod pas rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni bzod pa 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/_brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/_bsam gtan gyis 
[\[154a.2\]]rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/shes rab rlom sems su byed/_shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/_bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ci ltar rnam 
[\[154a.3\]]par rtog pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha mthar phyin pa yin la/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha mthar phyin pa yin 
[\[154a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha mthar phyin pa yin na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni pha mtha' yang 
[\[154a.5\]]mi shes/_pha rol yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa nas/_snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis yongs su ma zin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas/_nyan thos 
[\[154a.6\]]kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pas/_
[\[154a.7\]]nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin la/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing /_bla 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /_shes rab kyi bar tu sgom 
[\[154b.2\]]par byed de/_de 'di snyam du/_bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/_/'di la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_/de sbyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[154b.3\]]sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/_bdag gi sbyin pa'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_bdag gi shes rab bo snyam du rlom sems su mi 
[\[154b.4\]]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[154b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa de dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du pha mthar phyin pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' de yang pha mtha' yang shes/_pha rol yang shes te/_rlom sems su mi byed pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa yin no/_/tshul khrims 
[\[154b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin te/_nyan 
[\[154b.7\]]thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing /_de bzhin du thabs la mkhas 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pas yongs su zin te/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nag po'i phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du dkar po'i phyogs thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa 
[\[155a.2\]]las gru'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[155a.3\]]'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[155a.4\]]pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[155a.5\]]dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen 
[\[155a.6\]]bkur bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du slob par 'dod pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la brten par bya/_bsnyen par bya/_bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de dag kyang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/
[\[155a.7\]]khyod kyis sbyin pa gang dang /_gang sbyin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/_/rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/khyod tshul khrims gang dang /_gang srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs las rtog par ma byed cig_/tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[155b.2\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las rtog par ma byed cig rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam 
[\[155b.3\]]gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las rtog par ma byed cig_/yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[155b.4\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams las rtog par ma byed cig_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[155b.5\]]brgyad las rtog par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang rtog par ma byed cig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang rtog par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs la mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[155b.6\]]pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur zhing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[155b.7\]]tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi rtog_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi rtog_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam la mi rtog mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs 
[\[156a.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni 'dod pa med pa yin pa'i 
[\[156a.3\]]phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig 
[\[156a.4\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[156a.5\]]la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_stobs 
[\[156a.6\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[156a.7\]]pa nyid ni 'dod pa med cing 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/byang chub 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[156b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba dag ni dka' ba bgyid 
[\[156b.3\]]pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing /_bla na med 
[\[156b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bur shes na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[156b.5\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/_bdag 'jig rten gyis skyob par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[156b.6\]]yin no/_/'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi gnas dang /_'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen dang /_'jig rten gyi gling dang /_'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa dang /_'jig rten gyi rten du gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[156b.7\]]pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems can rnams 'gro ba lnga las yongs su grol bar byas nas/_
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang 
[\[157a.2\]]dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[157a.3\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las grol bar byas nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[157a.4\]]dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[157a.5\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag las sems can rnams la skyob cing de dag spong ba'i phyir chos ston te/_de dag gis chos de thos 
[\[157a.6\]]nas rim gyis theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang 
[\[157a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 
[\[157b.2\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol bar byed la/_yongs su bkrol nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[157b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gnas yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos 
[\[157b.4\]]ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad 'dre 
[\[157b.5\]]ba ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin te/_de ni gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yin no/_/gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa yin te/_
[\[157b.6\]]de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa yin te/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 
[\[157b.7\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos ston te/_gzugs kyi pha rol gang 
[\[158a.2\]]yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes chos 
[\[158a.3\]]ston te/_rab 'byor gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad gzugs ji lta ba bzhin lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs 
[\[158a.4\]]par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mi 'gyur lags sam/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis la/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis te/_de bzhin du 'di ni gzugs so/_/
[\[158a.5\]]'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni 'du shes so/_/'di ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bgyi ba dang /_'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[158a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi pha rol ni rnam par rtog pa ci yang med la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang med de/_rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[158a.7\]]chen po rnams chos de lta bu dag la nges par sems shing zhum par yang mi 'gyur la de ltar chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam ste/_de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos de dag ni 'di ltar zhi ba'o/_/'di 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]ltar gya nom pa'o/_/zhes ston par byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[158b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chu klung chen po rnams sam/_rgya mtsho chen po dag nas phyogs gang dag chus yongs su 
[\[158b.3\]]chod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[158b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/_/rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de dag gis chos thams cad yongs su chad do/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de 
[\[158b.5\]]ni 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_lam chad pa dang /_sred pa zad pa dang /_lhag ma med pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_de ni zhi ba'o/_/de ni gya nom pa'o/_/de ni ji lta ba'i bdag nyid yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[158b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par ston pa ni 'jig rten gyi gling yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[158b.7\]]chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]rnams sems can gyi rigs la snying rje chen po bskyed nas gzugs skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[159a.2\]]par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par chos ston te/_de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams 
[\[159a.3\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/_/rang byang chub skye ba 
[\[159a.4\]]med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/_/
[\[159a.5\]]de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[159a.6\]]dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[159a.7\]]par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs ni nam mkha'i tshul can no zhes chos ston cing 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]'chad do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i tshul can no zhes sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i tshul can no zhes chos ston to/_/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 
[\[159b.2\]]'ong ba med pa ste/_de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med do 
[\[159b.3\]]zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med 
[\[159b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te de dag tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi 
[\[159b.5\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/
[\[159b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smon pa med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te rab 
[\[159b.7\]]'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rmi lam la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul can dang mig yor lta bu'i tshul can 
[\[160a.2\]]dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sprul pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang dngos po med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skye ba med pa dang dngos 
[\[160a.3\]]po med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' yas mu med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtha' yas mu med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri 
[\[160a.4\]]ba med pa dang bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbri ba med pa dang bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba med pa 
[\[160a.5\]]dang dor ba med pa'i tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phrad pa med pa dang bral ba med pa dang 'dre ba med pa dang mi 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ba dag la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi 
[\[160a.6\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can gyi tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed las skyes dang shed bu dang byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang slong ba po dang /_shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i tshul can te de 
[\[160a.7\]]dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ba dag gtan med cing sems can dang srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed las skyes dang shed bu dang byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang slong ba po dang shes pa po dang mthong ba po yang gtan med na rab 'byor 'gro ba'am 'od 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ba lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rtag pa ci yang gtan med na 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 
[\[160b.2\]]'da'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can dang sdug pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rtag pa dang bde ba dang /_bdag dang sdug pa gtan med na de dag gi 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i 
[\[160b.3\]]tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang mi sdug pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mi rtag pa gtan med cing sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag med pa'am/_mi sdug pa gtan med na de'i 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga 
[\[160b.4\]]la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po gtan med na 'dod chags lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 
[\[160b.5\]]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po gtan med na zhe sdang lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gti mug gi dngos po gtan med na gti mug lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos 
[\[160b.6\]]thams cad ni lta bar gyur pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po gtan med na lta bar gyur pa lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[160b.7\]]rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[161a.2\]]'byor chos 'ga' la yang g.yo ba med pas 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs gtan med na de'i 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[161a.3\]]du chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gtan mi dmigs na de'i 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 
[\[161a.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan med na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can no/_/rab 
[\[161a.5\]]'byor chos thams cad ni bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med na de'i 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_
[\[161a.6\]]rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gtan med na de'i 'gro ba'am/_
[\[161a.7\]]'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med na de dag gi 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor de bzhin du chos 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]thams cad ni yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[161b.2\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul can te/_de 
[\[161b.3\]]dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'gro ba'am 
[\[161b.4\]]'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/_de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs 
[\[161b.5\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[161b.6\]]kyi phyir spyod spyod pa dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su smin par byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[161b.7\]]gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o//_//
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang /_rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma rnams dang /_rang bzhin du 'gyur ba 
[\[162a.2\]]gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/_mos pa de dag ni 'dod chags bsal 
[\[162a.3\]]bas/_dben pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsal bas/_dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[162a.4\]]ni zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mtshan mas dben 
[\[162a.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can du 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[162a.6\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs pa de dag ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[162a.7\]]dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi rten lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can yin pas sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can 
[\[162b.2\]]thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/zhes go cha de dag 'tshal la de la sems can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor 
[\[162b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/zhes go cha de bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[162b.4\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bas na go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor go cha de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma 
[\[162b.5\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bas na go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor go cha de ni bdag gi ba dang 'brel ba ma yin zhing /_sems can dang /_srog 
[\[162b.6\]]dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_slong ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[162b.7\]]nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtan med la/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dang 'brel ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/zhes go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos thams 
[\[163a.2\]]cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/zhes go cha 'tshal ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su 
[\[163a.3\]]mi mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba de nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang 
[\[163a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa mtshams bkum ste/_sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[163a.5\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang 
[\[163a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas gcig tu mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o zhes zer/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 
[\[163a.7\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 
[\[163b.2\]]thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir go cha bgos pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags te/_de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/_
[\[163b.3\]]gang du yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/_ji ltar yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni gang bsgom pa dang /_gang la bsgom pa dang /_gang gis bsgom pa'i chos 'ga' yongs 
[\[163b.4\]]su grub pa yang mi dmigs te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[163b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[163b.6\]]pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[163b.7\]]bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[164a.2\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi bsgom pa rnam par 'jig 
[\[164a.3\]]pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[164a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[164a.5\]]lam bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni stobs bcu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas 
[\[164a.6\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[164a.7\]]'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bzhin te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/rab 
[\[164b.2\]]'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam zhes/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[164b.3\]]sbyar te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag 
[\[164b.4\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam/_ci 
[\[164b.5\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni gzhan gyis smras pa dang gzhan gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta'am/_ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[164b.6\]]zab mo 'di la spyod pa de gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'am/_ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sam/_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang 
[\[164b.7\]]ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sam/_ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/_ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/_
[\[165a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/_mi skrag gam/_mi dngang ngam/_dngang bar mi 'gyur ram/_zhum par mi 'gyur ram/_'gong bar mi 'gyur ram/_de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur ram/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi 'bral lam shes rab 
[\[165a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la mngon par dga'am/_thos nas kyang 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed dam/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed dam zhes brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[165a.4\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sdon gyi dus na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba byas pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig 
[\[165a.5\]]par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/_mi skrag_/mi dngang /_dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing /_zhum par mi 'gyur/_'gong bar mi 'gyur te/_yid phyir 
[\[165a.6\]]ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[165a.7\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/_mi skrag_/mi dngang /_dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing /_zhum par mi 'gyur/_'gong bar mi 'gyur te/_de'i yid phyir phyogs par yang mi 'gyur ba lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rnam par spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[165b.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[165b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang /_stong pa nyid la 'bab pa dang /_stong pa nyid la bab pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang /_
[\[165b.4\]]smon pa med pa la gzhol ba dang /_sems kyi rgyud nam mkha' la gzhol ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang /_sems kyi 
[\[165b.5\]]rgyud de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la gzhol bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud rmi 
[\[165b.6\]]lam lta bu la gzhol ba dang /_sprul pa lta bu la gzhol bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la 
[\[165b.7\]]gzhol bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin no/_/zhes bgyi ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud rmi lam lta bu'i bar la gzhol bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]spyod pa yin no/_/zhes bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gzugs la yang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid pa lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[166a.2\]]pa la yang rnam par dpyod par bgyid lags sam/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rnam 
[\[166a.3\]]par dpyod par mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yang rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 
[\[166a.4\]]rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang ma byas/_'gyur bar ma byas/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song /_gang na yang mi 'dug la/_yul na yang mi gnas/_phyogs 
[\[166a.5\]]na yang mi gnas te/_de la ni grangs dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba mi dmigs la/_gang la grangs dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba mi dmigs pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus te/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[166a.6\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 
[\[166a.7\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa dang /_tshor ba nyid dang /_'du shes nyid dang /_'du byed nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig go/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_
[\[166b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig go/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[166b.3\]]dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin no/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[166b.4\]]pa khri brgyad stong pa las 'dod chags 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa/_de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i tsan 
[\[166b.5\]]dan gyi phye ma blangs shing /_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[166b.6\]]phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[166b.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]yin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/
[\[167a.2\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gcig ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/zhes ston pa 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang 
[\[167a.3\]]chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/_brtag mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags la/_zhib zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa lags te/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags so/_/de skad 
[\[167a.4\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[167a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi bar nyid kyang rnam pa 
[\[167a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas so/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de 
[\[167a.7\]]bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/_de bzhin 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]gshegs pa phrin las chung ngu la thugs gzhol te/_chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye ma 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/_brtag mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin la/_
[\[167b.2\]]zhib zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin te/_de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing gang du yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/_/
[\[167b.3\]]lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa dang chos kyi dbyings zab pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_
[\[167b.4\]]'gro ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_bdag zab pa nyid dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar 
[\[167b.5\]]du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_
[\[167b.6\]]bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/dran 
[\[167b.7\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du zab pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir/_lha'i bu dag kye ma chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma
