[\[227b.5\]]bden pa'i tshig des/_mi ma yin pa 'di gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces/_de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byed pa de la/_bdud sdig can 'di snyam du/_ji ltar mi ma yin pa de/_'di nas gud du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam du spro ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bdud sdig 
[\[227b.6\]]can ni/_shin tu mthu dang ldan zhing shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa yin la/_mi ma yin pa de ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir te/_de'i phyir bdud sdig can de'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de gud du song bar gyur ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi 
[\[227b.7\]]mthus mi ma yin pa de 'di nas gud du song ngo snyam zhing /_bdud kyi mthus mi ma yin pa de de nas/_gud du song bar ni ma shes nas/_de byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la 'di snyam du bdag ni/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin gyis/_'di dag gzhan ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma yin no snyam nas rlom sems su byed/_'phya bar byed/_sting bar byed/_'khrug par byed/_smod par byed de/_
[\[228a.2\]]de de tsam gyis nga rgyal 'phel ba dang /_nga rgyal skyed par 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ring du byed/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa yang ring du byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar thabs la mi mkhas pa de ni/_de tsam gyis lhag pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[228a.3\]]skyed par 'gyur bas na/_de'i sa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bdud kyi las 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la 
[\[228a.4\]]de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsten par mi 'gyur/_bsnyen par mi 'gyur phyir 'brang bar mi 'gyur/_goms par byed par mi 'gyur/_bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur zhing /_bdud kyis bcing ba de nyid dam por byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha 
[\[228a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad cing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[228a.6\]]drug la ma spyad cing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_skyon med par ma zhugs pa'i bar gyi drung du bdud sdig can ming gis byin gyis brlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig can cha byad gang yang rung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ong nas/_
[\[228a.7\]]'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin te/_khyod kyi ming ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/khyod kyi ma'i ming ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/khyod kyi pha'i ming ni 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'di zhes bya'o/_/khyod kyi phu nu'i ming ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/khyod kyi mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi ming ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/khyod kyi phyi mo dang /_mes po gnyis kyi bdun rgyud tshun chad kyi bar gyi ming ni 'di zhes bya'o zhes nye bar ston cing 
[\[228b.2\]]khyod ni ljongs ga ge mo zhig dang /_khyod ni grong khyer ga ge mo zhig dang /_khyod ni grong ga ge mo zhig dang /_khyod ni yul ga ge mo zhig nas/_ljongs ga ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/grong khyer ga ge mo zhig dang /_grong ga ge mo zhig tu skye ba yin no zhes zer zhing /_gal te de rang bzhin 
[\[228b.3\]]gyis dman pa zhig yin na/_de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'di bzhin du dman pa nyid du gyur pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/gal te rno ba zhig yin na yang /_de 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'di bzhin du rno ba nyid du gyur to zhes zer ro/_/gal te dgon pa pa zhig yin nam/_gal te bsod 
[\[228b.4\]]snyoms pa zhig yin nam/_gal te phyag dar khrod ba zhig yin nam/_gal te zas phyis mi len pa zhig yin nam/_gal te stan gcig pa zhig yin nam/_gal te rnyed pas chog shes pa'i bsod snyoms pa zhig yin nam/_gal te dur khrod pa zhig yin nam/_gal te bla 
[\[228b.5\]]gab med pa zhig yin nam/_gal te shing drung pa zhig yin nam/_gal te cog pu pa zhig yin nam/_gal te gzhi ji bzhin pa zhig yin nam/_gal te chos gos gsum pa zhig yin nam/_gal te 'dod pa chung ba zhig yin nam/_gal te chog shes pa zhig yin nam/_
[\[228b.6\]]gal te rab tu dben pa zhig yin nam/_gal te rkang pa skud pa dang bral ba zhig yin nam/_gal te smra ba nyung ba zhig yin na yang de 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'di ltar smra ba nyung ba nyid du gyur to zhes zer ro/_/gal te brjod pa nyung ba zhig yin na yang de 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 
[\[228b.7\]]'di bzhin du brjod pa nyung ba nyid du gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar khyod la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag yod pa las na/_gdon mi za bar sngon yang khyod sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_legs par sdom pa 'di dag dang ldan par ma gyur mi srid pa'i phyir 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ro zhes zer ro/_/de de ltar sngon gyi ming bstan pa dang rus bstan pa/_de dang da ltar byung ba'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa des rlom sems skye bar 'gyur te/_der yang bdud sdig can 'ong zhing 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la sbyangs pa'i yon tan ji ltar 
[\[229a.2\]]yod pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung bstan to zhes zer zhing /_yang na dge slong gi cha byad du sgyur cing 'ong ngo /_yang na dge slong 
[\[229a.3\]]ma'i cha byad du sgyur cing 'ong ngo /_yang na khyim bdag gi cha byad du sgyur cing 'ong ngo /_yang na ma'i cha byad du sgyur cing 'ong ngo /_yang na pha'i cha byad du sgyur cing 'ong ngo /_'ongs nas kyang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[229a.4\]]rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gang yin pa de dag khyod la yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer la/_rab 'byor ngas phyir mi ldog 
[\[229a.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang mtshan ma rnams bstan pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la med na/_rab 'byor de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[229a.6\]]rnams kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang /_rtags gang yin pa dang /_mtshan 
[\[229a.7\]]ma gang yin pa de dag kyang de la med la/_ming bstan pa des kyang de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la rlom sems su byed/_'phya bar byed/_sting bar byed/_khyad du gsod par byed cing /_smod par byed pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor ming bstan pa de 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[229b.2\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas/_phung po'i bdud mi shes te/_gzugs mi shes/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi shes pa'i phyir te/_de la bdud sdig can ming gi byin gyis 
[\[229b.3\]]brlabs kyis lung ston par 'gyur te/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du ming 'di skad ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ming gang rjes su brtag pa dang /_rjes su dpyad pa 
[\[229b.4\]]de nyid rjod par byed de/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can/_thabs la mi mkhas pa de 'di snyam du bdag gis ming gang yin gyi rjes su brtags shing /_rjes su dpyad pa de nyid bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[229b.5\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming du 'gyur ro snyam nas/_ji lta ji ltar bdud sdig can nam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'am/_bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dge slong dag gis bstan pa na/_de 'di snyam du ji ltar bdag gis sems bskyed pa 'byung ba 
[\[229b.6\]]dang /_bdag gi ming ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong 'di bstan te/_ming dang /_ming du 'thun pas na/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no snyam du 
[\[229b.7\]]sems la/_rab 'byor ngas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la med cing /_rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dag dang yang bral la ming bstan pa des kyang /_nga rgyal skyed cing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la rlom sems su byed/_brnyas par byed na/_de rlom sems dang brnyas pa dang /_khyad du gsod pa des/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[230a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ring du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar thabs la mkhas pa dang bral zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa de'i sa ni rnam pa gnyis su shes 
[\[230a.3\]]par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/yang na shin tu yun ring por 'khyams shing 'khor bar 'khor 'khor nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[230a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de gal te dga' ba dang /_yid rangs pas yang dang yang du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lta ba rnyed cing de la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur yang /_gal te de'i lus rnyed pa des sems bskyed pa snga ma de dag la smod par mi byed cing /_'chag par mi byed na/_de'i sa 
[\[230a.5\]]yang rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong zhig la ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/_dge sbyong ma yin/_shAkya'i sras ma yin te/_de ni lus de 
[\[230a.6\]]nyid kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po gang yang rung ba dag 'thob pa'i skal ba med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ming bstan pa tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pas sems bskyed cing /_ming tsam brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa' gzhan 
[\[230a.7\]]dag la rlom sems su byed la/_brnyas par byed pa de ni de bas kyang shin tu lci ba ste/_sems bskyed pa de ni de bas shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba bzhi lta zhog gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i ming bstan pa tsam gyis/_rlom sems dang ldan pas 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]sems bskyed pa de ni/_mtshams med pa lnga bas kyang shin tu lci ba yin te/_sems bskyed pa de ni de bas kyang shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na ming bstan pas bdud kyi las phra mo de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can byang 
[\[230b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa'i yon tan dag rjod cing 'ong bar 'gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang 'di skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dben pa'i yon tan dag gsung ba'o zhes zer te/_rab 'byor nga ni 'di lta ste/_dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab dang /_bas 
[\[230b.3\]]mtha'i gnas mal dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa yin par mi smra'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal dag dben pa ma lags na/_byang chub sems 
[\[230b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan gang zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ji lta bu zhig mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[230b.5\]]chen po nyan thos dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis dben zhing /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis dben na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa yin te/_dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu gnas 
[\[230b.6\]]pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa ste/_ngas rjes su gnang ba yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa 'dis nyin mtshan du gnas pa ni/_
[\[230b.7\]]dben pa nyid du gnas pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i dben pa 'di dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal rnams su gnas pa ni dben pa nyid du gnas pa yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa 'dis/_grong 'dab tu gnas na yang dben pa nyid du gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de la/_bdud sdig can gyis dgon pa dang /_nags 
[\[231a.2\]]'dab dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal rnams su gnas par bya'o zhes ston par byed do/_/de dben pa des nyan thos dang ldan pa yid la byed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la byed pa dang 'dres pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi brtson zhing /_rnam pa thams 
[\[231a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de de lta de yid la byed pa yongs su ma dag par gnas pa des gnas shing /_de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag grong 'dab na gnas shing sems dang /_yid la byed pa yongs su 
[\[231a.4\]]dag pa/_nyan thos kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa/_de las gzhan pa'i sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa dag dang /_ma 'dres pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[231a.5\]]shes pa dang /_yongs su shes pa dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de dag la rlom sems su byed do/_/gzhan yang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa/_gdug pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dag med pa/_
[\[231a.6\]]chom rkun gyi gnod pa dag med pa/_srin po rgyu ba'i lam gyi mngon sum du bab pa ma yin pa/_de lta bu'i nang du lo'am/_lo brgya'am/_lo stong ngam/_lo 'bum 'am/_lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'am/_de bas kyang lhag par gnas su zin kyang /_dben pa gang gis byang 
[\[231a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs shing /_gnas pa'i dben pa de mi shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dres pa nyid du gnas pa yin te/_dben pa de la chags shing zhen par gnas pas kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]pa can nyid yin zhing /_des de tsam gyi nga'i sems rangs par byed pa ma yin te/_ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dben pa bshad pa gang yin pa'i dben pa de dang de mi ldan zhing /_de ni dben pa de la mi snang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni dben 
[\[231b.2\]]pa des mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i drung du bdud sdig can 'ongs shing /_steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dben pa ma nor ba yin gyi/_khyod dben pa 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang /_khyod 
[\[231b.3\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de dben pa de bas kyang dben pa gces par sems shing de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong rnams dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_dge ba'i chos can gzhan 
[\[231b.4\]]dag la tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'dres par gnas pas gnas pa yin no zhes rlom sems su byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dben pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de dag la 'dres par gnas pas skul bar byed/_rlom sems su byed de/_gang 
[\[231b.5\]]dag 'dres par gnas pas gnas pa de dag ni dben par gnas pas spyod pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing /_gang la zhes bskyed par bya ba de dag la zhes skyed par mi byed cing /_de la nga rgyal skyed par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gnas pa gang gis gnas pa'i gnas 
[\[231b.6\]]pa 'di ni/_yang dag pa nyid yin pas na/_bdag la mi ma yin rnams skul bar byed cing /_bdag la mi ma yin pa rnams dran par byed kyi/_grong 'dab na gnas pa dag lta la su zhig skul zhing /_dran par byed par 'gyur snyam du sems pa'i phyir te/_byang chub sems 
[\[231b.7\]]dpa' de ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gzhan dag la rlom sems su byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ltar bcos pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi chom rkun pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/dge sbyong gi cha byad kyis lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la rkun po yin par rig par bya'o/_/byang 
[\[232a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams kyi chom rkun pa yin par rig par bya ste/_de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag ni bsnyen par mi bya/_bsten par mi bya/_bsnyen bkur mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gang zag de lta bu ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig 
[\[232a.3\]]par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma btang zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su ma btang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag 
[\[232a.4\]]pa'i bsam pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang sems can thams cad kyi don byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag dag la bsnyen par mi bya/_
[\[232a.5\]]bsten par mi bya/_bsnyen bkur mi bya ste/_gzhan du na rtag tu 'khor bas yid byung ba dang /_yid dngas pa dang /_khams gsum dang /_ma 'dres pas rang gi don sbyar ba la rjes su brtson par bya'o/_/de nyid la yang byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de nyid la yang 
[\[232a.6\]]snying brtse ba dang snying rje bskyed par bya'o/_dga' ba dang btang snyoms bskyed par bya'o/_/ci nas kyang bdag la skyon de lta bu dag thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/gal te byung na yang myur ba nyid 
[\[232a.7\]]du spang bar bya'o zhes bslab par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rang gi mngon par shes pas rtul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya/_bsten par bya/_bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[232b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags par rig par bgyi ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor sangs 
[\[232b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[232b.4\]]rab 'byor nyan thos rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug smra ba dang /_rjod pa dang /_ston pa dang /_'dogs pa dang /_'god pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_
[\[232b.5\]]rnam par 'grel pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston par byed pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[232b.6\]]po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[232b.7\]]de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ston pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam du rig par 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgron ma'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang gsal lo/_blo'o/_/shes pa'o/_/shes rab bo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyob pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyabs so/_/
[\[233a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pha'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag ni bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[233a.3\]]cad spang bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na/_byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[233a.4\]]ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur pa yin la/_rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[233a.5\]]'das de dag gi yang yab dang /_yum du 'gyur ba yin zhing /_rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[233a.6\]]ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na/_byang chub 
[\[233a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/_bsdu ba'i 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pa rnams so/_/rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[233b.2\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang /_pha dang ma dang /_gnas dang skyob pa dang /_gling dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen yin no zhes smra'o/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[233b.3\]]po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gnas par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi som nyi gcod par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya 
[\[233b.4\]]bar 'dod pas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[233b.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni 
[\[233b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[233b.7\]]mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad kyang mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nyid kyis chos thams cad kyang yod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben la/_chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi 
[\[234a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des/_chos thams cad kyang yod pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_dben pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[234a.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa lags la/_chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ji ltar mchis par gyur lags/_
[\[234a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur la/_stong pa nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur lags pas/_dben pa dang /_stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[234a.5\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur lags te/_dben pas kyang stong pa nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang dben pa la/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[234a.6\]]rgya ba'i chos gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di'i don ji ltar rtog par bgyi lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[234a.7\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can 'di dag yun ring po nas ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod spyod pa yin snyama'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de ltar lags te/_sems can 'di 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dag ni yun ring po nas ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod spyod pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dag dben pa yin zhing /_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_ngar yir 
[\[234b.2\]]'dzin pa dag stong pa yin snyama'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dben pa lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa stong pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_ngar yir 
[\[234b.3\]]'dzin pa'i sems can rnams 'phyan zhing 'khor snyama'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de ltar lags te/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams 'phyan zhing 'khor lags 
[\[234b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'phyan pa'i sems can rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa yang yod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang /_ngar yir 'dzin pa med pa de la 'dzin pa med 
[\[234b.5\]]de sems can de dag ni 'khor bar mi 'phyan zhing mi 'khor ro/_/gang la 'khor bar 'phyan pa med pa dang /_'khor ba med pa de la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na rnam par byang ba yang yod pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[234b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la mi spyod lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi 
[\[234b.7\]]spyod lags so/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar la mi spyod lags so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar la mi spyod lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gang spyod pa'am/_gang gis spyod pa'am/_gang la spyod par bgyi ba'i chos 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]de dag thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thul ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 
[\[235a.2\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de ni zil gyis non pa'i gnas 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la gnas pa'i 
[\[235a.3\]]slad du/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pas/_gnas pa ni zil gyis non par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam 
[\[235a.4\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_mi'i lus thob nas kyang /_bla na 
[\[235a.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur nas/_de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed de/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_
[\[235a.6\]]yo byad dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams 
[\[235a.7\]]mang du skyed par 'gyur snyama'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/_gnas shing gzhan dag la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad par byed/_ston par byed/_'dogs par byed/_'god par byed/_rnam par 'grel par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_gsal bar byed cing /_yang dag par rab tu ston par 
[\[235b.2\]]byed pa de/_ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag ci snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de 
[\[235b.3\]]dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[235b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la bkod cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur snyama'am/_rab 'byor 
[\[235b.5\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gnas shing 
[\[235b.6\]]gzhan dag la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'chad par byed/_ston par byed/_'dogs par byed/_'god par byed/_rnam par 'grel par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_gsal bar byed cing yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa de/_ches bsod nams mang du 
[\[235b.7\]]skyed par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/_byang chub sems 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i sems can gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed cing /_de dag shes rab kyi 
[\[236a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sems can thams cad gsad par gyur pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong nas/_de dag snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub par byed de/_de dag gnas pa des gnas shing /_dga' bas rab tu dga' bar byed cing /_de dag dga' ba chen 
[\[236a.3\]]po mngon par sgrub par byed kyang /_de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig mi gnas par de dag btang snyoms chen po thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yin te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[236a.4\]]tu phyin pa'i snang ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang /_sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur 
[\[236a.5\]]pa yang yin la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog go/_/gang gis gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag yongs su spyad na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed 
[\[236a.6\]]pas gnas la/_sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa de dag yongs su sbyong zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pas na/_de'i yo byad de dag ni 'bras bu che ba dang /_phan yon che bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na/_byang chub sems 
[\[236a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par spyod par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad la lam nye bar ston par 'dod pa dang /_snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pa dang /_sems can bcings par gyur pa rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig nye bar ston par 'dod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan 
[\[236b.2\]]pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis yid la byed cing gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis yid la byed na des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi gtam yang brjod par bya'o/_/des shes rab 
[\[236b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi gtam brjod nas kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi yid la byed pa dag gis yid la bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis yid la byed pas gnas pa des yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi go skabs mi 
[\[236b.4\]]dbye bar ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pas yid la byed pa de dag gi brtson pa mi btang bar nyin mtshan du gnas par byed pa de ltar bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i mi zhig yod la/_des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po 
[\[236b.5\]]che rnyed par gyur te des nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas/_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur pa las des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/_de gzhi de las sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[236b.6\]]rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/_e ma'o kyi hud bdag ni nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to snyam du nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang 'di ni rin po che yin no snyam du bsam 
[\[236b.7\]]zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyid pa thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]lags la/_yid la bgyid pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyid pa dag dang ma bral ba gyur pa lags/_bral ba 
[\[237a.2\]]la ni byang chub sems dpa' dang yid la bgyid pa dag dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub 
[\[237a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de dag ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_
[\[237a.4\]]chos skyon med pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa nyid yin no/_/zhes bya bar shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no/_/
[\[237a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben zhing /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas na/_de la rnam par 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_gal te shes 
[\[237a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsgrub par bgyis shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[237a.7\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrubs kyang /_rnam par 'phel ba'am/_yongs su 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]'grib pa med de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang rnam par 'phel ba'am/_yongs su 'grib pa med la/_chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par 'phel ba'am/_yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_gcig kyang 
[\[237b.2\]]ma yin la gnyis kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gal te de ltar bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong /_mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 
[\[237b.3\]]la gnas shing mthar thug par 'gro ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[237b.4\]]phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_ya ma brla nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[237b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos 'ga' yang dmigs su mchis lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[237b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong 
[\[237b.7\]]pa nyid las gzhan pa zhig stong pa nyid la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 
[\[238a.2\]]bar dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_ya ma brla nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[238a.3\]]ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[238a.4\]]'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_ya ma brla nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bka' 
[\[238a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 
[\[238a.6\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam mam/_
[\[238a.7\]]gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis gang la byang chub sems dpas spyad par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems khyod kyis gang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i chos de la chos 'ga' zhig dmigs su yod snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du 
[\[238b.2\]]sems/_chos gang dmigs su med pa de la skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur pa yod snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin te/_rab 
[\[238b.3\]]'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa yin te/_byang chub sems 
[\[238b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgrubs cing de ltar spyod pa dang /_de ltar 'bad cing de ltar rtsol bas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes dang /_ye shes chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas 
[\[238b.5\]]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas na/_'di ltar de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de la gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[238b.6\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan 
[\[238b.7\]]par 'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba'i slad du yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mi 'gyur 
[\[239a.2\]]la/_skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[239a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom 
[\[239a.4\]]ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis 
[\[239a.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[239a.6\]]dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa ni 'di snyam du bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/'dis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[239a.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la rnam par rtog pa/_de dag thams cad du mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_rnam par rtog pa spang bar bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[239b.2\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_shin tu dben pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa/_mthong bar dka' ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba/_brtag mi nus pa/_rtog ges spyod pa ma lags pa/_zhib mo 
[\[239b.3\]]brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig par bgyi ba'i bar dag lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid 
[\[239b.4\]]cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[239b.5\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[239b.6\]]rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan 
[\[239b.7\]]par gyur cing /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]kun chub par byed la bzung zhing bcangs la/_blang bar byed nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed na/_kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba de la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char 
[\[240a.2\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha 
[\[240a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog la kun chub par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed 
[\[240a.4\]]pa/_de dag gis ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_mngon par shis pa lnga dang ldan 
[\[240a.5\]]pa de dag zil gyis non pa yin no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi 
[\[240a.6\]]lam dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag zil gyis non na gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[240a.7\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_bzung zhing bcangs la klag shing /_kun chub par byed nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gyis non par 'gyur ba'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[240b.2\]]rten nyi tshe zil gyis non par 'gyur ba yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 
[\[240b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang mi ldan zhing /_
[\[240b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[240b.5\]]gang dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang mi ldan zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de byang chub sems 
[\[240b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang mi ldan zhing /_shes rab 
[\[240b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba dag kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis non par 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[241a.2\]]de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed par gnas pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgrub pa de dag ni byang 
[\[241a.3\]]chub kyi snying po las ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can bying ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste nyan thos 
[\[241a.4\]]kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/_/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang 'gro bar sems shing 'ongs nas kyang 'di skad du skyen par slobs shig_/myur du slobs 
[\[241a.5\]]shig lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bzhes pa yin pas khyod byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[241a.6\]]rgyas nas kyang blang bar bya ba yin no/_/zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/
[\[241a.7\]]kho bo yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i bu rab 'thab bral yang /_'thab bral ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]sems so/_/de bzhin du lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang /_lha'i bu dbang sgyur dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/de bzhin du lha'i bu 'od gsal yang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro 
[\[241b.2\]]bar sems so/_/de bzhin du dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che dang /_mi gdung dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_gya nom snang dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'gro bar sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi 
[\[241b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de la ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod 
[\[241b.4\]]pa de'i lus la ni/_'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[241b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan yin no/_/de'i lus la 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/_mig nad dang /_rna ba'i nad dang /_sna nad dang /_lce nad dang /_so nad dang /_lus kyi nad dang /_sems kyi nad gang ji snyed pa 
[\[241b.6\]]de dag thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di'i yon tan du shes par bya ba yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_ci lha'i 
[\[241b.7\]]dbang po brgya byin 'di dag rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar kho bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus yin pa rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[242a.2\]]stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus yin no/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems 
[\[242a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can de dag thams 
[\[242a.4\]]cad 'di snyam du ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing /_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ram/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_
[\[242a.5\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ram/_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/_'on te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam du the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[242a.6\]]gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[242a.7\]]dpa' chen po spa bkong bar bya ba dang /_spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /_sems zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang rnam par g.yeng bar bya ba'i phyir/_skar mda' gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur lags sam/_bcom 
[\[242b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig gi drung du ni bdud sdig can 
[\[242b.3\]]tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gi drung du ni 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta bu dag gi drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur 
[\[242b.4\]]la/_ji lta bu dag gi drung du ni mchi bar mi 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/_sems mos par ma gyur pa 
[\[242b.5\]]de dag gi drung du ni bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/_'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam 'on te 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[242b.6\]]ma yin snyam du the tshom za bar gyur na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi drung du yang bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[242b.7\]]dag dang bral bar gyur na/_des dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag mi mthong bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so/_/ma thos na mi shes pas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsgom par bya zhes de bzhin nyid du sgrub par mi byed do/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/_dam pa ma yin pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed de/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed 
[\[243a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi bsngags pa brjod na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du gang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi bsngags pa brjod pa 'di ni bdag gi grogs yin 
[\[243a.3\]]te/_gang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po dag gi nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag kyang /_'di lta ste/_sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/_
[\[243a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dag la gnas par 'gyur bas na/_'di ni bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no snyam du sems so/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta bu dag la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[243a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/_'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pas na/_khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kun chub 
[\[243a.6\]]par bya ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_ci rung ngas kyang da dung 'di'i gting ma rnyed na/_khyod kyis lta rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes zer na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[243a.7\]]gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la rlom sems su byed do/_kho bo ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin gyi/_khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kho bo ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa yin gyi/_khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[243b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po bdag la bstod par sems na/_de'i tshe bdud sdig can dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la yang bdud sdig can 
[\[243b.3\]]gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming smos sam/_rus smos te/_yongs su bsgrags nas ming smos pa'am/_rus smos pa des de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des pa dge ba'i chos can dag la rlom sems 
[\[243b.4\]]su byed cing /_bdag stod par byed/_gzhan smod par byed la/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma gang yin pa'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med la/_de rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag med 
[\[243b.5\]]bzhin du nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag la stod par byed/_gzhan la smod par byed do/_/ji ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la yang dag par snang ba ltar/_khyod ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[243b.6\]]rigs la yang dag par mi snang ngo zhes/_de des byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la brnyas shing smod par byed na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag la gnas kyang stong par mi 'gyur la/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[243b.7\]]gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dag kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/snyam du sems shing /_bdud sdig can gyis ci nas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byin gyis rlob par byed 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]do/_/de'i tshig gzung bar 'os pa/_de la 'gro ba mang po dag kyang mnyan par bya bar sems te/_de dag gis de la mnyan cing /_dad par bya bar bsam pas de dag gis de mthong ba na 'thun par byed de/_de dag gis de mthong nas rjes su 'thun 
[\[244a.2\]]par spyod cing de dag de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas/_nyon mongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de ltar de dag sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las gang dang /_gang brtsams pa de thams cad 
[\[244a.3\]]kyang mi 'dod pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba nyid du 'gyur te/_de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi 
[\[244a.4\]]gnas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas na/_bdud sdig can yid rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i 
[\[244a.5\]]gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /_lhan cig rtsod par byed na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du/_a la la rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa yin te/_'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar mi 
[\[244a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin gyi 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam yin la/_'di ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam 
[\[244a.7\]]yin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gal te/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan dang /_'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]'thab pa dang rtsod pa dag byed par gyur na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du 'di gnyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa yin te/_'di gnyis kyis ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[244b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yin gyi/_gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam 
[\[244b.3\]]yin pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan zhig lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems kyis sems skyed par byed cing /_'thab mo dang /_'khrug long dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa 
[\[244b.4\]]byed la/_gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma btang na/_des ji snyed du 'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa de snyed kyi bskal par des go cha bgo bar bya dgos so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[244b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag la nges par 'byung ba mchis sam/_'on te de snyed kyi bskal pa kho nar go cha bgo bar bgyi 'tshal lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[244b.6\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo ngas ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/_
[\[244b.7\]]kun dga' bo de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang khro ba dang /_spyo bar byed cing 'thabs shing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang 'chags par mi byed par mdud par 'dzin cing /_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bag la nyal bas gnas par byed na/_kun dga' bo gang zag de la ni nges par 'byung ba yod par nga mi smra ste/_gang zag des ni gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtong na/_de snyed kyi bskal par gdon mi za bar go cha bgo bar bya dgos so/_/kun 
[\[245a.2\]]dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'thabs shing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang 'chags par byed cing /_bag la nyal bas mi gnas te/_bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nges par thob ste/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal 
[\[245a.3\]]dgos na smras pa la bdag gis phyir smra ba dang /_'di ltar bdag sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/_bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlog na ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya bar/_bdag lug ltar lkugs par bya zhing mi smra bar bya'o/_/
[\[245a.4\]]bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dkrug par mi bya ste/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na/_de bdag nyid la bdag gnod sems skyed pa dang /_de 
[\[245a.5\]]bdag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa byed pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de dag la gnod sems mi skyed cing /_bdag gis de dag la 'khrug pa mi bya'o/_/zhes phyin cad kyang sdom pa 'dzin par byed na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par 'byung 
[\[245a.6\]]ba dang bcas pa yin no zhes nga smra ste/_de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/_/gal te gnas na yang gang 
[\[245a.7\]]la yang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang gis/_'di dag la gnod sems bskyed pa'am/_'khrug par bya ba ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di dag bdag bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar bya dgos pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[245b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du ji ltar gnas par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ston pa la ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub 
[\[245b.3\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi grogs yin te theg pa gcig la zhugs pa yin zhing 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de ltar bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos la/_'dis gang la bslab par 
[\[245b.4\]]bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas 'dres par gnas na/_bdag gis de la 
[\[245b.5\]]bslab par mi bya'i/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas na/_bdag gis kyang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam ste/_de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[245b.6\]]dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_bslab pa mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_
[\[245b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dang /_de 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[246a.2\]]shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du yang byang chub kyis stong ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin te/_mnyam pa nyid de la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[246a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa 
[\[246a.4\]]lags sam/_gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_gzugs 'gog pa'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[246a.5\]]slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dag bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skye ba 
[\[246a.6\]]ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_skye ba 
[\[246a.7\]]ma mchis pa'i bar gyi slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_byang chub kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]la slob pa lags sam/_de bzhin du thams cad la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_gang gzugs zad par bya ba'i 
[\[246b.2\]]phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/_skye ba med pa'i bar du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa 
[\[246b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/_skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/_byang chub kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[246b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/_de bzhin du thams cad la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin 
[\[246b.5\]]nyid dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa'i de bzhin nyid de la zad pa'am/_'gag pa'am/_'bri bar 'gyur ba 
[\[246b.6\]]yod snyam mam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob cing /_
[\[246b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin te/_de bzhin nyid la ni zad pa'am/_'gag pa'am/_'bri bar 'gyur ba yang med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la slob pa yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /_rnam pa 
[\[247a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i slob pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thul bar mi nus pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur ba nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[247a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mun pa med par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/_snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[247a.6\]]su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dag la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lan gsum du bzlas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i phyir slob pa 
[\[247a.7\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo rnam par dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bsten par bya'o/_/zhes slob pa yin te/_rab 'byor 
[\[247b.2\]]sems can dman pa rnams kyis ni bslab pa 'di la slob par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa/_de ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba las 'don par 'dod pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_yul mtha' 'khob rnams su mi skye'o/_/gdol pa'i rigs rnams su mi skye'o/_/zhar bar mi 'gyur/_'theng por mi 'gyur/_'on par mi 'gyur/_lba ba 
[\[247b.4\]]can du mi 'gyur/_gzhogs phyed skam par mi 'gyur/_dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te/_dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_yongs su ma rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod par mi 'gyur/_log par lta ba'i bar du mi 'gyur/_log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho 
[\[247b.5\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/_/tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_lha tshe ring po rnams kyi 
[\[247b.6\]]nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[247b.7\]]pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis mi skye ba'i thabs la mkhas pa de la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dpa' chen po ni/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su dag pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[248a.2\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang zhig gi yongs su dag pa rtogs par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[248a.3\]]'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[248a.4\]]mi zhum mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas/_sems can de dag gi don du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[248a.5\]]chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod de/_rab 'byor chos thams cad la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor
