[\[269a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin la/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[269a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung ba yin zhing kun dga' bo 
[\[269a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar shar phyogs dang /_lho dang nub dang /_byang dang 'og dang /_steng dang phyogs mtshams dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[269a.5\]]chub kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 
[\[269a.6\]]'di dag la bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[269a.7\]]dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rgya cher yongs su gtad pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod yin te/_de ni mi zad pa'i mdzod yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[269b.2\]]rgyas gang dag shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod 'di nyid 
[\[269b.3\]]las chos ston par mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[269b.4\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa 
[\[269b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[269b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te/_chos 
[\[269b.7\]]bstan par gyur la/_chos bstan pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur kyang de tsam gyis ni khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par gyur pa ma yin gyis/_kun 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig tsam rab tu bstan na/_de ni nyan thos khyod kyis nga mnyes par byas shing /_nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas pa yin no/_/kun 
[\[270a.2\]]dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos bstan pa snga ma des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur na/_dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung 
[\[270a.3\]]ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang ba yin snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[270a.4\]]pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la tha na nyi ma gcig tsam/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[270a.5\]]pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston par byed na/_de ni bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog gi_/kun dga' bo gal te nyi ma phyed dam/_kun dga' bo nyi ma phyed lta'ang zhog gi_/gal te snga dro gcig tsam mam/_kun dga' bos snga dro 
[\[270a.6\]]gcig tsam lta'ang zhog gi_/gal te chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar ram/_kun dga' bo chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar lta'ang zhog gi_/gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skad cig gam/_thang cig gam yud 
[\[270a.7\]]tsam zhig gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan par gyur na/_kun dga' bo de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/_des ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis non par 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la tha na nyi ma gcig gam/_nyi ma phyed dam snga dro 'am/_chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar ram skad cig gam/_thang cig gam yud tsam zhig 
[\[270b.2\]]gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan par gyur na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod la/_gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing yang dag par ston pa dang /_yang 
[\[270b.4\]]dag par gzengs stod pa dang /_'dzud pa dang rab tu 'god par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi bar la 
[\[270b.5\]]spyod cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel ba gang gi phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/_skabs ma yin te de ni gnas med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/_bcom 
[\[270b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/_'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[270b.7\]]mngon par 'du mdzad pa/_mngon par mdzad pas 'khor de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas la/_
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]'khor rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa dbang du gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa khur 
[\[271a.2\]]bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag 
[\[271a.3\]]rnams la chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de phyir bsdus te/_rdzu 'phrul de phyir bsdus pa dang /_'khor bzhi po de dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag la sogs pa thams 
[\[271a.4\]]cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang ma mthong 
[\[271a.5\]]sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag kyang mig gi dbang po'i spyod yul du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa slar bsdu ba mdzad pas de'i phyir ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[271a.6\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun de dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag 
[\[271a.7\]]mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun de dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag ni mig lam du yang mi gda' lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]du chos thams cad kyang mig lam du mi snang ba yin te/_chos la chos mi snang ngo /_/chos kyis chos mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang /_nyan thos de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[271b.2\]]theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mig lam du mi snang ba de bzhin du/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang mig lam du mi snang ba yin te/_chos kyis chos mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyis chos kun mi shes te/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni shes pa 
[\[271b.3\]]med pa mthong ba med pa bya ba la mthu med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni snying po med pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang /_gzung ba med pa yin te/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa dang /_gzung ba med pas na/_bsam gyis mi 
[\[271b.4\]]khyab pa yin te/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar rig pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/_chos gang la yang mngon par 
[\[271b.5\]]zhen pa med pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[271b.6\]]pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/_de ltar slob pa ni mchog ces bya'o/_/thu bo zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o/_/rab mchog ces bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/bla na med pa dang /_gong na med pa zhes bya ste/_'jig rten thams cad la 
[\[271b.7\]]phan pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad la bde ba dang /_mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yin te/_de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g.yas pas gyen du bteg cing yang slar gzhog kyang sems can de dag gis/_'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[272a.2\]]gyen du bteg pa'am/_phyir bzhag par yang mi shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bos ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams 
[\[272a.3\]]la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo bslab pa gang ji snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o/_/thu bo dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_
[\[272a.4\]]gya nom pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad dam/_mtha' gzung bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam mtha' gzung bar sems par zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo shes rab kyi 
[\[272a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo ngas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma bstan te/_kun dga' bo ming gi tshogs dang /_tshig gi tshogs dang /_yi ge'i tshogs dag la ni tshad gzung du yod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad 
[\[272a.6\]]gzung du med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis shing /_gzhal du ma mchis pa lags/_bcom 
[\[272a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad par ma gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[272b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu skyed par 'gyur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de 
[\[272b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu skyed 
[\[272b.4\]]kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya bar 'dod du zad de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi 
[\[272b.5\]]zad zad par mi 'gyur la de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur te/_chos de 
[\[272b.6\]]dag la ni skye ba med la chos gang dag la skye ba med pa de dag la zad par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos kun tu khebs par mdzad nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[272b.7\]]kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_ljags kyi dbang po 'di lta bu dang ldan pa log par gsung zhing gzhan du gsung bar 'gyur snyam mam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'khor bzhi po dag la rgya cher ston cig shod cig_/khod cig rab tu khod cig_/rnam par phye shig_/gsal bar gyis shig 
[\[273a.2\]]yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid las rgya cher 
[\[273a.3\]]bstan te de la ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du slob na/_rang rang gi sa dag la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni yi ge thams cad la 'jug go/_/yi ge med pa thams cad la 'jug go/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[273a.4\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo gang dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba'i gzungs thams cad kyi sgo yin te/_gzungs de dag 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni spobs pa dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[273a.5\]]rig pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod mi zad pa yin par ngas bstan to/_/kun dga' bo de lta 
[\[273a.6\]]bas na mos par byas shing khong du chud par bya ste/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[273a.7\]]gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzungs yin par ngas bstan te/_khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzungs 'di gzung na/_chos thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]khri brgyad stong pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[273b.2\]]rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab ste/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu gor ma chag go snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa lags sam/_
[\[273b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad do/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab 
[\[273b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi zad pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa'i 
[\[273b.5\]]phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi zad pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs dang nam mkha' 
[\[273b.6\]]mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/tshor ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[273b.7\]]'du shes dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/'du byed rnams dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor phung po rnams dang /_
[\[274a.2\]]nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pa dang /_skye mched dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[274a.3\]]chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor ma 
[\[274a.4\]]rig pa dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'du byed dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi 
[\[274a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor ming dang /_gzugs dang nam 
[\[274a.6\]]mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor skye mched drug dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[274a.7\]]pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor reg pa dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor srid pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor len pa dang nam 
[\[274b.2\]]mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor srid pa dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 
[\[274b.3\]]bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor skye ba dang /_nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid 
[\[274b.4\]]mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon 
[\[274b.5\]]par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba dang /_thog ma dang /_tha ma rnam par spangs pa la rnam par lta ba yin no/_/de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[274b.6\]]la rnam par lta ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos yin te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de ltar lta bas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la la nam mkha' ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul 'dis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur te/_de ni bla na med pa 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang la la phyir ldog par gyur na/_des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa la ma brten pas phyir ldog pa yin te/_rab 
[\[275a.2\]]'byor des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_ji ltar nam mkha' ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang /_mngon par bsgrub par bya ba mi shes so/_/rab 
[\[275a.3\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang la la phyir ldog pa de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa 'di la ma brten pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla 
[\[275a.4\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten cing thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[275a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_nam mkha' ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par blta bar bya mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten cing 'brel 
[\[275a.6\]]par 'byung ba la de ltar rnam par lta bas ni rgyu med par skye ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/'gag pa rtag pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos gang yang bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_
[\[275a.7\]]shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]bsngal ba dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_bdag med pa dang /_/zhi ba dang /_zhi ba ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de ltar rnam par 
[\[275b.2\]]blta bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/_gzugs rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_
[\[275b.3\]]ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang dag 
[\[275b.4\]]par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[275b.5\]]phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du 
[\[275b.6\]]sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_chos gang gis byang chub mthong ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs pas/_shes 
[\[275b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rab 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]'byor dper na/_mi pha ma shi na mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos thams cad mi dmigs 
[\[276a.2\]]pa na bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can gcig pu zhig mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan 
[\[276a.3\]]par 'gyur lags sam/_'on te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa gang lags pa'i bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyang mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_rang rang gi stan la dga' bar mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom 
[\[276a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang mi bral bar gyur pa'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_bdud sdig can gang dag gnas pa 
[\[276a.5\]]de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngu mi bzad pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rang rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa la ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzung nas gtse ba'i 
[\[276a.6\]]glags mi rnyed do/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas par bya'o/_/byang chub 
[\[276a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[276b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_de bzhin du 
[\[276b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bar du ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[276b.4\]]sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing /_sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[276b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing tshul khrims srung bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[276b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgrub pa na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing bzod pa sgom par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[276b.7\]]bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]'grus rtsom pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing /_brtson 'grus rtsom par byed de rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[277a.2\]]ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan sgrub pa na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing /_bsam gtan de dag sgrub par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan 
[\[277a.3\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[277a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing /_shes rab sgom par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[277a.5\]]bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[277a.6\]]phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba ni sems can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las 
[\[277a.7\]]nye bar gnas pa yin/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag gi las dang byams pa'i yid kyi las nye bar gnas pa yin te/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin 
[\[277b.2\]]pa sbyin pa na/_len pa po de dag gshe ba'am/_spyo ba'am/_tshogs par mi 'byung ba'i tshig rtsub mo kun tu 'byin kyang de dag la kun nas mnar sems mi byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_
[\[277b.3\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[277b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_len pa po de dag gshe ba'am/_spyo ba'am tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub mo kun du 'byin na/_de la gshe ba'am/_spyo ba'am tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub mo kun du 'byin kyang sbyin pa'i blo kho 
[\[277b.5\]]na 'byung zhing /_yongs su gtong ba'i blo kho na 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin pa nyid du bya'i/_bdag gis mi sbyin par ni mi bya'o snyam nas/_de lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[277b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[277b.7\]]tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i sems ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo'i/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa kho nas sems gnas te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[278a.2\]]pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[278a.3\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba/_sbyin pa la sgyu ma lta bu'i blo kho nas rtag tu nye bar gnas shing /_sbyin pa des kyang sems can gang la yang phan pa'am gnod par 'gyur bar mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[278a.4\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[278a.5\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces bya gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278a.6\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi sdom pa gang yin pa'i sdom pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang 
[\[278a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed cing /_de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems can rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed do/_/ma byin par len par mi byed do/_/'dod pa la log par g.yem par mi byed do/_/rdzun gyi tshig mi smra'o/_/
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]tshig rtsub po mi smra'o/_/phra ma'i tshig mi smra'o/_/tshig kyal pa mi smra'o/_/brnab sems can du mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas/_sbyin pa 
[\[278b.2\]]gang sbyin yang /_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/_me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng /_byug pa 'dod pa 
[\[278b.3\]]rnams la ni byug pa/_mal 'dod pa rnams la ni mal/_stan 'dod pa rnams la ni stan/_mar me 'dod pa rnams la ni mar me/_yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad/_mi'i yo byad ci yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed de/_sbyin pa de yang sems can thams cad dang 
[\[278b.4\]]thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu de nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdo bar mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[278b.5\]]po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[278b.6\]]'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad sems can thams cad kyis gcad de dong na/_der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[278b.7\]]po'i sems skyed pa gcig tsam yang rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing /_tshig pa za bar mi 'gyur la gnod sems 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad de dong ba ni bdag 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[279a.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad bdag 
[\[279a.3\]]gis 'khor ba las bsgral te/_bdud rtsi'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o zhes lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gtong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[279a.4\]]yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[279a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas shing bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas par byed de/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang lhag par mi dmigs la gzhan du na 'di snyam 
[\[279a.6\]]du sems te/_bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba las bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_bsam 
[\[279a.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_chos thams cad de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba ma gtogs par chos gang la yang 'dus byas su mi mthong 'dus ma byas su mi mthong /_dngos po 'dus byas 
[\[279b.2\]]su mi mthong /_dngos po med pa 'dus ma byas su mi mthong /_mtshan ma 'dus byas su mi mthong /_mtshan med pa 'dus ma byas su mi mthong ngo /_/chos gang la yang yod pa'am med par mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /_thabs la mkhas pas kyang 
[\[279b.3\]]nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[279b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po 
[\[279b.5\]]bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyis gshes sam/_spyos sam/_yan lag dang /_nying lag rnams bcad par 'gyur na/_der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[279b.6\]]gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ni sems can 'di dag la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'i bdag gis mi sbyin par ni mi bya'o snyam ste/_de sems can de dag la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[279b.7\]]sbyar te/_mi'i yo byad ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed la/_des dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed la/_de ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am ci zhig yongs su sngo bar 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su sngo bar byed par 'gyur ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du mi 'jug par yongs su bsngo ba de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[280a.2\]]gnas pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' 
[\[280a.3\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can 'ga' tsam yang srog dang bral bar mi byed cing /_ma byin par mi len to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_log 
[\[280a.4\]]par lta ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang de'i sems mi 'jug go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/_de gang 
[\[280a.5\]]du yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i bar du ci nas blo rnam pa gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin 
[\[280a.6\]]no/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[280a.7\]]dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_'di ltar bdag dpag tshad gcig tu song ngam/_dpag tshad brgya 'am/_dpag tshad stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag 'bum du song la/_der tha na 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]sems can gcig tsam yang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bslab par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub nyid kyi bar du dgod par bya zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o zhes brtson 'grus 
[\[280b.2\]]yang dag par skyed par byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[280b.3\]]tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[280b.4\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du 
[\[280b.5\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba dang ldan pa ci dang ci byung ba rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed de/_de'i tshe yang ci nas bsam gtan rnams dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams mi 
[\[280b.6\]]dmigs pa de ltar na yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[280b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_chos rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa'am/_zhi ba'i rnam pa'am/_zad pa'i rnam par chos kyi rjes su lta bar gnas la/_chos nyid de yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon sum du mi byed de/_der 'dug 
[\[281a.2\]]nas kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de las langs nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[281a.3\]]tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/_ci nas 'dzin pa yang med/_'dor ba yang med pa de ltar yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[281a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_bdag gis nges pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[281a.5\]]par 'tshang rgya bar bya'i/_bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'o snyam nas/_lus dang sems kyi brtson pa mi gtong ste/_sems can rnams kyi ched du dpag tshad gcig gam/_dpag tshad brgya'am/_
[\[281a.6\]]dpag tshad stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'am/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag 'bum du song nas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_tha na sems can gcig tsam yang byang chub la 'jog par byed 
[\[281a.7\]]de/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag ma rnyed na yang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag nyan thos nyid la 'jog par byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rang sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog par byed do/_/tha na sems can gcig tsam yang dge 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_des chos kyi sbyin pa de byin nas/_zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed do/_/des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdo bar mi byed kyi gzhan du 
[\[281b.2\]]na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sdo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[281b.3\]]phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[281b.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed la/_gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_srog gcod pa spong ba'i 
[\[281b.5\]]bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spong bar byed la gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_
[\[281b.6\]]log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pa'i khams don du mi gnyer/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_
[\[281b.7\]]gzugs med pa'i khams don du mi gnyer/_nyan thos kyi sa don du mi gnyer/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa don du mi gnyer gyi gzhan du na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su bsngo ba dang /_ci zhig yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum mi 'byung ba de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[282a.2\]]po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[282a.3\]]tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du gal te mir gyur pa'am/_mi ma yin par gyur pa'i bar dag gis 
[\[282a.4\]]sems rnam par 'khrugs par byas sam/_yan lag dang /_nying lag dag bcad cing khyer te dong yang /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ni 'di snyam du 'di bdag las gcad pa'am/_gtubs pa'am/_
[\[282a.5\]]phrogs so snyam du mi sems te/_gzhan du na de 'di snyam du gang dag gi don du bdag gi lus yongs su grub pa de dag nyid 'dir 'ongs te/_bdag gi yan lag dang /_nying lag dag gtubs shing khyer te/_dong ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam 
[\[282a.6\]]du sems shing /_des ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yid la byas pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo'i gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[282a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig 
[\[282b.2\]]pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang /_byams pa dang /_btang snyoms 
[\[282b.3\]]kyi bar dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs shing gnas te/_de bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin gyi gzhan du na/_gang du sems can 
[\[282b.4\]]thams cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir de dag tu skye zhing des sems can de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[282b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu 
[\[282b.6\]]yang 'gro bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[282b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[283a.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des chos thams cad rdzas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dngos po dang mtshan mar 
[\[283a.3\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ni chos gang la yang gnas par mi byed cing /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[283a.4\]]tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[283a.5\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs 
[\[283a.6\]]te gnas so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing /_rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa 
[\[283a.7\]]dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de dag kyang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_zang zing gi sbyin pa dang //_chos kyi sbyin pa'i 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo'i 
[\[283b.2\]]gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[283b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[283b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed de/_gzhan du na rnam pa thams 
[\[283b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo'i gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[283b.6\]]tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[283b.7\]]dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog go/_/tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog go/_/'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so sor rtog go/_/'du byed rnams la chu shing lta bur so sor rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/_de de 
[\[284a.2\]]ltar phung po lnga la so sor rtog pa na/_snying po med pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_de de ltar so sor rtog pa na yan lag dang /_nying lag dag bcad kyang 'di snyam du 'di la gcod par byed pa ni su'i yin/_tshor ba ni su'i yin/_'du shes ni su'i yin/_'du byed rnams 
[\[284a.3\]]ni su'i yin/_rnam par shes pa ni su'i yin snyam du sems shing /_de de ltar so sor rtog pa na khro bar 'gyur ba dag byas kyang 'di snyam du gang la khro ba dang /_sbyo ba byas pas gnod sems skye ba'i khro ba dang /_gshe bar byed pa 'di la su zhig yod snyam du sems te/_rab 'byor 
[\[284a.4\]]de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_
[\[284a.5\]]ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan 
[\[284a.6\]]bzhi pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams la yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/_de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed pa dag rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/_/lha'i rna ba'i 
[\[284a.7\]]khams kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra dag kyang thos so/_/sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa dag kyang sems kyis kun tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa'i sems kyi bar la yang bla na med pa'i sems su 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dag kyang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/_/lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pa'i bar gyis de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems can rnams las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du nye bar 
[\[284b.2\]]'gro ba'i bar dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[284b.3\]]su dag par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang 'gro ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo'i gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[284b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[284b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[284b.6\]]pa/_gzugs mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/
[\[284b.7\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pas na/_mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/mngon par 'du mi byed pas na/_skye bar mi byed/_
[\[285a.2\]]'gag par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang /_chos gnas pa 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[285a.3\]]kyang gnas pa nyid yin pas/_de la ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/_de ni rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[285a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar 
[\[285a.5\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[285a.6\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya 
[\[285a.7\]]bar mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas nas gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[285b.2\]]shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar du yang stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams dang /_
[\[285b.3\]]'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing /_sbyin pa dag gtong bar byed de/_zas sam/_skom mam/_gos sam/_bzhon pa'am/_
[\[285b.4\]]mal cha'am/_stan nam/_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed kyang /_des sbyin pa de yang stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/_gang sbyin par byed pa dang /_gang la sbyin par bya ba de yang stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_de la ser 
[\[285b.5\]]sna'i sems sam/_kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems dag gi go skabs med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rnam 
[\[285b.6\]]par rtog pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ser sna'i thugs sam/_kun tu 'dzin pa'i 
[\[285b.7\]]thugs mi 'byung ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ser sna'i sems sam/_kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems med pas na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 
[\[286a.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[286a.3\]]la gnas pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag gi skabs mi byed do/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yang mi dmigs la/_gang gi nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang 
[\[286a.4\]]mi dmigs pa'i phyir de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du srog gcod pa spong ba'i phyir/_sems skyed par byed de/_bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed la/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod cing /_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[286a.5\]]srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/bdag kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spangs pa'i phyir/_sems skyed cing log par lta ba spong bar byed la/_gzhan 
[\[286a.6\]]dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed de/_tshul khrims des nyan thos nyid dam rang sangs rgyas 
[\[286a.7\]]nyid dam/_sangs rgyas nyid dam/_chos gang la yang chags pa med na/_gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[286b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa skye zhing /_de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang 'byung ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_skye ba'am/_'chi ba'am/_khro ba'am/_spyo ba'am/_gcad pa'am/_gtub pa'am/_brdeg pa'am/_
[\[286b.3\]]dgag par bya ba med do snyam nas/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can thams cad drung du lhags nas khro bar byed dam/_spyo bar byed dam/_bong ba'am/_dbyug pa'am/_mtshon cha'am/_lag cha dag gis brdeg 
[\[286b.4\]]gam/_gcod dam/_'bigs par byed kyang de la 'di snyam du kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid la ni khro ba'am/_spyo ba'am/_gcad pa'am/_gtub pa'am/_brdeg pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do snyam du sems te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar brtson 'grus 
[\[286b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/_lus dang 
[\[286b.7\]]sems kyis brtson 'grus skyed nas/_'jig rten gyi khams su yang song 'jig rten gyi khams brgyar yang song 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag bye ba snyed du yang song nas/_sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la yang 'god par byed do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang 'god par byed do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang 'god par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rang byang chub kyi bar la yang 'god par 
[\[287a.2\]]byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la yang 'god par byed de/_ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi 'god/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la yang mi 'god pa de ltar 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[287a.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[287a.4\]]pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 
[\[287a.5\]]'dzin tam/_ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo /_/ting 'dzin de dag la gnas nas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad po dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ste/_brgyad gang 
[\[287a.6\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug 
[\[287a.7\]]pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te/_bsgrubs nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]rnams yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' 
[\[287b.2\]]yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 
[\[287b.3\]]'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med 
[\[287b.4\]]min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 
[\[287b.5\]]'jug cing ldang ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag la yang lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa 
[\[287b.6\]]dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyed pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te 
[\[287b.7\]]gnas pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa'i bar dag ste/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo /_/des de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag rnam par dbye ba byas nas/_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[288a.2\]]'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[288a.3\]]las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[288a.4\]]las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/_bsam gtan dang po'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa yin no/_/des de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting 
[\[288a.5\]]nge 'dzin de rnam par dbye bar byas nas/_thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thod rgal gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las 
[\[288a.6\]]dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/_de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[288a.7\]]te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]langs nas/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_bsam gtan gsum pa 
[\[288b.2\]]la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam 
[\[288b.3\]]gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs 
[\[288b.4\]]nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/_'gog 
[\[288b.5\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 
[\[288b.6\]]'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[288b.7\]]pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang //_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su 'bab pa dang /_mnyam 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]par ma bzhag pa'i sems las 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems 
[\[289a.2\]]las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las ci yang med 
[\[289a.3\]]pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 
[\[289a.4\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su 'bab pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas 
[\[289a.5\]]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su 'bab pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag 
[\[289a.6\]]pa'i sems la gnas pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa las langs te/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems 
[\[289a.7\]]las bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]gtan dang po las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa ste/_de thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[289b.2\]]pa la gnas pa/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[289b.3\]]khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de yun ring po ji srid cig nas 
[\[289b.4\]]yang dag par zhugs pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni bskal pa 
[\[289b.5\]]bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis 
[\[289b.6\]]pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/_bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[289b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig bskrun pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dpa' chen po des ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/_/des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[290a.2\]]tu phyin pa gang yang med do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab 
[\[290a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang 
[\[290a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar to/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhir snang bar byed la/_gling bzhi dang 'thun par 'gro zhing
